With the iJOY Bar Smart Vape, you can enjoy your favorite flavors for an extended period thanks to the mini LED screen that tells vou how much battery and e-liquid you have left.
This sleek and portable device is perfect for vapers who are always on the go.
Whether you're a vaping enthusiast or a beginner, the iJOY Bar Smart Vape is the perfect device for you. With its long-lasting performance, easy-to-use design, and delicious flavors, you can enjoy a premium vaping experience anytime, anywhere.
Don't wait any longer; order your iJOY Bar Smart Vape today.

all_text:
Vozol Vape
[]
A smooth, flavorful vaping experience awaits with the Vozol Vape. At a whopping 10000 puffs, this vape is equipped to follow you wherever you go. With delicious flavors inspired by tropical smoothies, the Vozol Vape is a delight!
Vozol Specifications

Prefilled Capacity: 16mL
Battery Capacity: 500mAh
Max Puffs: 10000
Nicotine Strength: 5% (50mg)
Operation: Draw-Activated
Heating Element: Mesh Coil
Charging: Type-C Port
Cool Mint:

A classic, natural mint that is always sure to satisfy.
Peach Mango Smoothie:

Creamy peaches and tropical mango mingle to make a delicious concoction reminiscent of fresh smoothies.
Strawberry Ice Cream:

Cool ice combines with ripe strawberries and cream for a silky, delectable flavor.
Super Berry:

Blueberries, raspberries and blackberries… oh my! Super Berry perfectly encapsulates the taste of sour, sweet berries.
Watermelon Ice:

Watermelon Ice captures the essence of ripe watermelon, combined with a cooling, icy sensation.

['Mint: Blast off into cool freshness with Mint, for a rejuvenating vape taste that leaves your mouth feeling refreshed and invigorated with every draw.', "Strawberry Banana: It’s all about the sweet sensations of ripened strawberries and delicious bananas, dropping a smooth and fruity vape on your tongue that's satisfying and delectable.", "Strawberry Cool: Strawberry Cool offers a naturally sweetened and perfectly chilled vape experience that's just right for hot summer days and fun party nights.", 'Vanilla Whip: Whip your senses into a creamy frenzy of sweetness with Vanilla Whip! This super smooth and indulgent vape is reminiscent of everyone’s all-time favorite dessert taste…vanilla!', 'Spiced Melon: This is a flavor journey you must try! It is a blend of exotic sweet melon sprinkled with warm spices for a one of a kind satisfying vape experience.', 'Peach Watermelon: Enjoy juicy goodness puff after puff as ripe peaches and refreshing watermelon inundate your taste buds with peach and watermelon flavors. You’ll get a kick from this fusion of fruit flavors created with all-day vaping in mind.', 'Cool Lemon: Quench your thirst with the tart brightness of Florida lemons touched by a subtle cool breeze, for tangy vape sessions that will definitely brighten your day.', "Cool Grapefruit: Wake up your senses with the sharp sweetness of pink grapefruit, infused with a chilled sensation that delivers an invigorating vape that's like a detonation of big flavor in your mouth.", "Cool Grape: This one is bold and juicy, filled with the appealing flavor of grapes! Get busy enjoying this vape experience that's got it all…sweet, fruity, and irresistibly cool."]
Main Device Body: The main structure of the Realio Disposable Vape contains the battery, mesh coil, and the e-liquid reservoir, affording users with a sturdy and dependable foundation for your long time vaping pleasure.Ergonomic Mouthpiece: The ergonomic mouthpiece of the Realio Disposable Vape gives you a comfortable vaping experience, allowing you to effortlessly enjoy every puff possible.E-liquid Reservoir: The pre-filled e-liquid reservoir is loaded with a copious amount of high-quality e-liquid, giving you a flavorful vaping experience without ever having to stop to refill! Mesh Coil Assembly: The mesh coil assembly is the heart of the device, and controls the heating of the e-liquid, turning it into smooth clouds of tasty vapor. Boasting long-lasting durability and unparalleled performance, the mesh coil ensures a consistent vaping experience.LED Indicator Light: The LED indicator light is located on the device body and displays real-time information on the device's battery status strength. Now you get to monitor your vaping sessions with ease.Compact Ergonomic Design: The Realio Disposable Vape features a handy lightweight design that’s perfect for vape lovers who are on-the-go. Slip it into any pocket or your purse for easy access wherever you are.Disposable: Say bye bye to aggravating refills and confusing setups. The Realio Disposable Vape is pre-filled and ready for you to use as soon as you remove it from the box. Long-lasting Battery: Equipped with a powerful high-capacity battery, the Realio Disposable Vape gives you longer lasting vaping sessions without the need for frequent recharging. Uninterrupted vaping pleasure is yours wherever and whenever you need it.Wide Variety of Flavors: Choose from a vast array of delicious flavors specially created to suit your preferences. Whether you're craving something fruity, refreshing, or wildly indulgent, the Realio Disposable Vape has the flavor varieties to satisfy every palate.Smooth Airflow: You’ll revel in smooth, satisfying airflow with every puff, for a consistently enjoyable vaping experience from beginning to end.Puff Count: 5000 - “Real Puffs”
Are you ready for the ultimate solution for vapers seeking convenience, flavor, and performance in one sleek package? Then allow us to Introduce the Realio Disposable VapeCrafted to you! Made with 100% precision and innovation, the Realio Disposable Vape offers a totally hassle-free vaping experience that's a great choice for beginners and seasoned vape enthusiasts alike.

Spree Bar Metatine Pod | Free Shipping | $11.99
[]
Spree Bar Metatine Pod | Free Shipping | $11.99

Indulge your senses in flavorful bliss with
Spree Bar Pods
. Crafted to elevate your vaping experience to new heights, each pod is carefully engineered to deliver a detonation of great flavor, ensuring every puff is an experience of pure satisfaction.
New to Spree Bar? Be sure to purchase the
Starter Kit first!
Key Features and Components:

Premium Quality Ingredients
: Spree Bar Pods are created using only the finest ingredients, ensuring a satisfying vaping experience with every puff.
5% Metatine:
Metatine is a patented non-nicotine compound that is emerging among vape users.
Spree Bar has the same satisfactory experience as traditional nicotine!
Wide Range of Flavors
: With flavors ranging from fruity delights to refreshing menthol sensations, Spree Bar Flavor Pods offer something for everyone.
Easy-to-Use Design
: Designed for your 100% convenience, Spree Bar Pods boast a hassle-free design, effortless installation and removal, making them the perfect choice for all vape lovers.
Long-lasting Performance
: Each pod is built to provide dependable, long-lasting performance. Enjoy your favorite flavors for extended vape sessions without interruption.
Leak-Proof Technology
: No more messy leaks. Spree Bar 6000 Pods feature advanced leak-proof technology, for clean, enjoyable vaping experiences every time.
Sleek and Portable:
The compact design of Spree Bar Pods are perfect for busy vapers. Now you can enjoy your favorite flavors wherever your life journeys take you.
Pod Cartridge
: The beating heart of the Spree Bar Pods system is the pod cartridge itself.  This is where the e-liquid and coil necessary for vapor production are housed. Each of the Spree Bar Flavor Pods comes pre-filled with top-quality e-liquid, guaranteeing optimal flavor delivery from start to finish.
Mouthpiece
: The ergonomic mouthpiece delivers maximum comfort and super clean airflow. You’ll love the silky smooth and satisfying inhales.
Battery
: Spree Bar Pods system has a rechargeable battery that provides ample power for extended vaping. With a strong battery like this, you can enjoy uninterrupted vaping pleasure throughout the day. (*Not included with the pods - purchase the Starter Kit
HERE

all_text:
Lost Vape Orion Bar Disposable 7500 Puffs
[]
About
Lost Vape Orion Bar Disposable 7500 Puffs
Are you tired of constantly having to charge your vape or replace the pods? Do you want a long. lasting, hassle-free vaping experience? Look no further than the Lost Vape Orion Bar Disposable, available at White Horse Vapor.
Vaping has become a popular alternative to smoking, witn a vast array of devices and flavors to choose from. However, many vapers struggle with the inconvenience of constantly having to recharge their devices or replace their pods.
The Lost Vape Orion Bar Disposable offers a solution to this problem with its impressive 7500 puff lifespan and easy-to-use design. Whether you're a seasoned vaper or just starting out, this disposable device is a great option for anyone looking for a convenient and long-lasting vaping experience.
Here's a closer look at what makes the Lost Vape Orion Bar Disposable so desirable.
(charger not included)

Approximately 7500 Puffs
Adjustable Airflow
As you can see, the Lost Vape Orion Bar Disposable is a convenient and powerful disposable vape device that boasts an incredible 7500 puffs. It is perfect for vapers who are always on the go and want hassle-free vaping. The compact and lightweight design of the device ensures easy handling and portability. Check out the flavor selection!
18mL Pre-Filled E-Liquid
5% (50mg) Nicotine Strength
650mAh Type-C Rechargeable Battery

all_text:
iJoy Captain 10000 Vape | Grape Honeydew
[]
Captain 10000 Vape by iJOY
The trusted brand iJOY introduces a brand new innovation in vapor technology. With an impressive 10000 puffs, the iJOY Captain Vape keeps you on your journey for longer. It's like having a treasure chest of unforgettable moments at your fingertips, ready to satisfy your cravings anytime, anywhere. Whether you're relaxing on your deck or conquering uncharted territories, this vaping device is the perfect first mate.
Captain by iJOY Specifications

5% Nicotine 50mg
18 mL Pre Filled Capacity
Approximately 10000 Puffs
Battery Indicator
E-Liquid Level Indicator
Adjustable Airflow
USB-C Rechargeable
Flavors for Captain Vape
Cool Mint:
You’ll love this breath of crisp, arctic air with each inhale, perfect for those seeking a refreshing and soothing vaping experience. The icy minty notes will leave you feeling so fresh.
Blueberry Watermelon:
Jump into the tasty flavors of Blueberry and Watermelon. Ripe mountain blueberries blend so well with juicy watermelon, creating a delightful combination of fruity goodness that will do a jig on your taste buds.
Strawberry Dragon Fruit:
Strawberry Dragon Fruit combines the scrumptious sweetness of ripe strawberries with exotic allure dragon fruit. This e-liquid transports your palate to an imaginary paradise where the perfect balance of fruity flavors rules.
Strawberry Watermelon:
Strawberry Watermelon brings you the best of both vape worlds, combining the iconic sweet taste of strawberries with the juiciness
of watermelon. It's a delightful duo of fruity goodness that's super hard to resist.
Mango Melon Strawberry:
Suit up for a tropical vape adventure with Mango Melon Strawberry. The blend of ripe mangoes, juicy melons, and sweet strawberries brings your taste buds to a sunny beachside paradise.
Banana Pinacolada:
If you like Pina Colada... Banana Piñacolada is like sipping a tropical cocktail by the ocean. Ripe bananas and sweet pineapple blend so well together, for a creamy coconut tasting vape.
Kiwi Berry:
Kiwi Berry slaps you with a tangy, but not too sweet vape flavor. Ripe kiwis and choice berries fuse together for a vibrant vaping sensation.
Cherry Strawberry Kiwi:
A hat trick of the classic fruit flavors gets together in Cherry Strawberry Kiwi. This fantastic blend of cherries, ripe strawberries, and tangy kiwis is a fruit lover's dream.
Strawberry Cotton Candy:
It's like a trip to the carnival, featuring Strawberry Cotton Candy. This e-liquid captures the sugary sweetness of cotton candy combined with a splash of ripe strawberries.
Blue Raspberry Ice:
Blue Raspberry Ice bursts onto the flavor scene with bold, tangy notes of blue raspberry, topped off with an ice cold finish! A truly refreshing vape experience you’ll never get tired of.
Watermelon Bubblegum:
A nostalgic treat is coming your way with Watermelon Bubblegum. The taste of juicy red watermelon is paired just right with the sweet, enticing flavor of classic bubblegum.
Blue Berries:
Blue Berries is a celebration of this berry families finest members. Indulge in the bright taste of freshly picked blueberries, dropping a natural burst of sweetness where it counts…on your tongue!
Frozen Apple Pear:
Combining crisp apples and juicy pears with a frosty twist is what this is all about. An icy sensation complements the fruity flavor, making this vaping adventure a fan favorite.
Tropical Fruit:
Tropical Fruit is like a tornado of exotic flavors. It spins a medley of tropical fruits together to create a vibrant vaping vortex! It’s a fun journey with lots of pleasurable puffing.
Peach Gummy:
Juicy peaches meld with the playful sweetness of gummy candy, creating a mouthwatering vape that's both fruity and irresistibly chewy.
Aloe Blueberry:
Escape to a tranquil oasis with Aloe Blueberry. Succulent blueberries meet soothing aloe vera, creating a mysteriously enchanting and refreshing vape.
Apple Mango:
Dive into a symphony of taste with Apple Mango. Crisp apples meld with ripe mangoes for a harmonious and juicy blend.
Cranberry Bubblegum:

Zesty cranberries playfully collide with nostalgic bubble gum, delivering bold and delightful flavors.
Grape Honeydew:
Indulge in sophistication with Grape Honeydew. Rich grapes meet luscious honeydew, offering a velvety smooth and classy vaping experience.
Pineapple Kiwi:
Transport yourself to a tropical paradise with Pineapple Kiwi. Tangy pineapple pairs seamlessly with exotic kiwi for a sweet escape.
Plum Kiwi:

Experience lush decadence with Plum Kiwi. Dark plums meet invigorating kiwi, elevating this flavor.
Raspberry Mango:

Savor the perfect balance of sweet and tart with Raspberry Mango. Plump raspberries entwine with golden mangoes for a sun-kissed orchard delight.
Sour Apple Raspberry:
Unleash electrifying flavor with Sour Apple Raspberry. Crisp green apples collide with tangy raspberries, creating a dance of sour and sweet notes.
Strawberry Ice:

Chill out with Strawberry Ice. Succulent strawberries meet an icy breeze for a cool, fruity sensation that leaves you refreshed.
Watermelon Mint:
Dive into crisp waters with Watermelon Mint. Juicy watermelon takes center stage, while a hint of mint adds a refreshing twist.
Apple Plum Pomegranate
- The crispy sweetness of ripe red apples, the juiciness of fresh plums and the complexity of luscious pomegranate all combine for this one-in-a-million vape flavor. Puff your way through this vibrant orchard of fruity flavors as they do a dance across your palate.

all_text:
iJoy SD 22000 Disposable | Apple Gummies
[]
iJoy SD 22000 Disposable Vape 22k Puffs With 5% Nicotine

Reach the pinnacle of vaping technology with the iJoy Bar SD22000 Disposable Vape. Engineered for precise performance and reliability, this futuristic vape device brings you unparalleled vaping experiences for beginners and experienced vapers alike. With its innovative features, slick design elements and exceptional flavor delivery, the iJoy Disposable Vape will become your perfect puff companion. Vapers who seek the ultimate vaping experience can add this one to their list.
High Capacity Battery
: Comes equipped with a very powerful 22000mAh battery. This ensures that the iJoy Bar SD22000 Vape will deliver long-lasting vape sessions without the need for frequent recharging. Now you can vape with confidence any time you want.
Advanced Chipset Technology
: With its advanced chipset, the iJoy SD22000 delivers rapid firing, exact temperature control and multiple vaping modes for that customized vaping experience everyone is seeking.
Big Display Screen
: You’ll appreciate the fact that the iJoy SD22000 Vape has a large, clear OLED display screen. It provides real-time vaping data such as wattage, coil resistance and even battery life so you’ll never be left in the dark.
Refined Ergonomic Design
: With its comfortable cushy design, the iJoy SD22000 Vape fits perfectly in your hand, pocket or purse. It’s perfect for on-the-go vaping anytime and wherever you are.
Intuitive User Interface
: It is easy and a pleasure to navigate the iJoy SD22000 Vape's intuitive user interface. Featuring simple controls and a user-friendly design, adjusting settings and monitoring your vaping experience is a breeze. Check out the iJoy SD22000 Vape Manual!
Multiple Protections
: Safety is paramount with the iJoy SD22000 Vape. It comes equipped with multiple safety features including overheating protection, short circuit protection, and even low battery protection for a worry-free vaping experience.
Components
:
1 x iJoy SD22000 Vape Device
1 x Micro USB Type C Charging Cable
1 x User Manual
0.8-ohm Mesh Coil
Adjustable Power Modes
Flavor Descriptions:
Black Ice
: Brace yourself for a chilling blast of flavor with Black Ice from iJoy Bar SD22000. This electrifying blend brings the bold taste of blackcurrant together with a wonderful menthol undertone, for a refreshing and frosty vaping experience that will awaken your senses with every inhale.
Colombian Coffee Ice
: Indulge in the rich and robust flavor of Colombian coffee, magically infused with a hint of icy coolness. Colombian Coffee Ice from iJoy Bar SD22000 is perfect for coffee lovers seeking a refreshing pick-me-up. This flavor offers a smooth and invigorating vaping experience that will tantalize your taste and revitalize your taste buds.
Iced Peach Colada
: Bring your taste to a tropical paradise with Iced Peach Colada from iJoy Bar SD22000. This sexy, exotic blend combines juicy peaches, creamy coconut, and a pinch of icy menthol, creating a refreshing vaping experience that just might remind you of sipping a frozen colada on a sun-drenched beach.
Mango Pineapple
: Vape into a tropical oasis with Mango Pineapple from iJoy Bar SD22000. Absolutely bursting with the sweet flavors of sun-ripened mangoes and juicy pineapples, this tropical blend brings you a taste of paradise with every puff.
Strawberry Watermelon
: It’s thirst quenching time! The juicy sweetness of Strawberry Watermelon from iJoy Bar SD22000 is here. This mouthwatering choice combines ripe strawberries and bright watermelon, for an irresistible flavor that will leave your taste buds tingling with joy.
Watermelon Ice Cubes
: Chill out everyone! Watermelon Ice Cubes flavor from iJoy Bar SD22000 is as good as it sounds! This ice-cold blend shows off the stimulating taste of juicy watermelon infused with a menthol blast, for an invigorating vaping experience that leaves you feeling revitalized.
Apple Gummies
: You should treat your taste buds to this delightful taste with Apple Gummies from iJoy SD220000. It’s a sweet, tangy blend that captures the essence of ripe apples and irresistible chewy gummy candies. This delectable vaping experience is very satisfying.
Arctic Mint
: You’ll feel the refreshing blast of coolness with Arctic Mint from iJoy SD220000 from your first puff. Combine the icy freshness of arctic menthol with a hint of peppermint for a crisp and refreshing flavor profile that will awaken your senses puff after puff.
Blackberry Cherry Lemon
: The burst of fruity goodness with Blackberry Cherry Lemon from iJoy SD220000 is fantastic. The juicy sweetness of ripe blackberries and cherries plus a zesty twist of lemon, create a fearless fusion of flavors that your taste buds will thank you for.
Blue Raspberry Ice
: A pool of icy blue raspberry goodness awaits, with Blue Raspberry Ice from iJoy SD220000. Meticulously mixing the bold and tangy flavor of blue raspberries with a cold blast of menthol, makes for a crisp vaping experience that leaves you feeling fresh.
Cherry Berry
: Shut those cravings down with Cherry Berry from iJoy SD220000. This luscious flavor features the succulent flavor of ripe Bing cherries with a medley of mixed berries that creates a mouthwatering detonation of fruit goodness that will delight all your senses.
Froze Strawberry Cream
: Indulge in a frosty and creamy delight with this decadent blend that combines sweet ripe strawberries with rich creamy vanilla. Finish this off with a cool and refreshing exhale, and you’ll enjoy a luxurious vaping experience again and again.
Grape Jelly
: If you want to experience an irresistible flavor from your past, check out Grape Jelly from iJoy SD220000. This blend brings the essence of sweet and tangy grape jelly, for a burst of fruity goodness that’s hard to ignore.
Gummy Bears
: Take a trip down memory lane! Gummy Bears from iJoy SD220000 is a playful blend that captures the essence of chewy gummy candies, bursting with fruity flavors that dance across the palate and leave you craving more.
Juicy Mango Peach:
It’s tropical paradise time, with Juicy Peach Mango from iJoy SD220000. This island blend joins the juicy sweetness of ripe peaches with the tropical tanginess of mangoes. The result is a luscious flavor directly from sun-drenched beaches and palm-fringed shores.
Are you ready to experience the next level of vaping with the iJoy SD22000 Vape? Can you handle its high-capacity battery, advanced chipset technology, and sleek design?
We know you can
…making it the ultimate choice for vapers who demand excellence in every puff. Elevate your vaping experience with the iJoy SD22000 Vape today.

Flavor Descriptions:
Black Ice
: Brace yourself for a chilling blast of flavor with Black Ice from iJoy Bar SD22000. This electrifying blend brings the bold taste of blackcurrant together with a wonderful menthol undertone, for a refreshing and frosty vaping experience that will awaken your senses with every inhale.
Colombian Coffee Ice
: Indulge in the rich and robust flavor of Colombian coffee, magically infused with a hint of icy coolness. Colombian Coffee Ice from iJoy Bar SD22000 is perfect for coffee lovers seeking a refreshing pick-me-up. This flavor offers a smooth and invigorating vaping experience that will tantalize your taste and revitalize your taste buds.
Iced Peach Colada
: Bring your taste to a tropical paradise with Iced Peach Colada from iJoy Bar SD22000. This sexy, exotic blend combines juicy peaches, creamy coconut, and a pinch of icy menthol, creating a refreshing vaping experience that just might remind you of sipping a frozen colada on a sun-drenched beach.
Mango Pineapple
: Vape into a tropical oasis with Mango Pineapple from iJoy Bar SD22000. Absolutely bursting with the sweet flavors of sun-ripened mangoes and juicy pineapples, this tropical blend brings you a taste of paradise with every puff.
Strawberry Watermelon
: It’s thirst quenching time! The juicy sweetness of Strawberry Watermelon from iJoy Bar SD22000 is here. This mouthwatering choice combines ripe strawberries and bright watermelon, for an irresistible flavor that will leave your taste buds tingling with joy.
Watermelon Ice Cubes
: Chill out everyone! Watermelon Ice Cubes flavor from iJoy Bar SD22000 is as good as it sounds! This ice-cold blend shows off the stimulating taste of juicy watermelon infused with a menthol blast, for an invigorating vaping experience that leaves you feeling revitalized.
Apple Gummies
: You should treat your taste buds to this delightful taste with Apple Gummies from iJoy SD220000. It’s a sweet, tangy blend that captures the essence of ripe apples and irresistible chewy gummy candies. This delectable vaping experience is very satisfying.
Arctic Mint
: You’ll feel the refreshing blast of coolness with Arctic Mint from iJoy SD220000 from your first puff. Combine the icy freshness of arctic menthol with a hint of peppermint for a crisp and refreshing flavor profile that will awaken your senses puff after puff.
Blackberry Cherry Lemon
: The burst of fruity goodness with Blackberry Cherry Lemon from iJoy SD220000 is fantastic. The juicy sweetness of ripe blackberries and cherries plus a zesty twist of lemon, create a fearless fusion of flavors that your taste buds will thank you for.
Blue Raspberry Ice
: A pool of icy blue raspberry goodness awaits, with Blue Raspberry Ice from iJoy SD220000. Meticulously mixing the bold and tangy flavor of blue raspberries with a cold blast of menthol, makes for a crisp vaping experience that leaves you feeling fresh.
Cherry Berry
: Shut those cravings down with Cherry Berry from iJoy SD220000. This luscious flavor features the succulent flavor of ripe Bing cherries with a medley of mixed berries that creates a mouthwatering detonation of fruit goodness that will delight all your senses.
Froze Strawberry Cream
: Indulge in a frosty and creamy delight with this decadent blend that combines sweet ripe strawberries with rich creamy vanilla. Finish this off with a cool and refreshing exhale, and you’ll enjoy a luxurious vaping experience again and again.
Grape Jelly
: If you want to experience an irresistible flavor from your past, check out Grape Jelly from iJoy SD220000. This blend brings the essence of sweet and tangy grape jelly, for a burst of fruity goodness that’s hard to ignore.
Gummy Bears
: Take a trip down memory lane! Gummy Bears from iJoy SD220000 is a playful blend that captures the essence of chewy gummy candies, bursting with fruity flavors that dance across the palate and leave you craving more.
Juicy Mango Peach:
It’s tropical paradise time, with Juicy Peach Mango from iJoy SD220000. This island blend joins the juicy sweetness of ripe peaches with the tropical tanginess of mangoes. The result is a luscious flavor directly from sun-drenched beaches and palm-fringed shores.
Are you ready to experience the next level of vaping with the iJoy SD22000 Vape? Can you handle its high-capacity battery, advanced chipset technology, and sleek design?
We know you can
…making it the ultimate choice for vapers who demand excellence in every puff. Elevate your vaping experience with the iJoy SD22000 Vape today.

: It’s thirst quenching time! The juicy sweetness of Strawberry Watermelon from iJoy Bar SD22000 is here. This mouthwatering choice combines ripe strawberries and bright watermelon, for an irresistible flavor that will leave your taste buds tingling with joy.
Watermelon Ice Cubes
: Chill out everyone! Watermelon Ice Cubes flavor from iJoy Bar SD22000 is as good as it sounds! This ice-cold blend shows off the stimulating taste of juicy watermelon infused with a menthol blast, for an invigorating vaping experience that leaves you feeling revitalized.
Apple Gummies
: You should treat your taste buds to this delightful taste with Apple Gummies from iJoy SD220000. It’s a sweet, tangy blend that captures the essence of ripe apples and irresistible chewy gummy candies. This delectable vaping experience is very satisfying.
Arctic Mint
: You’ll feel the refreshing blast of coolness with Arctic Mint from iJoy SD220000 from your first puff. Combine the icy freshness of arctic menthol with a hint of peppermint for a crisp and refreshing flavor profile that will awaken your senses puff after puff.
Blackberry Cherry Lemon
: The burst of fruity goodness with Blackberry Cherry Lemon from iJoy SD220000 is fantastic. The juicy sweetness of ripe blackberries and cherries plus a zesty twist of lemon, create a fearless fusion of flavors that your taste buds will thank you for.
Blue Raspberry Ice
: A pool of icy blue raspberry goodness awaits, with Blue Raspberry Ice from iJoy SD220000. Meticulously mixing the bold and tangy flavor of blue raspberries with a cold blast of menthol, makes for a crisp vaping experience that leaves you feeling fresh.
Cherry Berry
: Shut those cravings down with Cherry Berry from iJoy SD220000. This luscious flavor features the succulent flavor of ripe Bing cherries with a medley of mixed berries that creates a mouthwatering detonation of fruit goodness that will delight all your senses.
Froze Strawberry Cream
: Indulge in a frosty and creamy delight with this decadent blend that combines sweet ripe strawberries with rich creamy vanilla. Finish this off with a cool and refreshing exhale, and you’ll enjoy a luxurious vaping experience again and again.
Grape Jelly
: If you want to experience an irresistible flavor from your past, check out Grape Jelly from iJoy SD220000. This blend brings the essence of sweet and tangy grape jelly, for a burst of fruity goodness that’s hard to ignore.
Gummy Bears
: Take a trip down memory lane! Gummy Bears from iJoy SD220000 is a playful blend that captures the essence of chewy gummy candies, bursting with fruity flavors that dance across the palate and leave you craving more.
Juicy Mango Peach:
It’s tropical paradise time, with Juicy Peach Mango from iJoy SD220000. This island blend joins the juicy sweetness of ripe peaches with the tropical tanginess of mangoes. The result is a luscious flavor directly from sun-drenched beaches and palm-fringed shores.
Are you ready to experience the next level of vaping with the iJoy SD22000 Vape? Can you handle its high-capacity battery, advanced chipset technology, and sleek design?
We know you can
…making it the ultimate choice for vapers who demand excellence in every puff. Elevate your vaping experience with the iJoy SD22000 Vape today.

all_text:
Geek Bar Skyview 25K Puffs Disposable Vape | 5% Nicotine
[]
Geek Bar Skyview Vape | 25K Puffs

Reimagine the ecstasy of vaping with the all-new
Geek Bar Skyview Disposable Vape

. Manufactured by our favorite brand Geek bar, it has 25k puffs so you can enjoy long-lasting vape clouds. Its advanced vaping technology and elegant design ensure an unparalleled vaping experience.
This revolutionary vape combines 16mL e-liquid capacity, 5% nicotine strength, and a whopping 25,000 puffs, setting the bar high for disposable vapes. It features a robust 800mAh rechargeable battery, dual mesh coil for enhanced flavors, and a sleek 1.8-inch TFT screen for customizable modes. The Type-C charging port quickly recharges the device, and ensures long-lasting puffs.
It features three different modes: soft mode with the full capacity of 25,000 puffs; norm mode with better-balanced flavors and 15,000 puffs; and a pulse mode for high intensity vaping with 12,500 puffs.
The Geek Bar Skyview is equipped with cutting-edge dual mesh coil technology, ensuring each puff is bursting with rich, consistent flavor. Its dual-core heating system amplifies vapor production, offering a premium vaping experience. Keep track of essential details effortlessly with its expansive 1.8-inch smart TFT screen, which provides real-time updates on battery status, vaping mode, and e-liquid levels, all at a quick glance.
If you are a performance-obsessed vaper who wants sleek style, flavor fiesta, and grab the latest vape tech,
Geek Bar Skyview

is for you!
Think you've experienced it all? Wait till the Geek Bar Skyview hits your taste buds. It's our guarantee.
Geek Bar Skyview Specifications:

16ml E-Liquid Capacity
5% (50mg) Nicotine Strength
800mah Type-C Rechargeable Battery
25000 puffs count
Three Vaping Modes:
Soft Mode (12W) - 25,000 Puffs
Norm Mode (18W) - 15,000 Puffs
Pulse Mode (25W) - 12,500 Puffs
Dual Mesh Coil
Smart TFT Screen
Dual Core Heating
Geek Bar Skyview Flavors:

Sky Walker:
Set off on a stellar adventure with this mesmerizing mix. Every inhale delivers a thrilling burst of flavors that elevate your vaping to celestial heights. Distinctively delightful and daringly bold, it's the ideal choice for anyone craving an ecstatic vaping journey.
Twisted B Pop:
Dive into a flavor explosion with this enticing mix. Each puff delivers a harmonious blend of sweet fruity notes and refreshing coolness that's utterly captivating.
Strawberry Banana:
Enjoy the lush, ripe flavors of strawberries blended with the sweet essence of tropical bananas. This delightful combination is sure to have you returning for more.
Sour Watermelon Blue Razz:
Relish the zesty combination of juicy watermelon and luscious blue raspberry. Each inhale brings a wave of tangy sweetness, showcasing a perfectly balanced blend of ripe watermelon and vibrant blue raspberry for a deliciously sharp vaping experience.
Triple Berry:
Delight in the robust flavors of three mixed berries in every puff. This luscious combination offers a great combination of tantalizing berries, creating a symphony of sweet fruitiness. Wonderfully refreshing and bursting with flavor, it’s an ideal vape for those who crave a triple berry treat.
Cherry Lemon Mint
- The taste of tangy cherries and tart lemons balances perfectly with the delectable mint finish. The aroma of this flavor grabs the attention of those around you, and turns you into a “Vape Star!”
Blue Razz Ice
- The electrifying taste of sweet and tart blue raspberries is enhanced with a tantalizing menthol finish. Blue Razz Ice brings a blast of bold blue fruit amplified by a cool, refreshing exhale. Make this your perfect choice whenever you crave a dynamic frozen vape.
Peach Raspberry
- Juicy, ripe peaches blended with the tangy, plump raspberries will grab your taste buds and not let go. This creative combination creates a rich fruit-filled vaping experience that is both sweet and a little tart. We know you’ll agree that it’s perfect for an all-day vape.
Peach Blue Slushy
- Dig this nostalgic taste of a classic slurpy with a slushy twist. Combining the succulent taste of peaches with the icy coolness of a blue slushy was a brilliant idea! It’s frosty and sweet, causing you to dream about favorite frozen treats from your past with each puff.
Blackberry Fckin Fab
- It’s all about the bold and lavish taste of vine ripened blackberries with Blackberry Fckin Fab. This flavor’s deep blackberry profile drops a sweet and slightly tart flavor on your tongue, for a truly exceptional vaping experience that’s truly
Fckin Fab
!
Strawberry Ice
- Delight in the frigid flavor of naturally sweet strawberries injected with a fresh menthol finish. Strawberry Ice magically balances the scrumptious taste of Granny’s garden strawberries with a frosty exhale, providing a chilled satisfying vape.
Miami Mint
- This South Beach flavor combo delivers a vibrant and cool vaping experience that celebrates the refreshing feeling of partying in the 305. Feel the cool ocean breeze, as the minty fresh flavor electrifies your palate puf after puff.
Sour Apple Ice
- Sour and crunchy green apple taste combines with a blast of frigid ice! This one is tart, tangy, chilled and delicious all in one. If you enjoy excellent apple flavor, this is a must try!
Shop now at White Horse Vapor for the best price and get free shipping above $59 with your purchase.

all_text:
Geek Bar Pulse X 25000 Disposable Vape - 5% Nicotine
[]
Geek Bar Pulse X 25000 Disposable Vape - 5% Nicotine

18mL Pre-Filled E-Liquid:

Now you can enjoy extended vape sessions with zero hassles! No more frequent refills or other bothersome maintenance, thanks to the generous 18mL pre-filled e-liquid capacity. Simply insert the pod, and you're ready to rock the vape for a long time!
5% (50mg) Nicotine Strength:

A super satisfying nicotine delivery is yours with the 5% (50mg) nicotine strength, providing a smooth, consistent vaping experience like never before.
820mAh Type C-Rechargeable Battery:

Power effortlessly through the day with confidence, knowing that the high-capacity 820mAh Type C-rechargeable battery is taking care of business. You can now enjoy long-lasting vaping sessions without the need for frequent recharging.
Two Vaping Modes,

Different Puff Counts
:

Regular Mode

: Indulge in the most extended vaping sessions, delivering approximately 25,000 puffs in Regular Mode. This setting is perfect for all-day vaping.
X Pulse Mode:

Optimize your vaping experience fearlessly in Pulse Mode, delivering approximately 15,000 puffs, but with much more intense flavor and cloud production.
Dual Mesh Coil

:

Extreme flavor and vapor production is evident with the dual mesh coil technology inside. It’s all about a smooth and satisfying vaping experience for vape aficionados.
The First 3D Curved Screen

: What next? Stay informed at a glance, in real time, with the first of its kind 3D curved screen. The Geek Bar Pulse X Vape is constantly displaying essential information you need to know, such as battery level, vaping mode, and e-liquid level all with unparalleled clarity and style. People will notice!
Advanced Display Technology - Starry UI

: Immerse yourself in the stunning visuals of the Starry UI, offering a futuristic and intuitive interface for effortless navigation and customization. You‘ll ask yourself, ”
What’s more fun? Vaping or checking out the visual effects?
”
Speed Charging:

Stay powered up and ready to vape with Geek Bar Pulse X 25K fast charging capabilities, charging at 1.5A and supporting a voltage range of 5-20V for swift and efficient recharging, this baby does not play around.
Dual Core Heating

: Experience rapid and perfectly even heating, with industry leading, dual core heating technology. Features of this level have been designed to bring you consistent flavor and vapor production with every puff…and they do!
Banana Taffy Freeze

:

Cool off and chill out with a frozen wave of delight! Banana Taffy Freeze drops the creamy sweetness of ripe bananas wrapped in a chilly taffy blanket on your tongue and finishes with a refreshing blast of menthol that’s smooth and satisfying. This Geek Bar Flavor will send shivers down your spine.
Sour Mango Pineapple

: You must experience this tropical explosion of flavor! Sour Mango Pineapple brings the tangy sweetness of ripe mangoes together with the zesty slap of freshly cut pineapples, all infused with a sour twist. Each perky puff is like a dry off for your taste buds, leaving you feeling revitalized.
Raspberry Peach Lime

:

Experience a far out fruity fiesta with Raspberry Peach Lime! This bright idea of a  blend brings juicy raspberries, succulent peaches, and tangy limes together for a flavor blast that's sweet and zesty. Perfect puffs for sunny days with laid-back vibes.
Blue Rancher

:

This is a flavor that will awaken memories of days gone by! Its nostalgic taste captures your favorite blue raspberry hard candy, and delivers a burst of sweet and tangy goodness with every puff. A classic treat that refuses to grow old.
Strawberry B-Pop

:

Get ready to party down with Strawberry B-Pop! This flavor-packed puff party vape combines the sweet strawberries with a hint of creamy goodness, making this a smooth and satisfying VIP vape treat.
Sour Fcuking Fab

:

We must warn you to brace yourself for an explosion of sour flavor! Sour Fcuking Fab packs a powerful punch with its intense sourness, balanced by sweet and fruity undertones. It's a different style vape made for adventurous people, that’s sure to wake up all your taste buds too.
Miami Mint

: Chill out 305 style with Miami Mint! This sexy South Beach flavor combines the coolness of menthol with a swirl of naturally sweet mint, creating a crisp and invigorating vape that's perfect for hot summer days and cool Miami nights.
Orange Fcuking Fab

:

Are you ready for a citrus blast with Orange Fcuking Fab? This tangy flavor combines the ripe, sweet Navel oranges with a bit of sour, for a boldly refreshing vape that's sure to bring some sunshine to your day.
Blue Razz Ice

:

Blue Razz Ice from Geek Bar Pulse X Vape bursts onto the flavor scene with big, fearless flashes of blue raspberry, and finishes like an ice bath in your mouth! A truly refreshing vape experience you’ll never get tired of.
Watermelon Ice:

Beat that summertime heat with Watermelon Ice! This juicy flavor showers you with the refreshing taste of ripe watermelon, with a generous cooling menthol finish. It's a crisp and revitalizing vape that's perfect for summer day sipping and tripping.
Sour Apple Ice:

Get ready to pucker up with Sour Apple Ice and shout, ”Hello taste buds!” It’s time to wake up and cheer up! This extravagant new explosion of sour green apples with a chilled shot of menthol delivers an exhilarating vape to savor over and over again.
Blackberry B Pop:

Experience a bold and juicy burst of blackberry with Blackberry B Pop. The pure essence of freshly picked blackberries leaves a perfectly balanced sweet and slightly tart sensation on your palate. Every puff reveals the rich, succulent taste of ripe blackberries, creating a truly indulgent vaping experience.
Grapefruit Refresher

:

The zesty taste of Grapefruit Refresher is one of a kind. This vibrant flavor mixes the slightly bitter notes of fresh grapefruit with a dash of sweetness, for a well rounded citrus delight. It is bursting with revitalizing juicy grapefruit flavor, making it a great choice if you love a crisp and tangy vape.
Lime Berry Orange:
Three hits in one! Lime Berry Orange is a tantalizing flavor fusion that brings the best of citrus and berries together. The zesty tang of lime, mixes well with sweet and juicy berries, topped off with bright, sunny notes of orange. The finish dances on your taste buds, leaving a long burst of fruity goodness behind with every puff.
Lemon Heads -
Brighten your day and wake up those taste buds with
Lemon Heads!
A
fantastic fusion of phenomenally fresh, tart lemons that will pleasantly pucker your senses.
Elevate your vaping experience and move to the front of the pack, with the Geek Bar Pulse X 25000 vape device. With its innovative features and advanced technology, it's your perfect companion, especially if you are seeking convenience, performance, and style. Get yours today.

all_text:
RAZ DC25000 Disposable Vape | 25k Puffs
[]
RAZ DC25000 Disposable Vape | 25k Puffs

Finally the ultimate in convenience and vaping satisfaction has arrived with the
Raz DC25000 Disposable Vape / 25K Puffs
. This brilliant vaping product takes hassle-free vaping to a new level. It’s a phenomenal portable solution for vape lovers of any experience level. Featuring a sleek, ergonomic design, long-lasting battery and tons of delightfully creative e-liquids to choose from, the
Raz Vape
is your perfect choice for busy people anytime, anywhere.
:

High Puff Capacity
:

Enjoy up to 25000 puffs of flavorful vapor with the Raz DC25K Disposable Vape, ensuring extended vaping sessions without the need for frequent replacements. Who has time for refills anyway?
Pre-filled Premium E-liquid
:

All
Raz Vapes
come prefilled with irresistible tasting premium e-liquids that are available in a massive range of delectable flavors designed to suit the taste preferences of everyone.
No Excess Charging or Refilling Required
:

One of the most popular aspects of the Raz DC25000 Disposable Vape is that it requires no excess charging or refilling. You’ll love the freedom of a hassle-free, convenient vaping every time you indulge.
Portable & Compact
:

Its compact and lightweight design is all the rave! The Raz DC25000 Disposable Vape is perfect for busy vapers, and fits easily in your pocket, purse and your hand for discreet vaping wherever you are.
Dependable Vapor Production
:

Equipped with advanced powerful mesh coil technology, the Raz DC25000 Disposable Vape delivers smooth vapor production from start to finish. You can depend on incredibly satisfying vape experiences with every puff.
Disposable Design
:

Please dispose of your Raz DC25000 Disposable Vape responsibly once you are finished with it. Once again… there is no need for maintenance or cleaning. See ya!
Wide Choice of Flavors
:

Choose from a creative and numerous selection of delicious vape flavors, including tobacco versions, fruit, menthol and sweet dessert choices too. There is something for everyone with Raz DC25000 Vape Flavors.
Nicotine Strength Option
s:

Choose your personal preferred nicotine strength! Customize your vaping experience with several options available, all created to accommodate new and experienced vapers alike.
Safety Features
:

Safety is the focus of the Raz DC25000 Disposable Vape.  Features such as overcharge and short circuit protection ensure you will always enjoy worry-free vaping day in and day out.
Take your vaping experience higher than ever before with the
Raz DC 25000 Puffs Disposable Vape
. Who could ask for more convenience? User-friendly design, long-lasting battery, and flavorful e-liquid options make this the perfect choice for vapers who seek excellence in every puff. Try the Raz DC25000 Disposable Vape for yourself, and discover the supreme vaping satisfaction you didn’t not know you needed.
:

The flavor profile of Blue Raz Ice features a light touch of menthol, with a mild, perfectly mellow raspberry finish. Its light menthol undertones will keep refreshing your senses all day and night.
Miami Mint
:

Feel the spirit of South Beach, with this fantastic fusion of chilled mint with a hint of tropical fruit. This breezy vape experience will make you feel like you’re cruising the strip along the lively shores of Miami Beach. Welcome to the 305!
Georgia Peach
:

The taste of summer is all yours with Georgia Peach. This fruity blend brings juicy sweet peaches to your vaping sessions. It’s like a stroll through a sun-kissed orchard with every puff.
Watermelon Ice
:

This mouthwatering choice combines the taste of ripe watermelon with a pinch of icy menthol.
It’s a juice filled watermelon fiesta at the peak of its ripeness, bathed in the perfect amount of menthol that delivers that frozen finish so many crave.
Night Crawler
: Get a Nightlife! Immerse yourself in the delightful darkness of Night Crawler by RAZ DC 25000. This mysterious flavor blend combines deep, rich pungency with just a touch of sweetness, creating a mystifying nighttime (or daytime) vaping experience!
Blueberry Watermelon
: Blueberry Watermelon by RAZ DC 25000 is a refreshing palate pleaser. Juicy watermelon mixes it up with ripe blueberries for a burst of fruity flavor that will activate your taste buds with every puff.
Raspberry Limeade
: It’s thirst quenching time with Raspberry Limeade by RAZ DC 25000. Tangy raspberries are emulsified into slightly sweetened lime juice, creating a refreshing and invigorating vaping experience that will leave you saying,”How did they do that?”
Cherry Strapple:
“Strapple” this delightful blend on for size! The clever combination of juicy cherries with crisp apples hits differently, with a burst of fruity flavor that will awaken and rejuvenate your senses.
Sour Apple Watermelon
: A solid punch of Sour Apple Watermelon by RAZ DC 25000 your palate will love. Tart green apples smash up with sweet watermelon, creating a climactic combination of flavors that leave your taste buds tingling every time.
Iced Blue Dragon
: Cool your jets with Iced Blue Dragon by RAZ DC 25000. This frosty combo features the taste of wild mountain blueberries and exotic dragon fruit, menthol twist at the end that will electrify your senses.
Sour Watermelon Peach
: Bring a sour flavor explosion to your day with Sour Watermelon Peach by RAZ DC 25000. Watermelon and juicy peaches get it all together in this bombastic blend, for a burst of interesting flavors that leave you happily craving much more.
Wintergreen
: Embracing the cool of winter’s crisp taste is so easy with Wintergreen by RAZ DC 25000. This savory winter flavor combines minty freshness with a pinch of sweetness, creating a satisfying vaping experience that leaves you feeling invigorated.
Bangin Sour Berries
: Time to get bangin’ with the flavor detonation of Bangin Sour Berries by RAZ DC 25000. Tart berries blast off with a sour twist, creating a bold and vibrant vaping experience that will awaken your sleepy taste buds.
Strawberry Burst
: It’s delightfully juicy! The sweet allure of Strawberry Burst by RAZ DC 25000 is undeniable. Ripe strawberries literally burst with flavor in this terrific blend, for a taste of summer’s strawberry fields with every puff.
Strawberry Orange Tang
: Expect a surprising burst of citrus with Strawberry Orange Tang by RAZ DC 25000. Tangy Florida oranges blend with garden fresh strawberries that make every day with this flavor brighter!
Mango Loco -
It’s a tropical frenzy of mango flavor with RAZ DC25K's Mango Loco. This one bursts with the rich, juicy sweetness of perfectly ripened mangoes for a crazy good, exotic vaping experience that's as festive as a summer fiesta.
Strawberry Kiwi Pear -
This magical blend of succulent strawberries, tangy kiwis, and crisp pears makes Strawberry Kiwi Pear an instant classic. It’s pure refreshment, as this tasty trio delivers a sweet-tart flavor that does a jig on your taste buds with every puff.
Rainbow Rain -
Take a walk in a colorful explosion of Rainbow Rain! Fruitful flavors rule in this delightful mix, capturing the essence of a fruit-flavored candy medley you’ll love. It’s a sweet and tangy rainbow of taste that will brighten up your vaping experience.
Frozen Juicy Strawberry
- Experience the icy sweet sensation of Frozen Juicy Strawberry, where sun-ripened strawberries meet a rejuvenating menthol breeze. This blend creates the essence of freshly picked country strawberries, for a savory journey that's perfect for any time of day.
Tobacco
- The classic, robust taste of Tobacco is what this one is all about.
It’s a rich, earthy blend that brings the traditionally familiar taste of tobacco to your vape sessions. It has a smooth and full-bodied profile, making it perfect for those who appreciate the timelessness of a genuine tobacco experience.
Clear
- Behold the simplicity of Clear, a pure, unadulterated version that lets you enjoy the essence of clean, invigorating vapor without the addition of flavors. This option is often the choice
for those who prefer a straightforward, smooth and subtle experience.
Frozen Cherry Apple
- The crisp fusion of tart cherries and juicy apples is phenomenal with Frozen Cherry Apple from
RAZ DC 25K
! It’s a frosted twist on two classic fruit flavors. The cool menthol finish enhances the delightfully tangy notes, creating a satisfying fusion that's both refreshing and flavorful.
Frozen Banana
-The name Frozen Banana says it all! This flavor hits you with the creamy sweetness of ripe bananas with an exciting icy touch. This smooth and frigid blend perfectly captures the comforting taste of bananas, highlighted by the cool menthol finish that adds an eye opening
twist to this familiar favorite.

all_text:
RAZ Vape TN9000 Disposable
[]
RAZ Vape with Battery Indicator, 5% Nicotine

Introducing the RAZ TN9000 by - a vaping experience like no other. This innovative device is equipped with a high-definition screen, customizable airflow, and an astonishing 9000 puffs per charge, transporting you to a vaping future that feels straight out of the year 3000.
Strawberry Ice:

Enjoy the sweetness of ripe red strawberries combined with an
energizing blast of icy coolness. It’s so berry cool!
Blue Razz Ice:

A happy fusion of tart blue raspberries and iced menthol, for a
frosty, berry-filled vape experience to remember.
Triple Berry Ice:

Find yourself immersed in a medley of luscious berries,
including succulent strawberries and juicy blueberries, all dipped in a frosty chill.
Dragon Fruit Lemonade:

A tropical cyclone of exotic dragon fruit supercharged with lemonade, for a tantalizing vaping sensation.
Cactus Jack:

Each puff is full of the unique flavor of cactus, delivering a refreshingly unconventional prickly vaping encounter.
Miami Mint:

It’s a Magic City Puff Party, featuring a cool minty South Beach breeze that's perfect for those seeking a hip mint-flavored vape.
Night Crawler:

Dive into this mysterious vape blend, offering a rich, deep flavor profile that will keep you intrigued puff after puff.
Experience the tangy allure of this fruity vape blend, featuring a tantalizing mix of sourness and tartness.
Strawberry Shortcake:

This classic dessert experience in vapor form features sweet strawberries and creamy cake layers that blend together for a perfectly delectable treat.
Cherry Lemon:

It’s time to enjoy tart cherries and zingy lemon simultaneously in this vibrant and mouth watering vape.
Graham Twist:

The comforting aroma and taste of sweet graham cracker crust, makes for a comforting and indulgent vape.
Blueberry Watermelon:

A delightful combo of ripe mountain blueberries and juicy garden fresh watermelon that delivers a super fruity vape fusion.
Mango Colada:

The luscious taste of mango meets creamy coconut, reminiscent of a pina colada in paradise.
Citronnade:

A zesty lemonade taste with an added blast of citrusy goodness. You’ll love its vibrant and thirst-quenching flavor profile.
Grape Ice:

You have to try this frozen grape sensation, drenched in a cool menthol breeze for a memorable vape experience.
Polar Ice:

You’ll feel like you are on top of the world with this pure menthol delight! It’s an intensely icy sensation that's perfect for those who search for that arctic blast.
Watermelon Ice:

Jump into the juicy natural sweetness of sun ripened watermelon enhanced with a chilled menthol finish. This revitalizing and fruity vape could easily become your favorite.
Banana Coconut:
Indulge in the tropical paradise of Banana Coconut, where the sweet, creamy notes of ripe bananas blend seamlessly with the luscious, exotic essence of coconut.
Blue Raz Cotton Clouds:
Immerse yourself in the whimsical world of Blue Raz Cotton Clouds, a delightful concoction that captures the essence of plump blue raspberries. This vape offers a burst of tangy sweetness reminiscent of your favorite blue raspberry candy, all enveloped in the airy fluffiness of cotton candy.
Orange Raspberry:
Experience the vibrant fusion of citrus and berry with Orange Raspberry, a flavor symphony that marries the zesty kick of ripe oranges with the juicy succulence of tart raspberries.
Peach Grapefruit:
Peach Grapefruit is a delightful combination of sweet ripe peaches and savory grapefruit, for a balanced fruit-filled vape vibe.
Pineapple Passionfruit Guava:
Take a tropical vape escape with Pineapple Passionfruit Guava! This bright blend of exotically intertwined fruit delivers a burst of sunshine. You’ll love the sweet, tart, and aromatic notes of this paradise-inspired vape.
Tobacco:
The timeless sophistication of Tobacco is yours! The rich, robust flavor of this vape features deep, smoky notes of fine, aged tobacco leaves, giving you a super satisfying vaping experience.
White Gummy Watermelon:
White Gummy Watermelon brings a playful twist on tasty fresh watermelon with the sweetness of white gummy candies too! This whimsically fruity vape captures the essence of summer days and nights gone by.
Clear:
The Clear vape flavor provides a lighter menthol taste with every puff. This essentially flavorless vape is just the ticket for adult vapers that enjoy no added sweetness. Finally, the satisfying light menthol kick on the finish provides a straightforward and unadulterated vaping experience.
Georgia Peach:
This vape delivers the natural flavor of sun-kissed, tree ripened Georgia peaches straight from the orchard. This flavor profile is sweet and juicy, so you can revel in the warmth and comfort of a Southern summer day with each puff.
Sour Mango Pineapple

:
You will dig the smooth and delicious pineapple flavor and sour punch of mango goodness from the first taste. Enjoy this refreshing combo all day and all night.
Black Cherry Peach:

Hold the essence of black cherries and ripe peaches in your hand as you enjoy the sweet and tart flavor explosion! It’s peachy!
Tropical Storm (Cherry Lime Grapefruit):

A flashy blast of flavor with every puff. Once discovered this “soft drink” flavor created a “tropical storm” of popularity. Best of all? No calories!
*Seasonal Flavor Limited Time* Apple Cinnamon
-
The comforting warmth of cinnamon with the crispness of sweet ripe apples, makes for a flavorful vape that evokes the appealing aroma of freshly baked apple and cinnamon muffins. If you are seeking a delightful balance of spice and fruit, this is the one.
*Seasonal Flavor Limited Time* Pumpkin
- This vape captures the spirit of fall with its earthy pumpkin flavor. Expect a smooth and velvety vape that brings the warmth of the Autumn season directly to your palate.
650mAh Type-C rechargeable battery (not included)
0.96" HD Display Screen with E-Liquid and Battery Indicators
Adjustable Airflow
9000 Puffs
5% (50MG) Nicotine
12mL pre-filled tank
Overcharging Protection Mechanisms

Air Bar Diamond Box 20000 Puffs Disposable Vape
[]
Air Bar Diamond Box 20000 Puffs Disposable Vape

The future of vaping is now! Experience the ultimate in vaping luxury with the Air Bar Diamond Box 20000 Puffs Vape. Meticulously engineered for those vapers who seek only the best, this stylish device combines cutting-edge technology with exquisite design for a vaping experience described as “out of this world”. From its big quality construction to its awe-inspiring performance, the Air Bar Diamond Box Disposable Vape displays the epitome of sophistication.
Diamond-Inspired Design
: Inspired by the brilliance and elegance of diamonds, the Air Bar Diamond Box Vape features a stunning design that exudes luxury and style. The
3D diamond textured body is definitely eye candy, but it also gives you a comfortable and firm grip.
Long-Lasting Battery & Puff Count:
Equipped with a high-capacity battery, the Air Bar Diamond Box Vape ensures long-lasting performance, allowing you to enjoy extended vaping sessions without the need for frequent recharging.
With up to 20,000 puffs in Regular Mode and 10,000 puffs in Boost Mode, the Air Bar Diamond Box offers incredible longevity.
Pre-Filled with Multiple Flavor Options:
You get
25mL of pre-filled e-liquid, touting a robust 5% nicotine strength for the ultimate vape satisfaction.
Explore a wide range of creative flavors to suit your fancy, including fruit flavored, icy menthol and lots of others in between.
User-Friendly -
The
Air Bar Diamond Box Vape is incredibly easy to use, making it perfect for all vape lovers, new or old. Just insert a pod, take a hit and enjoy the smooth and flavorful vapor that this device easily produces.

all_text:
Solaris Vape
[]
Solaris Vape

Step right into the future of vaping with the
Solaris 18ML 25K Puffs
device
.
It’s a revolutionary vape engineered for those who prefer innovation, convenience, and an unmatched vaping experience. The Solaris device combines super modern technology with some totally impressive features, making it a VIP choice in today’s vaping market. With a gigantic 25,000 puff capacity and a large 18ml e-liquid reservoir, this baby ensures you’ll be cranking out some long-lasting and enjoyable vape sessions.. The Solaris also boasts unique features like solar charging, a built in star light glow, and a triple animation HD screen. The
Solaris 18ML 25K Puffs Solar
is setting a new standard for disposable vape devices.
Solaris Vape

Solaris

18ML 25K Puffs Device is where cutting-edge technology meets the very best in convenience and fashionable style. Enjoy the ultimate in vaping innovation today and in the future.
Flavors for
Solaris Vape:
Banana Coconut
- The silky combo of Banana and Coconut will bring you to your own private paradise. This exotic flavor mix features creamy ripe bananas with the fragrant, nutty notes of freshly shaved coconut, for a lush vape taste of the tropics.
Blue Cotton Candy
- If you are looking for a whimsical, fun flavor, the sweetness of Blue Cotton Candy is for you. This flavor captures the sugary, airy essence of carnival spun cotton candy with a touch of blue raspberry. It’s a nostalgic vaping journey that's as sweet as spending the day at the county fair.
Blue Razz
- Dive right into pleasure! The tangy and sweet flavor of Blue Razz combines a juicy burst of ripe blueberries along with a tart raspberry twist, for a well balanced and totally refreshing vape that will keep you coming back for more time and time again.
Cherry Bomb
- Experience a detonation of bombastic flavor with the Cherry Bomb. This bold, vibrant vape blasts the rich, succulent taste of ripe Bing cherries with a dash of tartness, and provides an explosive mouth-watering experience.
Peach Berries
- Savor this creative blend of juicy peaches and mixed berries with Peach Berries. The perfect balance of ripe peaches and tangy berries delivers a refreshingly fruity vape that’s both vibrant and satisfying.
Sour Apple
- The crisp, tangy sensation of Sour Apple is here. This great flavor captures the true essence of tart green apples with a natural sweetness, offering invigorating vape sessions that will tantalize your taste buds.

all_text:
Lost Mary MO5000 Vape
[]
This e-liquid disposable vape device is specifically designed to meet the needs of those looking for an easy and convenient vaping experience. Featuring a high-capacity 13.5ml e-liquid tank, it can deliver around 5000 puffs before needing a refill. Additionally, its rechargeable 500mAh battery can keep up with even the most power-hungry vapers without any difficulty. Furthermore, it uses a modern mesh coil technology that heats the e-liquid more evenly than traditional coils, resulting in more flavorful hits every time. On top of that, the juice inside comes in 50mg (5 percent) strength, allowing for an intense yet smooth throat hit.
E-liquid capacity: 13.5ml5000 puffs approx.500mAh rechargeable batteryMesh coil50mg (5%) strengthUSB-C charger not included
The Lost Mary Vape by Elf Bar MO5000 is the perfect vape pen for experienced and beginner users alike. It offers an easy-to-use device with premium construction that packs a punch in terms of performance. This disposable vape is powered by a 650mAh battery, giving it plenty of battery life for a full day of use. The 13ml capacity is more than enough for most average vapers and should offer hours of vaping enjoyment. The mesh coils provide intense flavor profiles, ensuring every puff tastes great.
Additionally, this vape device has a cool battery indicator system featuring LED colors that make it easy to tell when the battery levels are high, medium, or low. This helps you accurately estimate how much power is left in the device so you don't find yourself stranded without any juice in your tank at a critical time. All these great features come within an eye-catching shell that looks stylish and prestigious, making the Lost Mary Vape by Elf Bar MO5000 the perfect choice for people who vape and are searching for optimum performance and convenience in one package.

all_text:
Again U-Bar 7000 Puff 3% Vape
[]
Again U-Bar 7000 Puff 3% Vape

If you’re looking for an unbeatable vaping experience, then the Again U-Bar Vape is one to look at. This vape device comes with an impressive 580mAh battery capacity that allows for up to 7000 puffs without needing to recharge – perfect if you need a reliable vape all week long! The 14ml juice capacity holds enough liquid to enjoy your favorite flavors throughout the day or several days. With 12 flavor options available, like chocolate mint and nougat, mixing up your vape session is easy. Along with its powerful performance, it maintains a sleek and compact design that's perfect for taking out wherever you go.
The Again U-Bar Vape wasn’t only designed for convenience and portability. Its advanced technology also promises a smooth draw that delivers flavorful clouds with each puff. As if that wasn’t enough, the device also includes variable wattage control to adjust the vaping intensity according to your preference. Overall, the Again U-Bar Vape is one of the best choices for people looking for a top-of-the-line vaping experience that won’t disappoint them.
Check Out The Vape Flavors Available from White Horse Vapor:
Chocolate Mint:

This delectable flavor combines rich chocolate with the bright taste of mint, providing an invigorating vaping experience.
Nougat:

This vape flavor is inspired by a classic candy. It offers a creamy and nutty taste that is both sweet and super satisfying.
Ice Mint:

Enjoy the cooling sensation, blending a crisp mint flavor with a chilly blast of ice you won’t soon forget.
Salty Lemon:

Vaping “outside the box” with this flavor! It combines the fresh tart taste of lemon with a hint of saltiness, creating a 100% unique vaping experience.
Cherry Grape:

The sweet and juicy flavors of ripe cherries and grapes deliver a delightful fruity taste that is terrific.
Watermelon Strawberry:

A thirst-quenching blast of juicy watermelon and sweet strawberries hits you straight away, providing a summertime vape experience.
Apple Orange:

A luscious blending of orchard apples and navel oranges that delivers a fruit lover's dream vape.
Skittles:   This vape flavor mimics the famous candy we all love, boasting a burst of sweet fruity flavors that will keep you coming back for more.
Triple Mango:
This big mango flavor is the #1 choice for mango lovers! A triple huge dose of this famous tropical fruit's juicy and sweet taste is waiting for you.
Strawberry Yogurt Ice:
Combining the creamy taste of yogurt with the sweetness of vine-ripened strawberries. A smooth strawberry yogurt vaping experience with a hint of ice.
Pineapple Coconut:
The tropical blend of juicy pineapples and creamy coconut is the bomb, transporting you to a sunny island paradise with every puff.
Caramel Coke:

This classic taste of caramel, with the fizzy and refreshing flavor of Coca-Cola, provides a satisfying effervescent vape experience.
Strawberry Coconut
: This dreamy blend combines the sweet essence of garden-fresh strawberries with creamy rich coconut. It creates a smooth and exotic vaping experience that will have you thinking of sun-kissed beaches and swaying palm trees.
Banana Strawberry
: A truly irresistible fruit fusion that pairs the natural sweetness of ripe bananas with the juicy tartness of fresh picked strawberries. It’s a harmonious and rejuvenating vaping sensation that will have you reaching for more.

all_text:
Lost Mary OS5000 Vape
[]
This e-cigarette liquid is a great choice for those looking to enjoy vaping with a long-lasting bottle. Featuring a 13ml capacity and up to 5000 estimated puffs, your device will last you significantly longer than other liquids currently on the market. The 650mAh rechargeable battery is incredibly powerful and performs excellently with every puff. Furthermore, the mesh coil helps evenly distribute heat through the device, so you experience a more robust flavor from each puff. And, of course, this e-liquid comes in 50mg (5%) strength for a reliable performance every time. It should be noted that this product does not include a USB-C charger, which must be purchased separately, making it important you check compatibility before purchasing one.

This e-liquid offers great value for money and excellent features that make it ideal for any vaper. The 13ml bottle and high-capacity rechargeable battery make it perfect for long trips or extended sessions while also lasting longer than most other options on the market. The powerful mesh coil ensures even heat distribution throughout each puff and makes for delightful flavor in each draw of vapor too! Lastly, with 5% strength available, you can count on consistent quality no matter how often you vape.E-liquid capacity: 13ml5000 puffs approx.650mAh rechargeable batteryMesh coil50mg (5%) strengthUSB-C charger not included
The Lost Mary Elf Bar OS5000 Puff Disposable Vape is a remarkable piece of engineering, packing performance, and style into one neat package. Featuring a candy-shell and flagon design, with 37 vibrant flavors to choose from, it’s the perfect choice for both casual and advanced vapers alike. The OS5000 offers an impressive 5000-puff lifespan, so you don’t have to worry about constantly running out of juice. To top it off, the device is equipped with a battery indicator that changes color to signify charge level – green (high), blue (medium), or red (low) – meaning you can always make sure your device is adequately charged before hitting it. In addition, it can be recharged with a standard USB-C cable if your battery does run low. Altogether this vape has made its mark in the vaping market, appealing to all types of users due to its versatility and efficiency.
White Horse Vapor offers excellent customer service and free shipping for orders over $59. They also have a wide selection of vape products available for immediate shipment. Take a look at the extensive collection and consider joining the VapeWH community.

Grapefruit Berries | Lost Mary MT15000 Turbo
[]
High Puff Capacity: Enjoying up to 15000 puffs of flavorful vapor is awesome! The Lost Mary MT15000 Turbo Vape offers you extended vaping sessions without the need for frequent replacements.Wide Range of Flavors: Choose from some of the most creative and delicious flavors, including fruity, menthol, and dessert-inspired blends. Lost Mary Turbo Flavors were created to suit your taste preferences and cravings.Disposable: Say “see ya later” to messy refills and difficult setup instructions. The Lost Mary MT15000 Turbo Vape comes pre-filled and disposable, making it the sensible choice for busy vapers who require convenience without ever compromising on flavor or dependable performance.Compact and Portable: Designed for today’s busy vapers, the Lost Mary MT15000 Turbo Vape is compact and lightweight for discreet carrying in your pocket or purse. Vape with confidence wherever you are!Maintenance Free: With no buttons, coils, or settings to adjust, the Lost Mary MT15000 Turbo Vape is super easy to use. Open the box, pull it out and inhale to activate and start enjoying satisfying vaping experiences every time you puff.Modern Design: Check out the genius-inspired contemporary design! The Lost Mary MT15000 Turbo Vape is as cool looking as it is functional, making it a must have accessory for vapers on the move.1 x Lost Mary MT15000 Turbo Vape Device16ml juice reservoir Smooth or Turbo Mode Capability
It’s all about convenience when you are vaping with the
Lost Mary MT15000 Turbo Vape
. If you demand excellence with every puff, this is the perfect vape for you. The Lost Mary Turbo Vape delivers high puff capacity, a wide range of flavors and a user-friendly design allowing you to take your vaping experience to the highest level of satisfaction.
Built to impress with performance and convenience, this advanced vape device brings an impressive 15000-puff capacity to your vape game right out of the box! The Lost Mary MT15000 Turbo never needs refills or recharging. Its modern design, long-lasting high level performance and user-friendly operation makes the Lost Mary MT15000 Turbo Vape the perfect choice for today’s busy vape lovers!

all_text:
Fire Boost 12000 Puff Disposable Vape
[]
Fire Boost 12000 Puff Disposable Vape

It is so easy to elevate your vaping experience with the
Fire Boost 12000 Puff Disposable Vape

, a cutting-edge device designed for today’s users to enjoy unparalleled performance and gratification. Skillfully engineered for maximum power, efficiency and longevity, this stylish vape device offers an awe-inspiring 12000 puffs of full flavor vapor, with the flavors of your choice, ensuring extended usage without the need for annoying refills or even recharging. Fire Boost 12000 Puff Disposable Vape is the perfect companion for all your vaping needs, on the road or just relaxing at home.
Long-lasting Performance
: With a capacity of 12000 puffs, the Fire Boost Vape offers extremely extended usage without the need to refill or recharge. Vapers will appreciate the convenience of hassle-free vaping and freedom that comes with this product.
Sleek and Portable Design
: Featuring an ergonomic design, the Fire Boost Vape is solid, small and lightweight, making it almost effortless to carry wherever you go, and the quintessential choice for vape lovers on the move, whether you're at home, in the office, or out at the club…you’ll be rocking!
Wide Range of Flavors:
Available in an incredible amount of totally delicious flavors, including a variety of fruity flavors, menthol, and even dessert-inspired options, the Fire Boost Vape offers something for everyone!, A satisfying vaping experience is pretty much guaranteed with every puff you take.
Disposable and User-friendly
: With no need for refills or recharging, the Fire Boost Vape offers you freedom with its simplicity, allowing you to enjoy non-stop vaping without thinking about maintenance associated with older, traditional vape devices. It’s time to move forward!
High-quality Construction
: Crafted from durable materials that look cool too, this baby features advanced vaping technology from top to bottom.  The Fire Boost Vape 12000 is constructed to last, giving vapers a reliable and consistent vaping experience that's second to none and tons of fun.

all_text:
Lucid Boost x Yogi
[]
Lucid Boost x Yogi Disposable Vape

The Lucid Boost x Yogi Vape disposable device makes the scene with up to 20,123 puffs and an e-liquid capacity of 18ML, giving you "The Flavor That Keeps on Giving." Rocking dual mesh coils, Boost Mode, and adjustable airflow, the stunning result is a top-notch vaping experience.  The HD animated screen keeps you in the game as it displays real-time e-juice levels and battery life! The draw timer and child safety button add an extra layer that equals peace of mind, and the aerospace aluminum body features super fast USB-C charging. With all the coolest bells and whistles available anywhere, the Lucid Boost is the perfect combination of durability
and next level technology.
Lucid Boost x Yogi Flavors:

Peanut Butter Banana:
The creamy blending of smooth peanut butter and sweet ripe bananas creates a satisfying vape that tastes like a welcome midnight or anytime snack with every puff. Some flavors were meant to be together!
Blueberry Granola:

Dive into Lucid Boost xYogi’s Blueberry Granola, brimming with the sweet and tart flavor of fresh blueberries. There is a perfect balance between the blueberries and the wholesome crunchy sensation of granola, delivering a delightful experience that will immerse you in the simple pleasure of a morning treat.
Java Granola Bar:
One is always better when it is with the other! Enjoy the rich, dark taste of freshly brewed coffee blended with the earthy, natural sweetness of granola. This Lucid Boost x Yogi Flavor makes for an invigorating breakfast bar blastoff.
Vanilla Tobacco Granola:

The one of a kind fusion of Madagascar vanilla, bold Virginia tobacco, mixed with the hearty texture of granola, offers a sophisticated, luxurious vape that's perfect for any time of day. Fill the air around you with the seductive aroma, and watch heads turn!
Up to 20,123 puffs
18ML e-liquid capacity
Dual mesh coils
Boost Mode
Adjustable airflow
HD animated screen
- Displays real-time e-juice levels
- Shows battery life
Draw timer
Child safety button
Super fast USB-C charging
To activate, click the button on the bottom three times
