iJoy Uranus 25K Puffs Disposable Vape
[]
iJoy Uranus 25K Puffs Disposable Vape

The iJoy Uranus 25K Vape Device, the world’s first voice control smart disposable, brings some pop to your vaping adventures! Let’s probe deeper into Uranus and see what they have to offer! It’s a powerhouse of performance and flavor especially designed to cater to both new and long time vapers. Boasting an impressive 25,000 puffs, the iJoy Uranus 25K sets a stunning new standard for disposable vape devices, ensuring a long-lasting and satisfying vaping performance. Featuring a sleek and ergonomic design that brings you exceptional value, convenience, reliability. The big, well-rounded taste of Uranus is astounding. Each puff consistently delivers luxurious flavor, making the iJoy Uranus 25K stand out as an essential choice for vaping enthusiasts who prefer the hottest, latest newest in vape products.
iJoy Uranus 25K
iJoy Uranus 25K Vape

device, where futuristic ingenuity and fantastic flavors rendezvous to deliver an unprecedented vaping experience. All your friends will be impressed when you show Uranus to them!!
Flavors for
iJoy Uranus 25K
Strawberry Ice

-
Jump headfirst into Uranus
, with the icy refreshment of garden fresh strawberries with a “crushed ice” finish. This is a well balanced flavor, bursting with a cold natural sweetness that offers a revitalizing vaping experience.
Watermelon Ice

- Everyone loves the taste of juicy watermelon, especially when it tastes like a freshly frozen smoothie. This energizing flavor hits with a burst of cool summer freshness that’s perfect for a rejuvenating summer vape.
Juice Peach Ice

- Savor the luscious flavor of iJoy 25K’s vape Juicy Peach, loaded with sun-ripened, juicy peaches with a frosty finish. This is a delightful combination that brings a sweet and refreshing vape to your palate, that will remind you of peach sorbet.
Blue Razz Ice

- Mildly sweet raspberry notes, with light creamy undertones. A good pinch of menthol compliments Blue Raz Ice, and keeps refreshing your senses all day. This vibrant flavor delivers a cool and exhilarating vape with an icy exhale.
Miami Mint

- iJoy Uranus 25K
Miami Mint combines the cool draw of South Beach menthol vibe with just the right amount of naturally sweet mint. It’s a crisp and exhilarating vape flavor that’s perfect for hot summer days and suave Miami nights.
Cherry Lemon

- You’ll dig this tangy fusion of ripe cherries cleverly combined with zesty lemons. This flavorful mix brings sweetness and tartness together in a vibrant vape that totally awakens your taste buds and brightens your day.
Sour Berry

- A bold mix of tart and tangy berries is yours, delivered with a mouth-puckering sour punch. This flavor is a great choice for those who crave a fruity, sour vape that excites your palate and revitalizes all your senses .
Dragon Strawnana
- Leave your worries behind as you embark an exotic flavor journey with this one of a kind vape flavor. Dragon fruit, sweet strawberries, and creamy bananas get together for a rich and smooth vaping experience filled with fruity sweetness and a creamy finish.
Apple Gummies
Indulge in the taste of chewy apple gummies with every puff, offering a juicy apple flavor with an appealing candy twist. Each draw delivers a blast of tart and sweet apple flavor, making it the perfect treat any time of day.
Blueberry Watermelon
You have to experience this refreshing blend of ripe blueberries and juicy watermelon, with its perfectly balanced burst of fruity freshness. The sweet, tangy blueberries blend with the refreshing watermelon, for an invigorating vaping experience to remember.
Mexico Mango
The tropical sweetness of Mexico Mango perfectly delivers the rich and succulent taste of this popular fruit. Sun-kissed Mexican mangoes are famous for their smooth and luscious flavors, creating a vaping experience that will transport you to a South of the Border paradise.
Raspberry Limeade
Enjoy a zesty, mouthwatering fusion of bright raspberries and refreshingly tart limeade, providing a well balanced combination of sweet and tart. The vibrant raspberry flavor pairs magically with the citrusy limeade, for a totally revitalizing vape taste.
Strawberry Watermelon
This is a classic combination of juicy, ripe strawberries and juicy watermelon, bringing these two summer favorites together into one delightful flavor. The fusion of sweet strawberries and crisp watermelon create a perfectly balanced, hydrating vape.
Watermelon Kiwi
This is an exotic mixture of ripe watermelon and tangy kiwi, bringing a unique and refreshing flavor to your enjoyment. The sweet watermelon pairs seamlessly with the tart kiwi, resulting in a vibrant and exhilarating vaping experience.
We are sure you’ll be surprised at how delicious Uranus is! The
iJoy Uranus 25K Vape

device is an awesome choice for those seeking high-capacity, flavorful vaping solutions. With its remarkably high puff count, wide array of premium crafted, well-rounded flavors, and user-friendly design it’s definitely a top choice for disposable vapes. You’ll quickly become spoiled by the long, uninterrupted vaping sessions that come with the
iJoy Uranus 25K
, where impressive features and convenience meet big time flavor. Always bring Uranus to parties and group gatherings, because everyone will want to check it out!

all_text:
Raspberry Banana | Lost Mary MT15000 Turbo
[]
High Puff Capacity: Enjoying up to 15000 puffs of flavorful vapor is awesome! The Lost Mary MT15000 Turbo Vape offers you extended vaping sessions without the need for frequent replacements.Wide Range of Flavors: Choose from some of the most creative and delicious flavors, including fruity, menthol, and dessert-inspired blends. Lost Mary Turbo Flavors were created to suit your taste preferences and cravings.Disposable: Say “see ya later” to messy refills and difficult setup instructions. The Lost Mary MT15000 Turbo Vape comes pre-filled and disposable, making it the sensible choice for busy vapers who require convenience without ever compromising on flavor or dependable performance.Compact and Portable: Designed for today’s busy vapers, the Lost Mary MT15000 Turbo Vape is compact and lightweight for discreet carrying in your pocket or purse. Vape with confidence wherever you are!Maintenance Free: With no buttons, coils, or settings to adjust, the Lost Mary MT15000 Turbo Vape is super easy to use. Open the box, pull it out and inhale to activate and start enjoying satisfying vaping experiences every time you puff.Modern Design: Check out the genius-inspired contemporary design! The Lost Mary MT15000 Turbo Vape is as cool looking as it is functional, making it a must have accessory for vapers on the move.1 x Lost Mary MT15000 Turbo Vape Device16ml juice reservoir Smooth or Turbo Mode Capability
It’s all about convenience when you are vaping with the
Lost Mary MT15000 Turbo Vape
. If you demand excellence with every puff, this is the perfect vape for you. The Lost Mary Turbo Vape delivers high puff capacity, a wide range of flavors and a user-friendly design allowing you to take your vaping experience to the highest level of satisfaction.
Built to impress with performance and convenience, this advanced vape device brings an impressive 15000-puff capacity to your vape game right out of the box! The Lost Mary MT15000 Turbo never needs refills or recharging. Its modern design, long-lasting high level performance and user-friendly operation makes the Lost Mary MT15000 Turbo Vape the perfect choice for today’s busy vape lovers!

all_text:
REALIO 2% | Mint | 5000 Real Puffs| Rechargeable
['Mint: Blast off into cool freshness with Mint, for a rejuvenating vape taste that leaves your mouth feeling refreshed and invigorated with every draw.', "Strawberry Banana: It’s all about the sweet sensations of ripened strawberries and delicious bananas, dropping a smooth and fruity vape on your tongue that's satisfying and delectable.", "Strawberry Cool: Strawberry Cool offers a naturally sweetened and perfectly chilled vape experience that's just right for hot summer days and fun party nights.", 'Vanilla Whip: Whip your senses into a creamy frenzy of sweetness with Vanilla Whip! This super smooth and indulgent vape is reminiscent of everyone’s all-time favorite dessert taste…vanilla!', 'Spiced Melon: This is a flavor journey you must try! It is a blend of exotic sweet melon sprinkled with warm spices for a one of a kind satisfying vape experience.', 'Peach Watermelon: Enjoy juicy goodness puff after puff as ripe peaches and refreshing watermelon inundate your taste buds with peach and watermelon flavors. You’ll get a kick from this fusion of fruit flavors created with all-day vaping in mind.', 'Cool Lemon: Quench your thirst with the tart brightness of Florida lemons touched by a subtle cool breeze, for tangy vape sessions that will definitely brighten your day.', "Cool Grapefruit: Wake up your senses with the sharp sweetness of pink grapefruit, infused with a chilled sensation that delivers an invigorating vape that's like a detonation of big flavor in your mouth.", "Cool Grape: This one is bold and juicy, filled with the appealing flavor of grapes! Get busy enjoying this vape experience that's got it all…sweet, fruity, and irresistibly cool."]
Main Device Body: The main structure of the Realio Disposable Vape contains the battery, mesh coil, and the e-liquid reservoir, affording users with a sturdy and dependable foundation for your long time vaping pleasure.Ergonomic Mouthpiece: The ergonomic mouthpiece of the Realio Disposable Vape gives you a comfortable vaping experience, allowing you to effortlessly enjoy every puff possible.E-liquid Reservoir: The pre-filled e-liquid reservoir is loaded with a copious amount of high-quality e-liquid, giving you a flavorful vaping experience without ever having to stop to refill! Mesh Coil Assembly: The mesh coil assembly is the heart of the device, and controls the heating of the e-liquid, turning it into smooth clouds of tasty vapor. Boasting long-lasting durability and unparalleled performance, the mesh coil ensures a consistent vaping experience.LED Indicator Light: The LED indicator light is located on the device body and displays real-time information on the device's battery status strength. Now you get to monitor your vaping sessions with ease.Compact Ergonomic Design: The Realio Disposable Vape features a handy lightweight design that’s perfect for vape lovers who are on-the-go. Slip it into any pocket or your purse for easy access wherever you are.Disposable: Say bye bye to aggravating refills and confusing setups. The Realio Disposable Vape is pre-filled and ready for you to use as soon as you remove it from the box. Long-lasting Battery: Equipped with a powerful high-capacity battery, the Realio Disposable Vape gives you longer lasting vaping sessions without the need for frequent recharging. Uninterrupted vaping pleasure is yours wherever and whenever you need it.Wide Variety of Flavors: Choose from a vast array of delicious flavors specially created to suit your preferences. Whether you're craving something fruity, refreshing, or wildly indulgent, the Realio Disposable Vape has the flavor varieties to satisfy every palate.Smooth Airflow: You’ll revel in smooth, satisfying airflow with every puff, for a consistently enjoyable vaping experience from beginning to end.Puff Count: 5000 - “Real Puffs”
Are you ready for the ultimate solution for vapers seeking convenience, flavor, and performance in one sleek package? Then allow us to Introduce the Realio Disposable VapeCrafted to you! Made with 100% precision and innovation, the Realio Disposable Vape offers a totally hassle-free vaping experience that's a great choice for beginners and seasoned vape enthusiasts alike.

            - **CLOSED REFILL**: Prefilled cartridges or pods that are not refillable after use with volume less than 5 mL.
            - **CLOSED SYSTEM**: A vape device or starter kit that uses replaceable, prefilled pods or cartridges.

all_text:
Raz CA6000 Disposable Vape [6000 Puffs]
[]
Raz CA6000 6000 Puff Disposable Vape

Click for sound
3:06
The Raz CA6000 Disposable from Geek Vape is available in 10 flavors and comes prefilled with 10mL of 5% nicotine eliquid. These attractive vapes feature colorful shells with a comfortable leather grip, battery indicator light, and adjustable airflow to help you find the perfect draw.
Alaskan Mint:

A refreshing and cooling mint flavor vape with hints of spearmint and peppermint, perfect for a brisk Alaskan day or anywhere you live!
Blue Raz:

An electrifying fusion of sweet blueberries and tangy raspberries is here, resulting in a tantalizing berry medley that will leave your taste buds tingling.
Cactus Jack:

Puff on this desert adventure, as exotic cactus intertwines with juicy tropical fruits, unveiling a unique flavor profile that captures the spirit of the Southwest.
Clear:

How about a blank canvas for your senses? Clear offers a pure and untainted vaping experience, allowing you to appreciate the essence of vaping without any added flavors.
Crushed Berries:

A delicious blend of ripe, juicy berries, lovingly crushed to perfection, with a sweet, tangy finish.
Dragon Fruit Lemonade:

A tropical twist on classic lemonade, featuring the exotic mysterious flavor of dragon fruit surrounded with a tart lemon kick.
Frozen Strawberry:

A frosty blend of juicy, sun-ripened strawberries with a chilly, refreshing finish.
Fuji Blue Razz:

The enchanting allure of Fuji apples blended with the captivating essence of blue raspberry, unveils a symphony of crispy sweetness that will transport you to puff paradise.
Fuji Pear:

Crisp, tasty Fuji apples blend seamlessly with juicy pears, for a truly harmonious fruit fusion that is so satisfying.
Georgia Peach:

Sweet and juicy peaches straight from the peach state, with a bright and sunny flavor that will make you feel like you're sitting in a Georgia orchard as you puff.
Hawaii Sunset:

A tropical dream vape, with a sweet blend of juicy pineapple, tangy mango, and refreshing citrus flavors.
Lemon Lime:

Fall into the zesty embrace of tangy lemons and juicy limes, so happy together creating a citrus explosion that will tease your brain.
Mango Mania:

A frenzy of tropical delights hits your taste buds, as ripe mangos take center stage with this juicy vape experience.
Miami Mint:

The tropical breeze of Miami comes through with every puff with this mint-infused flavor! It’s a refreshingly cool sensation that's perfect for a laid-back vape-cation!
Peach Pear:

A perfect pairing of sweet and juicy peaches with luscious pears, creating a well balanced and fruity flavor puff profile.
Pom Pom Raz:

Delight in the succulent essence of ripe pomegranates with fresh raspberries, creating a big fruit flavor that will leave your palate smiling.
Spearmint:

A classic and timeless flavor that boasts the cool and refreshing taste of real spearmint leaves.
Strawberry Kiwi:

A delightful blend of ripe, juicy strawberries with the sprite and refreshing flavor of kiwi fruit.
Strazz:

Taste the dancing strawberries and zesty raspberries in this playful flavor, resulting in a tantalizingly tangy and subtly sweet vape.
Tobacco:

Treat yourself to the rich and robust taste of a classic tobacco vape! Smoky undertones and velvety smoothness captures the timeless allure of traditional tobacco leaves. This one is sure to satisfy even the most discerning tobacco enthusiasts with its full-bodied, comforting aroma.
Watermelon Ice:

A juice bomb of sweet watermelon flavor with a cool and refreshing menthol finish, perfect for a hot summer day.
6000 Puffs per Disposable
10ml Pre-Filled eLiquid
5% (50mg) Nicotine Strength
650mAh USB-C Rechargeable Battery
Premium Mesh Coil
Adjustable air flow
Battery and eLiquid indicator lights
Leather grip
Lanyard

all_text:
REALIO Dessert Vape 2%,5%
[]
REALIO Dessert Disposable Vape (2%) (5%)

The Realio Dessert Disposable Vape offers a delightful selection of dessert-inspired flavors all packed into a conveniently portable vaping device. With high quality and terrific flavors in mind, the Realio Dessert Disposable Vape offers a vaping experience that allows the user to forget about the hassle of refilling or recharging.
Device Body
: The main body of the Realio Dessert Disposable Vape houses the battery, coil assembly, and e-liquid reservoir. Its slick, stylized design fits in your hand like a dream, for easy, on the go vaping.
Mouthpiece
: Once you experience the feel of the Realio Dessert Disposable Vape’s mouthpiece, you’ll recognize it was designed for maximum comfort and enjoyment. It allows you to fully enjoy the rich flavors of your favorite dessert selections with every draw.
Pre-filled E-liquid Reservoir
: Each Realio Dessert Disposable Vape comes pre-filled with a generous amount of high-quality e-liquid, ensuring a consistent and flavorful vaping experience from the first puff to the last. Filled in the USA!
Mesh Coil Assembly
: The mesh coil assembly of the Realio Dessert Disposable Vape heats the e-liquid, vaporizing it into smooth, luxurious clouds of vapor. The coil assembly delivers consistent performance and flavor due to its solid construction and well-thought-out design.
LED Indicator Light & E-Liquid Display
: A built-in LED indicator light on the device body provides real-time feedback on the battery status, allowing you to monitor your vaping sessions and ensure you never run out of power unexpectedly. You can also monitor your level of e-liquid via a display.
All flavors are available in 2% and 5%
USBC Charging Port (Charger not included)
Mesh Coil
7000 Puff Count

all_text:
Skittles Again U-Bar 7000 Puff 3% Vape
[]
Again U-Bar 7000 Puff 3% Vape

If you’re looking for an unbeatable vaping experience, then the Again U-Bar Vape is one to look at. This vape device comes with an impressive 580mAh battery capacity that allows for up to 7000 puffs without needing to recharge – perfect if you need a reliable vape all week long! The 14ml juice capacity holds enough liquid to enjoy your favorite flavors throughout the day or several days. With 12 flavor options available, like chocolate mint and nougat, mixing up your vape session is easy. Along with its powerful performance, it maintains a sleek and compact design that's perfect for taking out wherever you go.
The Again U-Bar Vape wasn’t only designed for convenience and portability. Its advanced technology also promises a smooth draw that delivers flavorful clouds with each puff. As if that wasn’t enough, the device also includes variable wattage control to adjust the vaping intensity according to your preference. Overall, the Again U-Bar Vape is one of the best choices for people looking for a top-of-the-line vaping experience that won’t disappoint them.
Check Out The Vape Flavors Available from White Horse Vapor:
Chocolate Mint:

This delectable flavor combines rich chocolate with the bright taste of mint, providing an invigorating vaping experience.
Nougat:

This vape flavor is inspired by a classic candy. It offers a creamy and nutty taste that is both sweet and super satisfying.
Ice Mint:

Enjoy the cooling sensation, blending a crisp mint flavor with a chilly blast of ice you won’t soon forget.
Salty Lemon:

Vaping “outside the box” with this flavor! It combines the fresh tart taste of lemon with a hint of saltiness, creating a 100% unique vaping experience.
Cherry Grape:

The sweet and juicy flavors of ripe cherries and grapes deliver a delightful fruity taste that is terrific.
Watermelon Strawberry:

A thirst-quenching blast of juicy watermelon and sweet strawberries hits you straight away, providing a summertime vape experience.
Apple Orange:

A luscious blending of orchard apples and navel oranges that delivers a fruit lover's dream vape.
Skittles:   This vape flavor mimics the famous candy we all love, boasting a burst of sweet fruity flavors that will keep you coming back for more.
Triple Mango:
This big mango flavor is the #1 choice for mango lovers! A triple huge dose of this famous tropical fruit's juicy and sweet taste is waiting for you.
Strawberry Yogurt Ice:
Combining the creamy taste of yogurt with the sweetness of vine-ripened strawberries. A smooth strawberry yogurt vaping experience with a hint of ice.
Pineapple Coconut:
The tropical blend of juicy pineapples and creamy coconut is the bomb, transporting you to a sunny island paradise with every puff.
Caramel Coke:

This classic taste of caramel, with the fizzy and refreshing flavor of Coca-Cola, provides a satisfying effervescent vape experience.
Strawberry Coconut
: This dreamy blend combines the sweet essence of garden-fresh strawberries with creamy rich coconut. It creates a smooth and exotic vaping experience that will have you thinking of sun-kissed beaches and swaying palm trees.
Banana Strawberry
: A truly irresistible fruit fusion that pairs the natural sweetness of ripe bananas with the juicy tartness of fresh picked strawberries. It’s a harmonious and rejuvenating vaping sensation that will have you reaching for more.

all_text:
Lost Mary MO20000 Pro Disposable Vape - 20,000 Puffs, 5% Nicotine
[]
Lost Mary MO20000 Pro Disposable Vape - 20,000 Puffs, 5% Nicotine
Lost Mary MO20000 Pro Vape
has been found! This cutting-edge vaping device combines innovation, style, and high performance, taking your vaping game to the limit. Manufactured with precision engineering and only premium materials, this device is designed to meet the needs of new and long time vapers alike. Let's dig further into the key features that make the Lost Mary MO20000 Pro Vape stand out on today’s very crowded landscape of vaping devices:
High-Capacity Battery

:

This EBDesign Vape comes with a powerful 20000mAh built-in battery. This allows Lost Mary MO20000 Pro Vape to bring you extended vaping sessions every day, without the need for frequent recharging. Forget about low battery anxiety and enjoy uninterrupted vaping pleasure from now on.
Large E-liquid Capacity

:

With an 18 ml e-liquid capacity reservoir, Lost Mary by EBDesign vape has solved the hassle of constant refills! Vape non-stop to your heart's content! Casual vapers and cloud-chasing aficionados will agree… the generous e-liquid capacity of the Lost Mary MO20000 Pro ensures a satisfying vaping experience time and time again.
Adjustable Wattage Control

:

Dial up your own vaping strength to satisfy your personal preferences, with the Lost Mary MO20000 Pro's adjustable wattage control feature. By adjusting the wattage output, you can modify vapor production and flavor intensity any time you want, giving you full control over your vaping experience.
Intuitive OLED Display

:

Stay informed and in control with the Lost Mary MO20000 Pro's intuitive OLED display screen. Effortlessly monitor battery life, custom wattage settings, coil resistance, and more all at a glance. Real-time feedback for today’s vape enthusiasts seeking optimized vaping experiences only.
Creative Construction

: Built to withstand the rigors of frequent daily use, the Lost Mary MO20000 Pro Vape features durable construction that gives you confidence, long-lasting pleasure and perfect performance. From its sturdy chassis to its high-quality components, every aspect of this device has been created for reliability and durability.
Safety Protections

:

Thanks to the Lost Mary MO20000 Pro's comprehensive safety features, you can enjoy peace of mind while you indulge. Built-in protection includes overcharge protection, short circuit protection and even low voltage protection. A safe and enjoyable vaping experience is yours with every puff.
USB-C Charging Convenience

:

It’s all about fast and convenient charging action with the Lost Mary MO20000 Pro's USB-C charging port. You’ll be amazed by the rapid charging times, as you start spending less time waiting around and more time vaping.
Blue Razz Ice

: Prepare yourself for an exhilarating journey with Blue Razz Ice.
An attention grabbing concoction of flavors that recreates classic blue raspberry taste, enhanced by an ice-cold menthol finish on the exhale. Take a Blue Razz trip today!
Dragon Drink

: Vape your way on a mystical adventure with EBDesign’s Dragon Drink vape flavor. This magical vape captures the taste of exotic dragon fruit, mixing its unique sweetness with a dash of tropical goodness. Feel the unbridled energy of the dragon as it titillates your taste buds, leaving you craving more.
Miami Mint

:

Finally a flavor that’s as cool as you!
Now you can get a Miami nightlife, while enjoying the refreshingly light menthol sensation this EB Design vape flavor delivers! Taste South Beach tropical freshness like a native, and make your own clouds too!
Pineapple Ice

: Juicy golden pineapple is where it’s at! This island favorite is infused with a frigid blast of menthol, making for a refreshing and unique vape experience. Each puff is like sipping on a frozen pineapple cocktail on the beach, leaving you with a feeling of cool rejuvenation.
Rainbow Sherbet

:

A melange of tangy citrus fruits and naturally sweet berries bring a burst of vibrant flavor to each pleasurable puff! Think rainbow-colored sherbet! You’ll also enjoy thinking back to some of your favorite childhood frozen treats packed into each draw.
Rocket Popsicle

:

Take a little trip down memory lane with Rocket Popsicle. The sweet, tangy taste of cherry, blue raspberry, and lemon, just like that iconic red, white, and blue popsicle we all remember and loved. Let the flavors of summer swim around on your palate, leaving you feeling chilled and thrilled.
Watermelon Ice

:

This one tastes like ice-cold watermelon on a hot summer day, pure and simple. It refreshes puff after puff with a generous amount of mouthwatering watermelon flavor. A good sized dose of ice-cold menthol comes in on the finish, creating a tasty cool vape of the highest quality.
Your vaping experiences will enjoy new boundaries of pleasure with the Lost Mary MO20000 Pro Vape. Power, performance, and style converge to create a totally exceptional vaping device.
Whether you're a vaping veteran or just dipping your toes into the vape scene, the Lost Mary MO20000 Pro Vape has got your back for vaping experiences that are off the charts.

This EBDesign Vape comes with a powerful 20000mAh built-in battery. This allows Lost Mary MO20000 Pro Vape to bring you extended vaping sessions every day, without the need for frequent recharging. Forget about low battery anxiety and enjoy uninterrupted vaping pleasure from now on.
Large E-liquid Capacity

:

With an 18 ml e-liquid capacity reservoir, Lost Mary by EBDesign vape has solved the hassle of constant refills! Vape non-stop to your heart's content! Casual vapers and cloud-chasing aficionados will agree… the generous e-liquid capacity of the Lost Mary MO20000 Pro ensures a satisfying vaping experience time and time again.
Adjustable Wattage Control

:

Dial up your own vaping strength to satisfy your personal preferences, with the Lost Mary MO20000 Pro's adjustable wattage control feature. By adjusting the wattage output, you can modify vapor production and flavor intensity any time you want, giving you full control over your vaping experience.
Intuitive OLED Display

:

Stay informed and in control with the Lost Mary MO20000 Pro's intuitive OLED display screen. Effortlessly monitor battery life, custom wattage settings, coil resistance, and more all at a glance. Real-time feedback for today’s vape enthusiasts seeking optimized vaping experiences only.
Creative Construction

: Built to withstand the rigors of frequent daily use, the Lost Mary MO20000 Pro Vape features durable construction that gives you confidence, long-lasting pleasure and perfect performance. From its sturdy chassis to its high-quality components, every aspect of this device has been created for reliability and durability.
Safety Protections

:

Thanks to the Lost Mary MO20000 Pro's comprehensive safety features, you can enjoy peace of mind while you indulge. Built-in protection includes overcharge protection, short circuit protection and even low voltage protection. A safe and enjoyable vaping experience is yours with every puff.
USB-C Charging Convenience

:

It’s all about fast and convenient charging action with the Lost Mary MO20000 Pro's USB-C charging port. You’ll be amazed by the rapid charging times, as you start spending less time waiting around and more time vaping.
Blue Razz Ice

: Prepare yourself for an exhilarating journey with Blue Razz Ice.
An attention grabbing concoction of flavors that recreates classic blue raspberry taste, enhanced by an ice-cold menthol finish on the exhale. Take a Blue Razz trip today!
Dragon Drink

: Vape your way on a mystical adventure with EBDesign’s Dragon Drink vape flavor. This magical vape captures the taste of exotic dragon fruit, mixing its unique sweetness with a dash of tropical goodness. Feel the unbridled energy of the dragon as it titillates your taste buds, leaving you craving more.
Miami Mint

:

Finally a flavor that’s as cool as you!
Now you can get a Miami nightlife, while enjoying the refreshingly light menthol sensation this EB Design vape flavor delivers! Taste South Beach tropical freshness like a native, and make your own clouds too!
Pineapple Ice

: Juicy golden pineapple is where it’s at! This island favorite is infused with a frigid blast of menthol, making for a refreshing and unique vape experience. Each puff is like sipping on a frozen pineapple cocktail on the beach, leaving you with a feeling of cool rejuvenation.
Rainbow Sherbet

:

A melange of tangy citrus fruits and naturally sweet berries bring a burst of vibrant flavor to each pleasurable puff! Think rainbow-colored sherbet! You’ll also enjoy thinking back to some of your favorite childhood frozen treats packed into each draw.
Rocket Popsicle

:

Take a little trip down memory lane with Rocket Popsicle. The sweet, tangy taste of cherry, blue raspberry, and lemon, just like that iconic red, white, and blue popsicle we all remember and loved. Let the flavors of summer swim around on your palate, leaving you feeling chilled and thrilled.
Watermelon Ice

:

This one tastes like ice-cold watermelon on a hot summer day, pure and simple. It refreshes puff after puff with a generous amount of mouthwatering watermelon flavor. A good sized dose of ice-cold menthol comes in on the finish, creating a tasty cool vape of the highest quality.
Your vaping experiences will enjoy new boundaries of pleasure with the Lost Mary MO20000 Pro Vape. Power, performance, and style converge to create a totally exceptional vaping device.
Whether you're a vaping veteran or just dipping your toes into the vape scene, the Lost Mary MO20000 Pro Vape has got your back for vaping experiences that are off the charts.

The Lost Mary MO20000 Pro Disposable Vape is a single-use vaping device that is disposable and non-reusable after e-liquid is depleted. It is advertised with an associated puff count of 20,000 puffs, which is a characteristic of a disposable vape product. Therefore, the product class is DISPOSABLE. 

Note: The product description mentions that the device has a 20000mAh built-in battery, 18 ml e-liquid capacity reservoir, and adjustable wattage control, but these features do not change the fact that it is a disposable vape

            - **CLOSED REFILL**: Prefilled cartridges or pods that are not refillable after use with volume less than 5 mL.

all_text:
Juice Head Maxx Vape 10K Disposable
[]
Juice Head Maxx Vape 10K Disposable
The
Juice Head Maxx 10K Disposable Vape

brings the ultimate in modern convenience and true flavor to your vaping game. It is designed for those who demand a premium vaping experience without having to deal with frequent refilling or recharging. The
Juice Head Maxx 10K

is a high-powered, long-lasting vape device that consistently delivers rich, bold flavors in every draw. The advanced disposable vape technology built into this device brings your taste buds the satisfaction they crave while providing a seamless vaping experience.
Juice Head Maxx 10K

:

Up to 10,000 puffs
:

High-capacity built-in battery
:

Multiple options available
:

Compact and portable design
Type C Rechargeable Battery

-
The option to recharge is also available.
Smart Display Screen

: Shows battery and e-Liquid levels in real time
Juice Head Maxx 10K Flavors:

Watermelon Strawberry
- Partake in a scrumptious blend of vine ripened watermelon and garden fresh strawberries. This lively flavor fusion captures the true essence of summer refreshment. The fruit-juicy burst of taste in every puff will leave you amazed.
Blueberry Lemon Freeze -
This tantalizing blend of zippy lemon and soothing blueberry is perfect for those seeking a crisp and tangy vape that refreshes all your senses. It’s an invigorating blast of frozen fruit flavor that finishes with a bright, lemony zest.
Grape Cooler Freeze
- This frosty concoction of mixed grapes are blended together into a palate pleasing refreshing frozen cooler. It’s the perfect balance of cold and sweetness, making it an ideal choice for many revitalizing summertime vape sessions.
Strawberry Peach Freeze
- Naturally sweet strawberries and juicy Georgia peaches are blended and frozen together delivering a smoothie-like taste sensation. This pleasing combo drops a smooth and refreshing vape experience on your tongue, and is perfect for day or nighttime vaping.
Fresh Mint Freeze
- Nothing could be cooler than. Fresh Mint Freeze from Juice Head Maxx 10K vapes! The eye-opening sensation of pure, fresh mint is enhanced by a frosty twist that delivers a refreshing vape that's perfect for mint lovers! Grab some extra chill today.
Kiwi PassionFruit -
Juice Head Max's Kiwi PassionFruit
is a vibrant fusion of tangy kiwi and luscious passionfruit. This tasty dynamic duo creates an electrifying flavor that invigorates all of your senses while delivering a refreshing, tropical burst of pleasure.
Tropical Punch -
Juice Head Max's Tropical Punch brings a tantalizing blend of juicy fruits that takes you on a puff paradise journey to the islands. With a melange of ripe pineapple, succulent mango and a hint of citrus, this choice offers a scrumptious escape in every puff.
You have found advanced vaping technology with the
Juice Head Maxx 10K Disposable Vape

. The Smart Display Screen displays battery strength and e-liquid levels in real time. It is perfect for those who are seeking high-quality, flavorful, and trouble free vaping solutions. Its impressive 10K puff count, variety of flavors, and user-friendly design makes the
Juice Head Maxx 10K

stand out in the crowd as a #1 choice for disposable vapes. Enjoy hassle-free vape experiences anytime with
Juice Head Maxx 10K

. Convenience and exceptional flavor come together perfectly
with the
Juice Head Maxx 10K Disposable Vape

.

all_text:
RAZ DC25000 | Strawberry Orange Tang
[]
RAZ DC25000 Disposable Vape | 25k Puffs

Finally the ultimate in convenience and vaping satisfaction has arrived with the
Raz DC25000 Disposable Vape / 25K Puffs
. This brilliant vaping product takes hassle-free vaping to a new level. It’s a phenomenal portable solution for vape lovers of any experience level. Featuring a sleek, ergonomic design, long-lasting battery and tons of delightfully creative e-liquids to choose from, the
Raz Vape
is your perfect choice for busy people anytime, anywhere.
:

High Puff Capacity
:

Enjoy up to 25000 puffs of flavorful vapor with the Raz DC25K Disposable Vape, ensuring extended vaping sessions without the need for frequent replacements. Who has time for refills anyway?
Pre-filled Premium E-liquid
:

All
Raz Vapes
come prefilled with irresistible tasting premium e-liquids that are available in a massive range of delectable flavors designed to suit the taste preferences of everyone.
No Excess Charging or Refilling Required
:

One of the most popular aspects of the Raz DC25000 Disposable Vape is that it requires no excess charging or refilling. You’ll love the freedom of a hassle-free, convenient vaping every time you indulge.
Portable & Compact
:

Its compact and lightweight design is all the rave! The Raz DC25000 Disposable Vape is perfect for busy vapers, and fits easily in your pocket, purse and your hand for discreet vaping wherever you are.
Dependable Vapor Production
:

Equipped with advanced powerful mesh coil technology, the Raz DC25000 Disposable Vape delivers smooth vapor production from start to finish. You can depend on incredibly satisfying vape experiences with every puff.
Disposable Design
:

Please dispose of your Raz DC25000 Disposable Vape responsibly once you are finished with it. Once again… there is no need for maintenance or cleaning. See ya!
Wide Choice of Flavors
:

Choose from a creative and numerous selection of delicious vape flavors, including tobacco versions, fruit, menthol and sweet dessert choices too. There is something for everyone with Raz DC25000 Vape Flavors.
Nicotine Strength Option
s:

Choose your personal preferred nicotine strength! Customize your vaping experience with several options available, all created to accommodate new and experienced vapers alike.
Safety Features
:

Safety is the focus of the Raz DC25000 Disposable Vape.  Features such as overcharge and short circuit protection ensure you will always enjoy worry-free vaping day in and day out.
Take your vaping experience higher than ever before with the
Raz DC 25000 Puffs Disposable Vape
. Who could ask for more convenience? User-friendly design, long-lasting battery, and flavorful e-liquid options make this the perfect choice for vapers who seek excellence in every puff. Try the Raz DC25000 Disposable Vape for yourself, and discover the supreme vaping satisfaction you didn’t not know you needed.
:

The flavor profile of Blue Raz Ice features a light touch of menthol, with a mild, perfectly mellow raspberry finish. Its light menthol undertones will keep refreshing your senses all day and night.
Miami Mint
:

Feel the spirit of South Beach, with this fantastic fusion of chilled mint with a hint of tropical fruit. This breezy vape experience will make you feel like you’re cruising the strip along the lively shores of Miami Beach. Welcome to the 305!
Georgia Peach
:

The taste of summer is all yours with Georgia Peach. This fruity blend brings juicy sweet peaches to your vaping sessions. It’s like a stroll through a sun-kissed orchard with every puff.
Watermelon Ice
:

This mouthwatering choice combines the taste of ripe watermelon with a pinch of icy menthol.
It’s a juice filled watermelon fiesta at the peak of its ripeness, bathed in the perfect amount of menthol that delivers that frozen finish so many crave.
Night Crawler
: Get a Nightlife! Immerse yourself in the delightful darkness of Night Crawler by RAZ DC 25000. This mysterious flavor blend combines deep, rich pungency with just a touch of sweetness, creating a mystifying nighttime (or daytime) vaping experience!
Blueberry Watermelon
: Blueberry Watermelon by RAZ DC 25000 is a refreshing palate pleaser. Juicy watermelon mixes it up with ripe blueberries for a burst of fruity flavor that will activate your taste buds with every puff.
Raspberry Limeade
: It’s thirst quenching time with Raspberry Limeade by RAZ DC 25000. Tangy raspberries are emulsified into slightly sweetened lime juice, creating a refreshing and invigorating vaping experience that will leave you saying,”How did they do that?”
Cherry Strapple:
“Strapple” this delightful blend on for size! The clever combination of juicy cherries with crisp apples hits differently, with a burst of fruity flavor that will awaken and rejuvenate your senses.
Sour Apple Watermelon
: A solid punch of Sour Apple Watermelon by RAZ DC 25000 your palate will love. Tart green apples smash up with sweet watermelon, creating a climactic combination of flavors that leave your taste buds tingling every time.
Iced Blue Dragon
: Cool your jets with Iced Blue Dragon by RAZ DC 25000. This frosty combo features the taste of wild mountain blueberries and exotic dragon fruit, menthol twist at the end that will electrify your senses.
Sour Watermelon Peach
: Bring a sour flavor explosion to your day with Sour Watermelon Peach by RAZ DC 25000. Watermelon and juicy peaches get it all together in this bombastic blend, for a burst of interesting flavors that leave you happily craving much more.
Wintergreen
: Embracing the cool of winter’s crisp taste is so easy with Wintergreen by RAZ DC 25000. This savory winter flavor combines minty freshness with a pinch of sweetness, creating a satisfying vaping experience that leaves you feeling invigorated.
Bangin Sour Berries
: Time to get bangin’ with the flavor detonation of Bangin Sour Berries by RAZ DC 25000. Tart berries blast off with a sour twist, creating a bold and vibrant vaping experience that will awaken your sleepy taste buds.
Strawberry Burst
: It’s delightfully juicy! The sweet allure of Strawberry Burst by RAZ DC 25000 is undeniable. Ripe strawberries literally burst with flavor in this terrific blend, for a taste of summer’s strawberry fields with every puff.
Strawberry Orange Tang
: Expect a surprising burst of citrus with Strawberry Orange Tang by RAZ DC 25000. Tangy Florida oranges blend with garden fresh strawberries that make every day with this flavor brighter!
Mango Loco -
It’s a tropical frenzy of mango flavor with RAZ DC25K's Mango Loco. This one bursts with the rich, juicy sweetness of perfectly ripened mangoes for a crazy good, exotic vaping experience that's as festive as a summer fiesta.
Strawberry Kiwi Pear -
This magical blend of succulent strawberries, tangy kiwis, and crisp pears makes Strawberry Kiwi Pear an instant classic. It’s pure refreshment, as this tasty trio delivers a sweet-tart flavor that does a jig on your taste buds with every puff.
Rainbow Rain -
Take a walk in a colorful explosion of Rainbow Rain! Fruitful flavors rule in this delightful mix, capturing the essence of a fruit-flavored candy medley you’ll love. It’s a sweet and tangy rainbow of taste that will brighten up your vaping experience.
Frozen Juicy Strawberry
- Experience the icy sweet sensation of Frozen Juicy Strawberry, where sun-ripened strawberries meet a rejuvenating menthol breeze. This blend creates the essence of freshly picked country strawberries, for a savory journey that's perfect for any time of day.
Tobacco
- The classic, robust taste of Tobacco is what this one is all about.
It’s a rich, earthy blend that brings the traditionally familiar taste of tobacco to your vape sessions. It has a smooth and full-bodied profile, making it perfect for those who appreciate the timelessness of a genuine tobacco experience.
Clear
- Behold the simplicity of Clear, a pure, unadulterated version that lets you enjoy the essence of clean, invigorating vapor without the addition of flavors. This option is often the choice
for those who prefer a straightforward, smooth and subtle experience.
Frozen Cherry Apple
- The crisp fusion of tart cherries and juicy apples is phenomenal with Frozen Cherry Apple from
RAZ DC 25K
! It’s a frosted twist on two classic fruit flavors. The cool menthol finish enhances the delightfully tangy notes, creating a satisfying fusion that's both refreshing and flavorful.
Frozen Banana
-The name Frozen Banana says it all! This flavor hits you with the creamy sweetness of ripe bananas with an exciting icy touch. This smooth and frigid blend perfectly captures the comforting taste of bananas, highlighted by the cool menthol finish that adds an eye opening
twist to this familiar favorite.

: It’s delightfully juicy! The sweet allure of Strawberry Burst by RAZ DC 25000 is undeniable. Ripe strawberries literally burst with flavor in this terrific blend, for a taste of summer’s strawberry fields with every puff.
Strawberry Orange Tang
: Expect a surprising burst of citrus with Strawberry Orange Tang by RAZ DC 25000. Tangy Florida oranges blend with garden fresh strawberries that make every day with this flavor brighter!
Mango Loco -
It’s a tropical frenzy of mango flavor with RAZ DC25K's Mango Loco. This one bursts with the rich, juicy sweetness of perfectly ripened mangoes for a crazy good, exotic vaping experience that's as festive as a summer fiesta.
Strawberry Kiwi Pear -
This magical blend of succulent strawberries, tangy kiwis, and crisp pears makes Strawberry Kiwi Pear an instant classic. It’s pure refreshment, as this tasty trio delivers a sweet-tart flavor that does a jig on your taste buds with every puff.
Rainbow Rain -
Take a walk in a colorful explosion of Rainbow Rain! Fruitful flavors rule in this delightful mix, capturing the essence of a fruit-flavored candy medley you’ll love. It’s a sweet and tangy rainbow of taste that will brighten up your vaping experience.
Frozen Juicy Strawberry
- Experience the icy sweet sensation of Frozen Juicy Strawberry, where sun-ripened strawberries meet a rejuvenating menthol breeze. This blend creates the essence of freshly picked country strawberries, for a savory journey that's perfect for any time of day.
Tobacco
- The classic, robust taste of Tobacco is what this one is all about.
It’s a rich, earthy blend that brings the traditionally familiar taste of tobacco to your vape sessions. It has a smooth and full-bodied profile, making it perfect for those who appreciate the timelessness of a genuine tobacco experience.
Clear
- Behold the simplicity of Clear, a pure, unadulterated version that lets you enjoy the essence of clean, invigorating vapor without the addition of flavors. This option is often the choice
for those who prefer a straightforward, smooth and subtle experience.
Frozen Cherry Apple
- The crisp fusion of tart cherries and juicy apples is phenomenal with Frozen Cherry Apple from
RAZ DC 25K
! It’s a frosted twist on two classic fruit flavors. The cool menthol finish enhances the delightfully tangy notes, creating a satisfying fusion that's both refreshing and flavorful.
Frozen Banana
-The name Frozen Banana says it all! This flavor hits you with the creamy sweetness of ripe bananas with an exciting icy touch. This smooth and frigid blend perfectly captures the comforting taste of bananas, highlighted by the cool menthol finish that adds an eye opening
twist to this familiar favorite.

No Excess Charging or Refilling Required
:

Portable & Compact
:

Its compact and lightweight design is all the rave! The Raz DC25000 Disposable Vape is perfect for busy vapers, and fits easily in your pocket, purse and your hand for discreet vaping wherever you are.
Dependable Vapor Production
:

Equipped with advanced powerful mesh coil technology, the Raz DC25000 Disposable Vape delivers smooth vapor production from start to finish. You can depend on incredibly satisfying vape experiences with every puff.
Disposable Design
:

Please dispose of your Raz DC25000 Disposable Vape responsibly once you are finished with it. Once again… there is no need for maintenance or cleaning. See ya!
Wide Choice of Flavors
:

Choose from a creative and numerous selection of delicious vape flavors, including tobacco versions, fruit, menthol and sweet dessert choices too. There is something for everyone with Raz DC25000 Vape Flavors.
Nicotine Strength Option
s:

Choose your personal preferred nicotine strength! Customize your vaping experience with several options available, all created to accommodate new and experienced vapers alike.

:

Safety is the focus of the Raz DC25000 Disposable Vape.  Features such as overcharge and short circuit protection ensure you will always enjoy worry-free vaping day in and day out.
Take your vaping experience higher than ever before with the
Raz DC 25000 Puffs Disposable Vape
. Who could ask for more convenience? User-friendly design, long-lasting battery, and flavorful e-liquid options make this the perfect choice for vapers who seek excellence in every puff. Try the Raz DC25000 Disposable Vape for yourself, and discover the supreme vaping satisfaction you didn’t not know you needed.
:

The flavor profile of Blue Raz Ice features a light touch of menthol, with a mild, perfectly mellow raspberry finish. Its light menthol undertones will keep refreshing your senses all day and night.
Miami Mint
:

Feel the spirit of South Beach, with this fantastic fusion of chilled mint with a hint of tropical fruit. This breezy vape experience will make you feel like you’re cruising the strip along the lively shores of Miami Beach. Welcome to the 305!
Georgia Peach
:

The taste of summer is all yours with Georgia Peach. This fruity blend brings juicy sweet peaches to your vaping sessions. It’s like a stroll through a sun-kissed orchard with every puff.
Watermelon Ice
:

This mouthwatering choice combines the taste of ripe watermelon with a pinch of icy menthol.
It’s a juice filled watermelon fiesta at the peak of its ripeness, bathed in the perfect amount of menthol that delivers that frozen finish so many crave.
Night Crawler
: Get a Nightlife! Immerse yourself in the delightful darkness of Night Crawler by RAZ DC 25000. This mysterious flavor blend combines deep, rich pungency with just a touch of sweetness, creating a mystifying nighttime (or daytime) vaping experience!
Blueberry Watermelon
: Blueberry Watermelon by RAZ DC 25000 is a refreshing palate pleaser. Juicy watermelon mixes it up with ripe blueberries for a burst of fruity flavor that will activate your taste buds with every puff.
Raspberry Limeade
: It’s thirst quenching time with Raspberry Limeade by RAZ DC 25000. Tangy raspberries are emulsified into slightly sweetened lime juice, creating a refreshing and invigorating vaping experience that will leave you saying,”How did they do that?”
Cherry Strapple:
“Strapple” this delightful blend on for size! The clever combination of juicy cherries with crisp apples hits differently, with a burst of fruity flavor that will awaken and rejuvenate your senses.
Sour Apple Watermelon
: A solid punch of Sour Apple Watermelon by RAZ DC 25000 your palate will love. Tart green apples smash up with sweet watermelon, creating a climactic combination of flavors that leave your taste buds tingling every time.
Iced Blue Dragon
: Cool your jets with Iced Blue Dragon by RAZ DC 25000. This frosty combo features the taste of wild mountain blueberries and exotic dragon fruit, menthol twist at the end that will electrify your senses.
Sour Watermelon Peach
: Bring a sour flavor explosion to your day with Sour Watermelon Peach by RAZ DC 25000. Watermelon and juicy peaches get it all together in this bombastic blend, for a burst of interesting flavors that leave you happily craving much more.
Wintergreen
: Embracing the cool of winter’s crisp taste is so easy with Wintergreen by RAZ DC 25000. This savory winter flavor combines minty freshness with a pinch of sweetness, creating a satisfying vaping experience that leaves you feeling invigorated.
Bangin Sour Berries

Strawberry Burst

Strawberry Orange Tang
: Expect a surprising burst of citrus with Strawberry Orange Tang by RAZ DC 25000. Tangy Florida oranges blend with garden fresh strawberries that make every day with this flavor brighter!
Mango Loco -
It’s a tropical frenzy of mango flavor with RAZ DC25K's Mango Loco. This one bursts with the rich, juicy sweetness of perfectly ripened mangoes for a crazy good, exotic vaping experience that's as festive as a summer fiesta.
Strawberry Kiwi Pear -
This magical blend of succulent strawberries, tangy kiwis, and crisp pears makes Strawberry Kiwi Pear an instant classic. It’s pure refreshment, as this tasty trio delivers a sweet-tart flavor that does a jig on your taste buds with every puff.
Rainbow Rain -
Take a walk in a colorful explosion of Rainbow Rain! Fruitful flavors rule in this delightful mix, capturing the essence of a fruit-flavored candy medley you’ll love. It’s a sweet and tangy rainbow of taste that will brighten up your vaping experience.
Frozen Juicy Strawberry
- Experience the icy sweet sensation of Frozen Juicy Strawberry, where sun-ripened strawberries meet a rejuvenating menthol breeze. This blend creates the essence of freshly picked country strawberries, for a savory journey that's perfect for any time of day.
Tobacco
- The classic, robust taste of Tobacco is what this one is all about.
It’s a rich, earthy blend that brings the traditionally familiar taste of tobacco to your vape sessions. It has a smooth and full-bodied profile, making it perfect for those who appreciate the timelessness of a genuine tobacco experience.

for those who prefer a straightforward, smooth and subtle experience.
Frozen Cherry Apple

RAZ DC 25K
! It’s a frosted twist on two classic fruit flavors. The cool menthol finish enhances the delightfully tangy notes, creating a satisfying fusion that's both refreshing and flavorful.

twist to this familiar favorite.

            Classify the product described in the text into one of the following categories:
            
            - **CLOSED REFILL**: Prefilled cartridges or pods that are not refillable after use with volume less than 5 mL.
            - **CLOSED SYSTEM**: A vape device or starter kit that uses replaceable, prefilled pods or cartridges.
            - **OPEN SYSTEM**:  A refillable vape product or starter kit with a tank or cartridge that allows users to manually add their choice of e-liquid. Description may include an e-liquid capacity, battery capacity, and a refillable pod or tank.
            - **E-LIQUID**: Bottles of liquid used to refill tanks or pods with volume greater than 10 mL.
            - **DISPOSABLE**: Single-use vaping device that is disposable and non-reusable after e-liquid is depleted. These typically are advertised with an associated puff count or puffs per device.
            - **ACCESSORY**: Components like chargers, mesh coils, batteries, and REPLACEMENT pods or tanks (may have a coil or sub-ohm capacity). 
            
            Return only the category in JSON format, e.g., {"product_class": "E-liquid"}.

RAZ DC25000 Disposable Vape | 25k Puffs

Finally the ultimate in convenience and vaping satisfaction has arrived with the
Raz DC25000 Disposable Vape / 25K Puffs
. This brilliant vaping product takes hassle-free vaping to a new level. It’s a phenomenal portable solution for vape lovers of any experience level. Featuring a sleek, ergonomic design, long-lasting battery and tons of delightfully creative e-liquids to choose from, the
Raz Vape
is your perfect choice for busy people anytime, anywhere.
:

High Puff Capacity
:

Enjoy up to 25000 puffs of flavorful vapor with the Raz DC25K Disposable Vape, ensuring extended vaping sessions without the need for frequent replacements. Who has time for refills anyway?
Pre-filled Premium E-liquid
:

All
Raz Vapes
come prefilled with irresistible tasting premium e-liquids that are available in a massive range of delectable flavors designed to suit the taste preferences of everyone.
No Excess Charging or Refilling Required
:

Portable & Compact
:

Its compact and lightweight design is all the rave! The Raz DC25000 Disposable Vape is perfect for busy vapers, and fits easily in your pocket, purse and your hand for discreet vaping wherever you are.
Dependable Vapor Production

Equipped with advanced powerful mesh coil technology, the Raz DC25000 Disposable Vape delivers smooth vapor production from start to finish. You can depend on incredibly satisfying vape experiences with every puff.
Disposable Design
:

Please dispose of your Raz DC25000 Disposable Vape responsibly once you are finished with it. Once again… there is no need for maintenance or cleaning. See ya!
Wide Choice of Flavors
:

Choose from a creative and numerous selection of delicious vape flavors, including tobacco versions, fruit, menthol and sweet dessert choices too. There is something for everyone with Raz DC25000 Vape Flavors.
Nicotine Strength Option
s:

Choose your personal preferred nicotine strength! Customize your vaping experience with several options available, all created to accommodate new and experienced vapers alike.
Safety Features
:

Safety is the focus of the Raz DC25000 Disposable Vape.  Features such as overcharge and short circuit protection ensure you will always enjoy worry-free vaping day in and day out.
Take your vaping experience higher than ever before with the
Raz DC 25000 Puffs Disposable Vape
. Who could ask for more convenience? User-friendly design, long-lasting battery, and flavorful e-liquid options make this the perfect choice for vapers who seek excellence in every puff. Try the Raz DC25000 Disposable Vape for yourself, and discover the supreme vaping satisfaction you didn’t not know you needed.
:

The flavor profile of Blue Raz Ice features a light touch of menthol, with a mild, perfectly mellow raspberry finish. Its light menthol undertones will keep refreshing your senses all day and night.
Miami Mint
:

Feel the spirit of South Beach, with this fantastic fusion of chilled mint with a hint of tropical fruit. This breezy vape experience will make you feel like you’re cruising the strip along the lively shores of Miami Beach. Welcome to the 305!
Georgia Peach
:

The taste of summer is all yours with Georgia Peach. This fruity blend brings juicy sweet peaches to your vaping sessions. It’s like a stroll through a sun-kissed orchard with every puff.
Watermelon Ice
:

This mouthwatering choice combines the taste of ripe watermelon with a pinch of icy menthol.
It’s a juice filled watermelon fiesta at the peak of its ripeness, bathed in the perfect amount of menthol that delivers that frozen finish so many crave.
Night Crawler
: Get a Nightlife! Immerse yourself in the delightful darkness of Night Crawler by RAZ DC 25000. This mysterious flavor blend combines deep, rich pungency with just a touch of sweetness, creating a mystifying nighttime (or daytime) vaping experience!
Blueberry Watermelon
: Blueberry Watermelon by RAZ DC 25000 is a refreshing palate pleaser. Juicy watermelon mixes it up with ripe blueberries for a burst of fruity flavor that will activate your taste buds with every puff.
Raspberry Limeade
: It’s thirst quenching time with Raspberry Limeade by RAZ DC 25000. Tangy raspberries are emulsified into slightly sweetened lime juice, creating a refreshing and invigorating vaping experience that will leave you saying,”How did they do that?”
Cherry Strapple:
“Strapple” this delightful blend on for size! The clever combination of juicy cherries with crisp apples hits differently, with a burst of fruity flavor that will awaken and rejuvenate your senses.
Sour Apple Watermelon
: A solid punch of Sour Apple Watermelon by RAZ DC 25000 your palate will love. Tart green apples smash up with sweet watermelon, creating a climactic combination of flavors that leave your taste buds tingling every time.
Iced Blue Dragon
: Cool your jets with Iced Blue Dragon by RAZ DC 25000. This frosty combo features the taste of wild mountain blueberries and exotic dragon fruit, menthol twist at the end that will electrify your senses.
Sour Watermelon Peach
: Bring a sour flavor explosion to your day with Sour Watermelon Peach by RAZ DC 25000. Watermelon and juicy peaches get it all together in this bombastic blend, for a burst of interesting flavors that leave you happily craving much more.
Wintergreen
: Embracing the cool of winter’s crisp taste is so easy with Wintergreen by RAZ DC 25000. This savory winter flavor combines minty freshness with a pinch of sweetness, creating a satisfying vaping experience that leaves you feeling invigorated.
Bangin Sour Berries
: Time to get bangin’ with the flavor detonation of Bangin Sour Berries by RAZ DC 25000. Tart berries blast off with a sour twist, creating a bold and vibrant vaping experience that will awaken your sleepy taste buds.
Strawberry Burst
: It’s delightfully juicy! The sweet allure of Strawberry Burst by RAZ DC 25000 is undeniable. Ripe strawberries literally burst with flavor in this terrific blend, for a taste of summer’s strawberry fields with every puff.
Strawberry Orange Tang
: Expect a surprising burst of citrus with Strawberry Orange Tang by RAZ DC 25000. Tangy Florida oranges blend with garden fresh strawberries that make every day with this flavor brighter!
Mango Loco -
It’s a tropical frenzy of mango flavor with RAZ DC25K's Mango Loco. This one bursts with the rich, juicy sweetness of perfectly ripened mangoes for a crazy good, exotic vaping experience that's as festive as a summer fiesta.
Strawberry Kiwi Pear -
This magical blend of succulent strawberries, tangy kiwis, and crisp pears makes Strawberry Kiwi Pear an instant classic. It’s pure refreshment, as this tasty trio delivers a sweet-tart flavor that does a jig on your taste buds with every puff.
Rainbow Rain -
Take a walk in a colorful explosion of Rainbow Rain! Fruitful flavors rule in this delightful mix, capturing the essence of a fruit-flavored candy medley you’ll love. It’s a sweet and tangy rainbow of taste that will brighten up your vaping experience.
Frozen Juicy Strawberry
- Experience the icy sweet sensation of Frozen Juicy Strawberry, where sun-ripened strawberries meet a rejuvenating menthol breeze. This blend creates the essence of freshly picked country strawberries, for a savory journey that's perfect for any time of day.
Tobacco
- The classic, robust taste of Tobacco is what this one is all about.
It’s a rich, earthy blend that brings the traditionally familiar taste of tobacco to your vape sessions. It has a smooth and full-bodied profile, making it perfect for those who appreciate the timelessness of a genuine tobacco experience.
Clear
- Behold the simplicity of Clear, a pure, unadulterated version that lets you enjoy the essence of clean, invigorating vapor without the addition of flavors. This option is often the choice
for those who prefer a straightforward, smooth and subtle experience.
Frozen Cherry Apple
- The crisp fusion of tart cherries and juicy apples is phenomenal with Frozen Cherry Apple from
RAZ DC 25K
! It’s a frosted twist on two classic fruit flavors. The cool menthol finish enhances the delightfully tangy notes, creating a satisfying fusion that's both refreshing and flavorful.
Frozen Banana
-The name Frozen Banana says it all! This flavor hits you with the creamy sweetness of ripe bananas with an exciting icy touch. This smooth and frigid blend perfectly captures the comforting taste of bananas, highlighted by the cool menthol finish that adds an eye opening
twist to this familiar favorite.

The flavor profile of Blue Raz Ice features a light touch of menthol, with a mild, perfectly mellow raspberry finish. Its light menthol undertones will keep refreshing your senses all day and night.
Miami Mint
:

Feel the spirit of South Beach, with this fantastic fusion of chilled mint with a hint of tropical fruit. This breezy vape experience will make you feel like you’re cruising the strip along the lively shores of Miami Beach. Welcome to the 305!
Georgia Peach
:

The taste of summer is all yours with Georgia Peach. This fruity blend brings juicy sweet peaches to your vaping sessions. It’s like a stroll through a sun-kissed orchard with every puff.
Watermelon Ice
:

This mouthwatering choice combines the taste of ripe watermelon with a pinch of icy menthol.
It’s a juice filled watermelon fiesta at the peak of its ripeness, bathed in the perfect amount of menthol that delivers that frozen finish so many crave.
Night Crawler
: Get a Nightlife! Immerse yourself in the delightful darkness of Night Crawler by RAZ DC 25000. This mysterious flavor blend combines deep, rich pungency with just a touch of sweetness, creating a mystifying nighttime (or daytime) vaping experience!
Blueberry Watermelon
: Blueberry Watermelon by RAZ DC 25000 is a refreshing palate pleaser. Juicy watermelon mixes it up with ripe blueberries for a burst of fruity flavor that will activate your taste buds with every puff.
Raspberry Limeade
: It’s thirst quenching time with Raspberry Limeade by RAZ DC 25000. Tangy raspberries are emulsified into slightly sweetened lime juice, creating a refreshing and invigorating vaping experience that will leave you saying,”How did they do that?”
Cherry Strapple:
“Strapple” this delightful blend on for size! The clever combination of juicy cherries with crisp apples hits differently, with a burst of fruity flavor that will awaken and rejuvenate your senses.
Sour Apple Watermelon
: A solid punch of Sour Apple Watermelon by RAZ DC 25000 your palate will love. Tart green apples smash up with sweet watermelon, creating a climactic combination of flavors that leave your taste buds tingling every time.
Iced Blue Dragon
: Cool your jets with Iced Blue Dragon by RAZ DC 25000. This frosty combo features the taste of wild mountain blueberries and exotic dragon fruit, menthol twist at the end that will electrify your senses.
Sour Watermelon Peach
: Bring a sour flavor explosion to your day with Sour Watermelon Peach by RAZ DC 25000. Watermelon and juicy peaches get it all together in this bombastic blend, for a burst of interesting flavors that leave you happily craving much more.
Wintergreen
: Embracing the cool of winter’s crisp taste is so easy with Wintergreen by RAZ DC 25000. This savory winter flavor combines minty freshness with a pinch of sweetness, creating a satisfying vaping experience that leaves you feeling invigorated.
Bangin Sour Berries
: Time to get bangin’ with the flavor detonation of Bangin Sour Berries by RAZ DC 25000. Tart berries blast off with a sour twist, creating a bold and vibrant vaping experience that will awaken your sleepy taste buds.
Strawberry Burst
: It’s delightfully juicy! The sweet allure of Strawberry Burst by RAZ DC 25000 is undeniable. Ripe strawberries literally burst with flavor in this terrific blend, for a taste of summer’s strawberry fields with every puff.
Strawberry Orange Tang
: Expect a surprising burst of citrus with Strawberry Orange Tang by RAZ DC 25000. Tangy Florida oranges blend with garden fresh strawberries that make every day with this flavor brighter!
Mango Loco -
It’s a tropical frenzy of mango flavor with RAZ DC25K's Mango Loco. This one bursts with the rich, juicy sweetness of perfectly ripened mangoes for a crazy good, exotic vaping experience that's as festive as a summer fiesta.
Strawberry Kiwi Pear -
This magical blend of succulent strawberries, tangy kiwis, and crisp pears makes Strawberry Kiwi Pear an instant classic. It’s pure refreshment, as this tasty trio delivers a sweet-tart flavor that does a jig on your taste buds with every puff.
Rainbow Rain -
Take a walk in a colorful explosion of Rainbow Rain! Fruitful flavors rule in this delightful mix, capturing the essence of a fruit-flavored candy medley you’ll love. It’s a sweet and tangy rainbow of taste that will brighten up your vaping experience.
Frozen Juicy Strawberry
- Experience the icy sweet sensation of Frozen Juicy Strawberry, where sun-ripened strawberries meet a rejuvenating menthol breeze. This blend creates the essence of freshly picked country strawberries, for a savory journey that's perfect for any time of day.
Tobacco
- The classic, robust taste of Tobacco is what this one is all about.
It’s a rich, earthy blend that brings the traditionally familiar taste of tobacco to your vape sessions. It has a smooth and full-bodied profile, making it perfect for those who appreciate the timelessness of a genuine tobacco experience.
Clear
- Behold the simplicity of Clear, a pure, unadulterated version that lets you enjoy the essence of clean, invigorating vapor without the addition of flavors. This option is often the choice
for those who prefer a straightforward, smooth and subtle experience.
Frozen Cherry Apple
- The crisp fusion of tart cherries and juicy apples is phenomenal with Frozen Cherry Apple from
RAZ DC 25K
! It’s a frosted twist on two classic fruit flavors. The cool menthol finish enhances the delightfully tangy notes, creating a satisfying fusion that's both refreshing and flavorful.
Frozen Banana
-The name Frozen Banana says it all! This flavor hits you with the creamy sweetness of ripe bananas with an exciting icy touch. This smooth and frigid blend perfectly captures the comforting taste of bananas, highlighted by the cool menthol finish that adds an eye opening
twist to this familiar favorite.

: Time to get bangin’ with the flavor detonation of Bangin Sour Berries by RAZ DC 25000. Tart berries blast off with a sour twist, creating a bold and vibrant vaping experience that will awaken your sleepy taste buds.
Strawberry Burst
: It’s delightfully juicy! The sweet allure of Strawberry Burst by RAZ DC 25000 is undeniable. Ripe strawberries literally burst with flavor in this terrific blend, for a taste of summer’s strawberry fields with every puff.
Strawberry Orange Tang
: Expect a surprising burst of citrus with Strawberry Orange Tang by RAZ DC 25000. Tangy Florida oranges blend with garden fresh strawberries that make every day with this flavor brighter!
Mango Loco -
It’s a tropical frenzy of mango flavor with RAZ DC25K's Mango Loco. This one bursts with the rich, juicy sweetness of perfectly ripened mangoes for a crazy good, exotic vaping experience that's as festive as a summer fiesta.
Strawberry Kiwi Pear -
This magical blend of succulent strawberries, tangy kiwis, and crisp pears makes Strawberry Kiwi Pear an instant classic. It’s pure refreshment, as this tasty trio delivers a sweet-tart flavor that does a jig on your taste buds with every puff.
Rainbow Rain -
Take a walk in a colorful explosion of Rainbow Rain! Fruitful flavors rule in this delightful mix, capturing the essence of a fruit-flavored candy medley you’ll love. It’s a sweet and tangy rainbow of taste that will brighten up your vaping experience.
Frozen Juicy Strawberry
- Experience the icy sweet sensation of Frozen Juicy Strawberry, where sun-ripened strawberries meet a rejuvenating menthol breeze. This blend creates the essence of freshly picked country strawberries, for a savory journey that's perfect for any time of day.
Tobacco
- The classic, robust taste of Tobacco is what this one is all about.
It’s a rich, earthy blend that brings the traditionally familiar taste of tobacco to your vape sessions. It has a smooth and full-bodied profile, making it perfect for those who appreciate the timelessness of a genuine tobacco experience.
Clear
- Behold the simplicity of Clear, a pure, unadulterated version that lets you enjoy the essence of clean, invigorating vapor without the addition of flavors. This option is often the choice
for those who prefer a straightforward, smooth and subtle experience.
Frozen Cherry Apple
- The crisp fusion of tart cherries and juicy apples is phenomenal with Frozen Cherry Apple from
RAZ DC 25K
! It’s a frosted twist on two classic fruit flavors. The cool menthol finish enhances the delightfully tangy notes, creating a satisfying fusion that's both refreshing and flavorful.
Frozen Banana
-The name Frozen Banana says it all! This flavor hits you with the creamy sweetness of ripe bananas with an exciting icy touch. This smooth and frigid blend perfectly captures the comforting taste of bananas, highlighted by the cool menthol finish that adds an eye opening
twist to this familiar favorite.

:

High Puff Capacity
:

Enjoy up to 25000 puffs of flavorful vapor with the Raz DC25K Disposable Vape, ensuring extended vaping sessions without the need for frequent replacements. Who has time for refills anyway?
Pre-filled Premium E-liquid
:

All
Raz Vapes
come prefilled with irresistible tasting premium e-liquids that are available in a massive range of delectable flavors designed to suit the taste preferences of everyone.
No Excess Charging or Refilling Required
:

One of the most popular aspects of the Raz DC25000 Disposable Vape is that it requires no excess charging or refilling. You’ll love the freedom of a hassle-free, convenient vaping every time you indulge.
Portable & Compact
:

Its compact and lightweight design is all the rave! The Raz DC25000 Disposable Vape is perfect for busy vapers, and fits easily in your pocket, purse and your hand for discreet vaping wherever you are.
Dependable Vapor Production
:

Equipped with advanced powerful mesh coil technology, the Raz DC25000 Disposable Vape delivers smooth vapor production from start to finish. You can depend on incredibly satisfying vape experiences with every puff.
Disposable Design
:

Please dispose of your Raz DC25000 Disposable Vape responsibly once you are finished with it. Once again… there is no need for maintenance or cleaning. See ya!
Wide Choice of Flavors
:

Choose from a creative and numerous selection of delicious vape flavors, including tobacco versions, fruit, menthol and sweet dessert choices too. There is something for everyone with Raz DC25000 Vape Flavors.
Nicotine Strength Option
s:

Choose your personal preferred nicotine strength! Customize your vaping experience with several options available, all created to accommodate new and experienced vapers alike.
Safety Features
:

Safety is the focus of the Raz DC25000 Disposable Vape.  Features such as overcharge and short circuit protection ensure you will always enjoy worry-free vaping day in and day out.
Take your vaping experience higher than ever before with the
Raz DC 25000 Puffs Disposable Vape
. Who could ask for more convenience? User-friendly design, long-lasting battery, and flavorful e-liquid options make this the perfect choice for vapers who seek excellence in every puff. Try the Raz DC25000 Disposable Vape for yourself, and discover the supreme vaping satisfaction you didn’t not know you needed.
:

The flavor profile of Blue Raz Ice features a light touch of menthol, with a mild, perfectly mellow raspberry finish. Its light menthol undertones will keep refreshing your senses all day and night.
Miami Mint
:

Feel the spirit of South Beach, with this fantastic fusion of chilled mint with a hint of tropical fruit. This breezy vape experience will make you feel like you’re cruising the strip along the lively shores of Miami Beach. Welcome to the 305!
Georgia Peach
:

The taste of summer is all yours with Georgia Peach. This fruity blend brings juicy sweet peaches to your vaping sessions. It’s like a stroll through a sun-kissed orchard with every puff.
Watermelon Ice
:

This mouthwatering choice combines the taste of ripe watermelon with a pinch of icy menthol.
It’s a juice filled watermelon fiesta at the peak of its ripeness, bathed in the perfect amount of menthol that delivers that frozen finish so many crave.
Night Crawler
: Get a Nightlife! Immerse yourself in the delightful darkness of Night Crawler by RAZ DC 25000. This mysterious flavor blend combines deep, rich pungency with just a touch of sweetness, creating a mystifying nighttime (or daytime) vaping experience!
Blueberry Watermelon
: Blueberry Watermelon by RAZ DC 25000 is a refreshing palate pleaser. Juicy watermelon mixes it up with ripe blueberries for a burst of fruity flavor that will activate your taste buds with every puff.
Raspberry Limeade
: It’s thirst quenching time with Raspberry Limeade by RAZ DC 25000. Tangy raspberries are emulsified into slightly sweetened lime juice, creating a refreshing and invigorating vaping experience that will leave you saying,”How did they do that?”
Cherry Strapple:
“Strapple” this delightful blend on for size! The clever combination of juicy cherries with crisp apples hits differently, with a burst of fruity flavor that will awaken and rejuvenate your senses.
Sour Apple Watermelon
: A solid punch of Sour Apple Watermelon by RAZ DC 25000 your palate will love. Tart green apples smash up with sweet watermelon, creating a climactic combination of flavors that leave your taste buds tingling every time.
Iced Blue Dragon
: Cool your jets with Iced Blue Dragon by RAZ DC 25000. This frosty combo features the taste of wild mountain blueberries and exotic dragon fruit, menthol twist at the end that will electrify your senses.
Sour Watermelon Peach
: Bring a sour flavor explosion to your day with Sour Watermelon Peach by RAZ DC 25000. Watermelon and juicy peaches get it all together in this bombastic blend, for a burst of interesting flavors that leave you happily craving much more.
Wintergreen
: Embracing the cool of winter’s crisp taste is so easy with Wintergreen by RAZ DC 25000. This savory winter flavor combines minty freshness with a pinch of sweetness, creating a satisfying vaping experience that leaves you feeling invigorated.
Bangin Sour Berries
: Time to get bangin’ with the flavor detonation of Bangin Sour Berries by RAZ DC 25000. Tart berries blast off with a sour twist, creating a bold and vibrant vaping experience that will awaken your sleepy taste buds.
Strawberry Burst
: It’s delightfully juicy! The sweet allure of Strawberry Burst by RAZ DC 25000 is undeniable. Ripe strawberries literally burst with flavor in this terrific blend, for a taste of summer’s strawberry fields with every puff.
Strawberry Orange Tang
: Expect a surprising burst of citrus with Strawberry Orange Tang by RAZ DC 25000. Tangy Florida oranges blend with garden fresh strawberries that make every day with this flavor brighter!
Mango Loco -
It’s a tropical frenzy of mango flavor with RAZ DC25K's Mango Loco. This one bursts with the rich, juicy sweetness of perfectly ripened mangoes for a crazy good, exotic vaping experience that's as festive as a summer fiesta.
Strawberry Kiwi Pear -
This magical blend of succulent strawberries, tangy kiwis, and crisp pears makes Strawberry Kiwi Pear an instant classic. It’s pure refreshment, as this tasty trio delivers a sweet-tart flavor that does a jig on your taste buds with every puff.
Rainbow Rain -
Take a walk in a colorful explosion of Rainbow Rain! Fruitful flavors rule in this delightful mix, capturing the essence of a fruit-flavored candy medley you’ll love. It’s a sweet and tangy rainbow of taste that will brighten up your vaping experience.
Frozen Juicy Strawberry
- Experience the icy sweet sensation of Frozen Juicy Strawberry, where sun-ripened strawberries meet a rejuvenating menthol breeze. This blend creates the essence of freshly picked country strawberries, for a savory journey that's perfect for any time of day.
Tobacco
- The classic, robust taste of Tobacco is what this one is all about.
It’s a rich, earthy blend that brings the traditionally familiar taste of tobacco to your vape sessions. It has a smooth and full-bodied profile, making it perfect for those who appreciate the timelessness of a genuine tobacco experience.
Clear
- Behold the simplicity of Clear, a pure, unadulterated version that lets you enjoy the essence of clean, invigorating vapor without the addition of flavors. This option is often the choice
for those who prefer a straightforward, smooth and subtle experience.
Frozen Cherry Apple
- The crisp fusion of tart cherries and juicy apples is phenomenal with Frozen Cherry Apple from
RAZ DC 25K
! It’s a frosted twist on two classic fruit flavors. The cool menthol finish enhances the delightfully tangy notes, creating a satisfying fusion that's both refreshing and flavorful.
Frozen Banana
-The name Frozen Banana says it all! This flavor hits you with the creamy sweetness of ripe bananas with an exciting icy touch. This smooth and frigid blend perfectly captures the comforting taste of bananas, highlighted by the cool menthol finish that adds an eye opening
twist to this familiar favorite.

            - **CLOSED REFILL**: Prefilled cartridges or pods that are not refillable after use with volume less than 5 mL.
