all_text:
Strawberry Ice Captain 10000 Vape by iJOY
[]
Captain 10000 Vape by iJOY
The trusted brand iJOY introduces a brand new innovation in vapor technology. With an impressive 10000 puffs, the iJOY Captain Vape keeps you on your journey for longer. It's like having a treasure chest of unforgettable moments at your fingertips, ready to satisfy your cravings anytime, anywhere. Whether you're relaxing on your deck or conquering uncharted territories, this vaping device is the perfect first mate.
Captain by iJOY Specifications

5% Nicotine 50mg
18 mL Pre Filled Capacity
Approximately 10000 Puffs
Battery Indicator
E-Liquid Level Indicator
Adjustable Airflow
USB-C Rechargeable
Flavors for Captain Vape
Cool Mint:
You’ll love this breath of crisp, arctic air with each inhale, perfect for those seeking a refreshing and soothing vaping experience. The icy minty notes will leave you feeling so fresh.
Blueberry Watermelon:
Jump into the tasty flavors of Blueberry and Watermelon. Ripe mountain blueberries blend so well with juicy watermelon, creating a delightful combination of fruity goodness that will do a jig on your taste buds.
Strawberry Dragon Fruit:
Strawberry Dragon Fruit combines the scrumptious sweetness of ripe strawberries with exotic allure dragon fruit. This e-liquid transports your palate to an imaginary paradise where the perfect balance of fruity flavors rules.
Strawberry Watermelon:
Strawberry Watermelon brings you the best of both vape worlds, combining the iconic sweet taste of strawberries with the juiciness
of watermelon. It's a delightful duo of fruity goodness that's super hard to resist.
Mango Melon Strawberry:
Suit up for a tropical vape adventure with Mango Melon Strawberry. The blend of ripe mangoes, juicy melons, and sweet strawberries brings your taste buds to a sunny beachside paradise.
Banana Pinacolada:
If you like Pina Colada... Banana Piñacolada is like sipping a tropical cocktail by the ocean. Ripe bananas and sweet pineapple blend so well together, for a creamy coconut tasting vape.
Kiwi Berry:
Kiwi Berry slaps you with a tangy, but not too sweet vape flavor. Ripe kiwis and choice berries fuse together for a vibrant vaping sensation.
Cherry Strawberry Kiwi:
A hat trick of the classic fruit flavors gets together in Cherry Strawberry Kiwi. This fantastic blend of cherries, ripe strawberries, and tangy kiwis is a fruit lover's dream.
Strawberry Cotton Candy:
It's like a trip to the carnival, featuring Strawberry Cotton Candy. This e-liquid captures the sugary sweetness of cotton candy combined with a splash of ripe strawberries.
Blue Raspberry Ice:
Blue Raspberry Ice bursts onto the flavor scene with bold, tangy notes of blue raspberry, topped off with an ice cold finish! A truly refreshing vape experience you’ll never get tired of.
Watermelon Bubblegum:
A nostalgic treat is coming your way with Watermelon Bubblegum. The taste of juicy red watermelon is paired just right with the sweet, enticing flavor of classic bubblegum.
Blue Berries:
Blue Berries is a celebration of this berry families finest members. Indulge in the bright taste of freshly picked blueberries, dropping a natural burst of sweetness where it counts…on your tongue!
Frozen Apple Pear:
Combining crisp apples and juicy pears with a frosty twist is what this is all about. An icy sensation complements the fruity flavor, making this vaping adventure a fan favorite.
Tropical Fruit:
Tropical Fruit is like a tornado of exotic flavors. It spins a medley of tropical fruits together to create a vibrant vaping vortex! It’s a fun journey with lots of pleasurable puffing.
Peach Gummy:
Juicy peaches meld with the playful sweetness of gummy candy, creating a mouthwatering vape that's both fruity and irresistibly chewy.
Aloe Blueberry:
Escape to a tranquil oasis with Aloe Blueberry. Succulent blueberries meet soothing aloe vera, creating a mysteriously enchanting and refreshing vape.
Apple Mango:
Dive into a symphony of taste with Apple Mango. Crisp apples meld with ripe mangoes for a harmonious and juicy blend.
Cranberry Bubblegum:

Zesty cranberries playfully collide with nostalgic bubble gum, delivering bold and delightful flavors.
Grape Honeydew:
Indulge in sophistication with Grape Honeydew. Rich grapes meet luscious honeydew, offering a velvety smooth and classy vaping experience.
Pineapple Kiwi:
Transport yourself to a tropical paradise with Pineapple Kiwi. Tangy pineapple pairs seamlessly with exotic kiwi for a sweet escape.
Plum Kiwi:

Experience lush decadence with Plum Kiwi. Dark plums meet invigorating kiwi, elevating this flavor.
Raspberry Mango:

Savor the perfect balance of sweet and tart with Raspberry Mango. Plump raspberries entwine with golden mangoes for a sun-kissed orchard delight.
Sour Apple Raspberry:
Unleash electrifying flavor with Sour Apple Raspberry. Crisp green apples collide with tangy raspberries, creating a dance of sour and sweet notes.
Strawberry Ice:

Chill out with Strawberry Ice. Succulent strawberries meet an icy breeze for a cool, fruity sensation that leaves you refreshed.
Watermelon Mint:
Dive into crisp waters with Watermelon Mint. Juicy watermelon takes center stage, while a hint of mint adds a refreshing twist.
Apple Plum Pomegranate
- The crispy sweetness of ripe red apples, the juiciness of fresh plums and the complexity of luscious pomegranate all combine for this one-in-a-million vape flavor. Puff your way through this vibrant orchard of fruity flavors as they do a dance across your palate.

all_text:
RAZ Vape TN9000 | Banana Coconut
[]
RAZ Vape with Battery Indicator, 5% Nicotine

Introducing the RAZ TN9000 by - a vaping experience like no other. This innovative device is equipped with a high-definition screen, customizable airflow, and an astonishing 9000 puffs per charge, transporting you to a vaping future that feels straight out of the year 3000.
Strawberry Ice:

Enjoy the sweetness of ripe red strawberries combined with an
energizing blast of icy coolness. It’s so berry cool!
Blue Razz Ice:

A happy fusion of tart blue raspberries and iced menthol, for a
frosty, berry-filled vape experience to remember.
Triple Berry Ice:

Find yourself immersed in a medley of luscious berries,
including succulent strawberries and juicy blueberries, all dipped in a frosty chill.
Dragon Fruit Lemonade:

product_type_raw_llm:
[INST] <<SYS>> 
            Classify the product described in the text into one of the following categories:
            
            - **CLOSED REFILL**: Prefilled cartridges or pods that are not refillable after use with volume less than 5 mL.
            - **CLOSED SYSTEM**: A vape device or starter kit that uses replaceable, prefilled pods or cartridges.
            - **OPEN SYSTEM**:  A refillable vape product or starter kit with a tank or cartridge that allows users to manually add their choice of e-liquid. Description may include an e-liquid capacity, battery capacity, and a refillable pod or tank.
            - **E-LIQUID**: Bottles of liquid used to refill tanks or pods with volume greater than 10 mL.
            - **DISPOSABLE**: Single-use vaping device that is disposable and non-reusable after e-liquid is depleted. These typically are advertised with an associated puff count or puffs per device.
            - **ACCESSORY**: Components like chargers, mesh coils, batteries, and REPLACEMENT pods or tanks (may have a coil or sub-ohm capacity). 
            
            Return only the category in JSON format, e.g., {"product_class": "E-liquid"}.

product_type_raw_llm:

            Classify the product described in the text into one of the following categories:
            
            - **CLOSED REFILL**: Prefilled cartridges or pods that are not refillable after use with volume less than 5 mL.
            - **CLOSED SYSTEM**: A vape device or starter kit that uses replaceable, prefilled pods or cartridges.
            - **OPEN SYSTEM**:  A refillable vape product or starter kit with a tank or cartridge that allows users to manually add their choice of e-liquid. Description may include an e-liquid capacity, battery capacity, and a refillable pod or tank.
            - **E-LIQUID**: Bottles of liquid used to refill tanks or pods with volume greater than 10 mL.
            - **DISPOSABLE**: Single-use vaping device that is disposable and non-reusable after e-liquid is depleted. These typically are advertised with an associated puff count or puffs per device.
            - **ACCESSORY**: Components like chargers, mesh coils, batteries, and REPLACEMENT pods or tanks (may have a coil or sub-ohm capacity). 
            
            Return only the category in JSON format, e.g., {"product_class": "E-liquid"}.

            Classify the product described in the text into one of the following categories:

            Text: RAZ Vape TN9000 | Peach Grapefruit
[]
RAZ Vape with Battery Indicator, 5% Nicotine

Introducing the RAZ TN9000 by - a vaping experience like no other. This innovative device is equipped with a high-definition screen, customizable airflow, and an astonishing 9000 puffs per charge, transporting you to a vaping future that feels straight out of the year 3000.
Strawberry Ice:

Enjoy the sweetness of ripe red strawberries combined with an
energizing blast of icy coolness. It’s so berry cool!
Blue Razz Ice:

A happy fusion of tart blue raspberries and iced menthol, for a
frosty, berry-filled vape experience to remember.
Triple Berry Ice:

Find yourself immersed in a medley of luscious berries,
including succulent strawberries and juicy blueberries, all dipped in a frosty chill.
Dragon Fruit Lemonade:

A tropical cyclone of exotic dragon fruit supercharged with lemonade, for a tantalizing vaping sensation.
Cactus Jack:

Each puff is full of the unique flavor of cactus, delivering a refreshingly unconventional prickly vaping encounter.
Miami Mint:

It’s a Magic City Puff Party, featuring a cool minty South Beach breeze that's perfect for those seeking a hip mint-flavored vape.
Night Crawler:

Dive into this mysterious vape blend, offering a rich, deep flavor profile that will keep you intrigued puff after puff.
Experience the tangy allure of this fruity vape blend, featuring a tantalizing mix of sourness and tartness.
Strawberry Shortcake:

This classic dessert experience in vapor form features sweet strawberries and creamy cake layers that blend together for a perfectly delectable treat.
Cherry Lemon:

It’s time to enjoy tart cherries and zingy lemon simultaneously in this vibrant and mouth watering vape.
Graham Twist:

The comforting aroma and taste of sweet graham cracker crust, makes for a comforting and indulgent vape.
Blueberry Watermelon:

A delightful combo of ripe mountain blueberries and juicy garden fresh watermelon that delivers a super fruity vape fusion.
Mango Colada:

The luscious taste of mango meets creamy coconut, reminiscent of a pina colada in paradise.
Citronnade:

A zesty lemonade taste with an added blast of citrusy goodness. You’ll love its vibrant and thirst-quenching flavor profile.
Grape Ice:

You have to try this frozen grape sensation, drenched in a cool menthol breeze for a memorable vape experience.
Polar Ice:

You’ll feel like you are on top of the world with this pure menthol delight! It’s an intensely icy sensation that's perfect for those who search for that arctic blast.
Watermelon Ice:

Jump into the juicy natural sweetness of sun ripened watermelon enhanced with a chilled menthol finish. This revitalizing and fruity vape could easily become your favorite.
Banana Coconut:
Indulge in the tropical paradise of Banana Coconut, where the sweet, creamy notes of ripe bananas blend seamlessly with the luscious, exotic essence of coconut.
Blue Raz Cotton Clouds:
Immerse yourself in the whimsical world of Blue Raz Cotton Clouds, a delightful concoction that captures the essence of plump blue raspberries. This vape offers a burst of tangy sweetness reminiscent of your favorite blue raspberry candy, all enveloped in the airy fluffiness of cotton candy.
Orange Raspberry:
Experience the vibrant fusion of citrus and berry with Orange Raspberry, a flavor symphony that marries the zesty kick of ripe oranges with the juicy succulence of tart raspberries.
Peach Grapefruit:
Peach Grapefruit is a delightful combination of sweet ripe peaches and savory grapefruit, for a balanced fruit-filled vape vibe.
Pineapple Passionfruit Guava:
Take a tropical vape escape with Pineapple Passionfruit Guava! This bright blend of exotically intertwined fruit delivers a burst of sunshine. You’ll love the sweet, tart, and aromatic notes of this paradise-inspired vape.
Tobacco:
The timeless sophistication of Tobacco is yours! The rich, robust flavor of this vape features deep, smoky notes of fine, aged tobacco leaves, giving you a super satisfying vaping experience.
White Gummy Watermelon:
White Gummy Watermelon brings a playful twist on tasty fresh watermelon with the sweetness of white gummy candies too! This whimsically fruity vape captures the essence of summer days and nights gone by.
Clear:
The Clear vape flavor provides a lighter menthol taste with every puff. This essentially flavorless vape is just the ticket for adult vapers that enjoy no added sweetness. Finally, the satisfying light menthol kick on the finish provides a straightforward and unadulterated vaping experience.
Georgia Peach:
This vape delivers the natural flavor of sun-kissed, tree ripened Georgia peaches straight from the orchard. This flavor profile is sweet and juicy, so you can revel in the warmth and comfort of a Southern summer day with each puff.

product_type_raw_llm:
[INST] <<SYS>> 
            Classify the product described in the text into one of the following categories:
            
            - **CLOSED REFILL**: Prefilled cartridges or pods that are not refillable after use with volume less than 5 mL.
            - **CLOSED SYSTEM**: A vape device or starter kit that uses replaceable, prefilled pods or cartridges.
            - **OPEN SYSTEM**:  A refillable vape product or starter kit with a tank or cartridge that allows users to manually add their choice of e-liquid. Description may include an e-liquid capacity, battery capacity, and a refillable pod or tank.
            - **E-LIQUID**: Bottles of liquid used to refill tanks or pods with volume greater than 10 mL.
            - **DISPOSABLE**: Single-use vaping device that is disposable and non-reusable after e-liquid is depleted. These typically are advertised with an associated puff count or puffs per device.
            - **ACCESSORY**: Components like chargers, mesh coils, batteries, and REPLACEMENT pods or tanks (may have a coil or sub-ohm capacity). 
            
            Return only the category in JSON format, e.g., {"product_class": "E-liquid"}.

product_type_raw_llm:
[INST] <<SYS>> 
            Classify the product described in the text into one of the following categories:
            
            - **CLOSED REFILL**: Prefilled cartridges or pods that are not refillable after use with volume less than 5 mL.
            - **CLOSED SYSTEM**: A vape device or starter kit that uses replaceable, prefilled pods or cartridges.
            - **OPEN SYSTEM**:  A refillable vape product or starter kit with a tank or cartridge that allows users to manually add their choice of e-liquid. Description may include an e-liquid capacity, battery capacity, and a refillable pod or tank.
            - **E-LIQUID**: Bottles of liquid used to refill tanks or pods with volume greater than 10 mL.
            - **DISPOSABLE**: Single-use vaping device that is disposable and non-reusable after e-liquid is depleted. These typically are advertised with an associated puff count or puffs per device.
            - **ACCESSORY**: Components like chargers, mesh coils, batteries, and REPLACEMENT pods or tanks (may have a coil or sub-ohm capacity). 
            
            Return only the category in JSON format, e.g., {"product_class": "E-liquid"}.

            Text: RAZ Vape TN9000 | Strawberry Shortcake
[]
RAZ Vape with Battery Indicator, 5% Nicotine

Introducing the RAZ TN9000 by - a vaping experience like no other. This innovative device is equipped with a high-definition screen, customizable airflow, and an astonishing 9000 puffs per charge, transporting you to a vaping future that feels straight out of the year 3000.
Strawberry Ice:

Enjoy the sweetness of ripe red strawberries combined with an
energizing blast of icy coolness. It’s so berry cool!
Blue Razz Ice:

A happy fusion of tart blue raspberries and iced menthol, for a
frosty, berry-filled vape experience to remember.
Triple Berry Ice:

Find yourself immersed in a medley of luscious berries,
including succulent strawberries and juicy blueberries, all dipped in a frosty chill.
Dragon Fruit Lemonade:

A tropical cyclone of exotic dragon fruit supercharged with lemonade, for a tantalizing vaping sensation.
Cactus Jack:

Each puff is full of the unique flavor of cactus, delivering a refreshingly unconventional prickly vaping encounter.
Miami Mint:

It’s a Magic City Puff Party, featuring a cool minty South Beach breeze that's perfect for those seeking a hip mint-flavored vape.
Night Crawler:

Dive into this mysterious vape blend, offering a rich, deep flavor profile that will keep you intrigued puff after puff.
Experience the tangy allure of this fruity vape blend, featuring a tantalizing mix of sourness and tartness.
Strawberry Shortcake:

This classic dessert experience in vapor form features sweet strawberries and creamy cake layers that blend together for a perfectly delectable treat.
Cherry Lemon:

It’s time to enjoy tart cherries and zingy lemon simultaneously in this vibrant and mouth watering vape.
Graham Twist:

The comforting aroma and taste of sweet graham cracker crust, makes for a comforting and indulgent vape.
Blueberry Watermelon:

A delightful combo of ripe mountain blueberries and juicy garden fresh watermelon that delivers a super fruity vape fusion.
Mango Colada:

The luscious taste of mango meets creamy coconut, reminiscent of a pina colada in paradise.
Citronnade:

A zesty lemonade taste with an added blast of citrusy goodness. You’ll love its vibrant and thirst-quenching flavor profile.
Grape Ice:

You have to try this frozen grape sensation, drenched in a cool menthol breeze for a memorable vape experience.
Polar Ice:

You’ll feel like you are on top of the world with this pure menthol delight! It’s an intensely icy sensation that's perfect for those who search for that arctic blast.
Watermelon Ice:

Jump into the juicy natural sweetness of sun ripened watermelon enhanced with a chilled menthol finish. This revitalizing and fruity vape could easily become your favorite.
Banana Coconut:
Indulge in the tropical paradise of Banana Coconut, where the sweet, creamy notes of ripe bananas blend seamlessly with the luscious, exotic essence of coconut.
Blue Raz Cotton Clouds:
Immerse yourself in the whimsical world of Blue Raz Cotton Clouds, a delightful concoction that captures the essence of plump blue raspberries. This vape offers a burst of tangy sweetness reminiscent of your favorite blue raspberry candy, all enveloped in the airy fluffiness of cotton candy.
Orange Raspberry:
Experience the vibrant fusion of citrus and berry with Orange Raspberry, a flavor symphony that marries the zesty kick of ripe oranges with the juicy succulence of tart raspberries.
Peach Grapefruit:
Peach Grapefruit is a delightful combination of sweet ripe peaches and savory grapefruit, for a balanced fruit-filled vape vibe.
Pineapple Passionfruit Guava:
Take a tropical vape escape with Pineapple Passionfruit Guava! This bright blend of exotically intertwined fruit delivers a burst of sunshine. You’ll love the sweet, tart, and aromatic notes of this paradise-inspired vape.
Tobacco:
The timeless sophistication of Tobacco is yours! The rich, robust flavor of this vape features deep, smoky notes of fine, aged tobacco leaves, giving you a super satisfying vaping experience.
White Gummy Watermelon:
White Gummy Watermelon brings a playful twist on tasty fresh watermelon with the sweetness of white gummy candies too! This whimsically fruity vape captures the essence of summer days and nights gone by.
Clear:
The Clear vape flavor provides a lighter menthol taste with every puff. This essentially flavorless vape is just the ticket for adult vapers that enjoy no added sweetness. Finally, the satisfying light menthol kick on the finish provides a straightforward and unadulterated vaping experience.
Georgia Peach:
This vape delivers the natural flavor of sun-kissed, tree ripened Georgia peaches straight from the orchard. This flavor profile is sweet and juicy, so you can revel in the warmth and comfort of a Southern summer day with each puff.
Sour Mango Pineapple

:
You will dig the smooth and delicious pineapple flavor and sour punch of mango goodness from the first taste. Enjoy this refreshing combo all day and all night.
Black Cherry Peach:

Hold the essence of black cherries and ripe peaches in your hand as you enjoy the sweet and tart flavor explosion! It’s peachy!
Tropical Storm (Cherry Lime Grapefruit):

A flashy blast of flavor with every puff. Once discovered this “soft drink” flavor created a “tropical storm” of popularity. Best of all? No calories!
*Seasonal Flavor Limited Time* Apple Cinnamon
-
The comforting warmth of cinnamon with the crispness of sweet ripe apples, makes for a flavorful vape that evokes the appealing aroma of freshly baked apple and cinnamon muffins. If you are seeking a delightful balance of spice and fruit, this is the one.
*Seasonal Flavor Limited Time* Pumpkin
- This vape captures the spirit of fall with its earthy pumpkin flavor. Expect a smooth and velvety vape that brings the warmth of the Autumn season directly to your palate.

all_text:
Lost Mary, Turbo-3X more Puffs than OS & MO, Strawberry Melon Peach
[]
High Puff Capacity: Enjoying up to 15000 puffs of flavorful vapor is awesome! The Lost Mary MT15000 Turbo Vape offers you extended vaping sessions without the need for frequent replacements.Wide Range of Flavors: Choose from some of the most creative and delicious flavors, including fruity, menthol, and dessert-inspired blends. Lost Mary Turbo Flavors were created to suit your taste preferences and cravings.Disposable: Say “see ya later” to messy refills and difficult setup instructions. The Lost Mary MT15000 Turbo Vape comes pre-filled and disposable, making it the sensible choice for busy vapers who require convenience without ever compromising on flavor or dependable performance.Compact and Portable: Designed for today’s busy vapers, the Lost Mary MT15000 Turbo Vape is compact and lightweight for discreet carrying in your pocket or purse. Vape with confidence wherever you are!Maintenance Free: With no buttons, coils, or settings to adjust, the Lost Mary MT15000 Turbo Vape is super easy to use. Open the box, pull it out and inhale to activate and start enjoying satisfying vaping experiences every time you puff.Modern Design: Check out the genius-inspired contemporary design! The Lost Mary MT15000 Turbo Vape is as cool looking as it is functional, making it a must have accessory for vapers on the move.1 x Lost Mary MT15000 Turbo Vape Device16ml juice reservoir Smooth or Turbo Mode Capability
It’s all about convenience when you are vaping with the
Lost Mary MT15000 Turbo Vape
. If you demand excellence with every puff, this is the perfect vape for you. The Lost Mary Turbo Vape delivers high puff capacity, a wide range of flavors and a user-friendly design allowing you to take your vaping experience to the highest level of satisfaction.
Built to impress with performance and convenience, this advanced vape device brings an impressive 15000-puff capacity to your vape game right out of the box! The Lost Mary MT15000 Turbo never needs refills or recharging. Its modern design, long-lasting high level performance and user-friendly operation makes the Lost Mary MT15000 Turbo Vape the perfect choice for today’s busy vape lovers!

all_text:
Lost Mary MO5000 | Mango Peach
[]
This e-liquid disposable vape device is specifically designed to meet the needs of those looking for an easy and convenient vaping experience. Featuring a high-capacity 13.5ml e-liquid tank, it can deliver around 5000 puffs before needing a refill. Additionally, its rechargeable 500mAh battery can keep up with even the most power-hungry vapers without any difficulty. Furthermore, it uses a modern mesh coil technology that heats the e-liquid more evenly than traditional coils, resulting in more flavorful hits every time. On top of that, the juice inside comes in 50mg (5 percent) strength, allowing for an intense yet smooth throat hit.
E-liquid capacity: 13.5ml5000 puffs approx.500mAh rechargeable batteryMesh coil50mg (5%) strengthUSB-C charger not included
The Lost Mary Vape by Elf Bar MO5000 is the perfect vape pen for experienced and beginner users alike. It offers an easy-to-use device with premium construction that packs a punch in terms of performance. This disposable vape is powered by a 650mAh battery, giving it plenty of battery life for a full day of use. The 13ml capacity is more than enough for most average vapers and should offer hours of vaping enjoyment. The mesh coils provide intense flavor profiles, ensuring every puff tastes great.
Additionally, this vape device has a cool battery indicator system featuring LED colors that make it easy to tell when the battery levels are high, medium, or low. This helps you accurately estimate how much power is left in the device so you don't find yourself stranded without any juice in your tank at a critical time. All these great features come within an eye-catching shell that looks stylish and prestigious, making the Lost Mary Vape by Elf Bar MO5000 the perfect choice for people who vape and are searching for optimum performance and convenience in one package.
The Lost Mary Vape by Elf Bar MO5000 is readily available at White Horse Vapor - our team searches the globe for superior vape products that deliver the best vapor production and flavor We are pleased to offer you the best vape products on the market today. We guarantee satisfaction from start to finish.

all_text:
Lost Mary MO20000 Pro | Dragon Drink
[]
Lost Mary MO20000 Pro Disposable Vape - 20,000 Puffs, 5% Nicotine
Lost Mary MO20000 Pro Vape
has been found! This cutting-edge vaping device combines innovation, style, and high performance, taking your vaping game to the limit. Manufactured with precision engineering and only premium materials, this device is designed to meet the needs of new and long time vapers alike. Let's dig further into the key features that make the Lost Mary MO20000 Pro Vape stand out on today’s very crowded landscape of vaping devices:
High-Capacity Battery

:

This EBDesign Vape comes with a powerful 20000mAh built-in battery. This allows Lost Mary MO20000 Pro Vape to bring you extended vaping sessions every day, without the need for frequent recharging. Forget about low battery anxiety and enjoy uninterrupted vaping pleasure from now on.
Large E-liquid Capacity

:

With an 18 ml e-liquid capacity reservoir, Lost Mary by EBDesign vape has solved the hassle of constant refills! Vape non-stop to your heart's content! Casual vapers and cloud-chasing aficionados will agree… the generous e-liquid capacity of the Lost Mary MO20000 Pro ensures a satisfying vaping experience time and time again.
Adjustable Wattage Control

:

Dial up your own vaping strength to satisfy your personal preferences, with the Lost Mary MO20000 Pro's adjustable wattage control feature. By adjusting the wattage output, you can modify vapor production and flavor intensity any time you want, giving you full control over your vaping experience.
Intuitive OLED Display

:

Stay informed and in control with the Lost Mary MO20000 Pro's intuitive OLED display screen. Effortlessly monitor battery life, custom wattage settings, coil resistance, and more all at a glance. Real-time feedback for today’s vape enthusiasts seeking optimized vaping experiences only.
Creative Construction

: Built to withstand the rigors of frequent daily use, the Lost Mary MO20000 Pro Vape features durable construction that gives you confidence, long-lasting pleasure and perfect performance. From its sturdy chassis to its high-quality components, every aspect of this device has been created for reliability and durability.
Safety Protections

:

Thanks to the Lost Mary MO20000 Pro's comprehensive safety features, you can enjoy peace of mind while you indulge. Built-in protection includes overcharge protection, short circuit protection and even low voltage protection. A safe and enjoyable vaping experience is yours with every puff.
USB-C Charging Convenience

:

It’s all about fast and convenient charging action with the Lost Mary MO20000 Pro's USB-C charging port. You’ll be amazed by the rapid charging times, as you start spending less time waiting around and more time vaping.
Blue Razz Ice

: Prepare yourself for an exhilarating journey with Blue Razz Ice.
An attention grabbing concoction of flavors that recreates classic blue raspberry taste, enhanced by an ice-cold menthol finish on the exhale. Take a Blue Razz trip today!
Dragon Drink

: Vape your way on a mystical adventure with EBDesign’s Dragon Drink vape flavor. This magical vape captures the taste of exotic dragon fruit, mixing its unique sweetness with a dash of tropical goodness. Feel the unbridled energy of the dragon as it titillates your taste buds, leaving you craving more.
Miami Mint

:

Finally a flavor that’s as cool as you!
Now you can get a Miami nightlife, while enjoying the refreshingly light menthol sensation this EB Design vape flavor delivers! Taste South Beach tropical freshness like a native, and make your own clouds too!
Pineapple Ice

: Juicy golden pineapple is where it’s at! This island favorite is infused with a frigid blast of menthol, making for a refreshing and unique vape experience. Each puff is like sipping on a frozen pineapple cocktail on the beach, leaving you with a feeling of cool rejuvenation.
Rainbow Sherbet

:

A melange of tangy citrus fruits and naturally sweet berries bring a burst of vibrant flavor to each pleasurable puff! Think rainbow-colored sherbet! You’ll also enjoy thinking back to some of your favorite childhood frozen treats packed into each draw.
Rocket Popsicle

:

Take a little trip down memory lane with Rocket Popsicle. The sweet, tangy taste of cherry, blue raspberry, and lemon, just like that iconic red, white, and blue popsicle we all remember and loved. Let the flavors of summer swim around on your palate, leaving you feeling chilled and thrilled.
Watermelon Ice

:

This one tastes like ice-cold watermelon on a hot summer day, pure and simple. It refreshes puff after puff with a generous amount of mouthwatering watermelon flavor. A good sized dose of ice-cold menthol comes in on the finish, creating a tasty cool vape of the highest quality.
Your vaping experiences will enjoy new boundaries of pleasure with the Lost Mary MO20000 Pro Vape. Power, performance, and style converge to create a totally exceptional vaping device.
Whether you're a vaping veteran or just dipping your toes into the vape scene, the Lost Mary MO20000 Pro Vape has got your back for vaping experiences that are off the charts.

With an 18 ml e-liquid capacity reservoir, Lost Mary by EBDesign vape has solved the hassle of constant refills! Vape non-stop to your heart's content! Casual vapers and cloud-chasing aficionados will agree… the generous e-liquid capacity of the Lost Mary MO20000 Pro ensures a satisfying vaping experience time and time again.
Adjustable Wattage Control

:

Dial up your own vaping strength to satisfy your personal preferences, with the Lost Mary MO20000 Pro's adjustable wattage control feature. By adjusting the wattage output, you can modify vapor production and flavor intensity any time you want, giving you full control over your vaping experience.
Intuitive OLED Display

:

Stay informed and in control with the Lost Mary MO20000 Pro's intuitive OLED display screen. Effortlessly monitor battery life, custom wattage settings, coil resistance, and more all at a glance. Real-time feedback for today’s vape enthusiasts seeking optimized vaping experiences only.
Creative Construction

: Built to withstand the rigors of frequent daily use, the Lost Mary MO20000 Pro Vape features durable construction that gives you confidence, long-lasting pleasure and perfect performance. From its sturdy chassis to its high-quality components, every aspect of this device has been created for reliability and durability.
Safety Protections

:

Thanks to the Lost Mary MO20000 Pro's comprehensive safety features, you can enjoy peace of mind while you indulge. Built-in protection includes overcharge protection, short circuit protection and even low voltage protection. A safe and enjoyable vaping experience is yours with every puff.
USB-C Charging Convenience

:

It’s all about fast and convenient charging action with the Lost Mary MO20000 Pro's USB-C charging port. You’ll be amazed by the rapid charging times, as you start spending less time waiting around and more time vaping.
Blue Razz Ice

: Prepare yourself for an exhilarating journey with Blue Razz Ice.
An attention grabbing concoction of flavors that recreates classic blue raspberry taste, enhanced by an ice-cold menthol finish on the exhale. Take a Blue Razz trip today!
Dragon Drink

: Vape your way on a mystical adventure with EBDesign’s Dragon Drink vape flavor. This magical vape captures the taste of exotic dragon fruit, mixing its unique sweetness with a dash of tropical goodness. Feel the unbridled energy of the dragon as it titillates your taste buds, leaving you craving more.
Miami Mint

:

Finally a flavor that’s as cool as you!
Now you can get a Miami nightlife, while enjoying the refreshingly light menthol sensation this EB Design vape flavor delivers! Taste South Beach tropical freshness like a native, and make your own clouds too!
Pineapple Ice

: Juicy golden pineapple is where it’s at! This island favorite is infused with a frigid blast of menthol, making for a refreshing and unique vape experience. Each puff is like sipping on a frozen pineapple cocktail on the beach, leaving you with a feeling of cool rejuvenation.
Rainbow Sherbet

:

A melange of tangy citrus fruits and naturally sweet berries bring a burst of vibrant flavor to each pleasurable puff! Think rainbow-colored sherbet! You’ll also enjoy thinking back to some of your favorite childhood frozen treats packed into each draw.
Rocket Popsicle

:

Take a little trip down memory lane with Rocket Popsicle. The sweet, tangy taste of cherry, blue raspberry, and lemon, just like that iconic red, white, and blue popsicle we all remember and loved. Let the flavors of summer swim around on your palate, leaving you feeling chilled and thrilled.
Watermelon Ice

:

This one tastes like ice-cold watermelon on a hot summer day, pure and simple. It refreshes puff after puff with a generous amount of mouthwatering watermelon flavor. A good sized dose of ice-cold menthol comes in on the finish, creating a tasty cool vape of the highest quality.
Your vaping experiences will enjoy new boundaries of pleasure with the Lost Mary MO20000 Pro Vape. Power, performance, and style converge to create a totally exceptional vaping device.
Whether you're a vaping veteran or just dipping your toes into the vape scene, the Lost Mary MO20000 Pro Vape has got your back for vaping experiences that are off the charts.

all_text:
Strawberry Watermelon (Luster Edition) Lost Mary by Elf Bar OS5000
[]
This e-cigarette liquid is a great choice for those looking to enjoy vaping with a long-lasting bottle. Featuring a 13ml capacity and up to 5000 estimated puffs, your device will last you significantly longer than other liquids currently on the market. The 650mAh rechargeable battery is incredibly powerful and performs excellently with every puff. Furthermore, the mesh coil helps evenly distribute heat through the device, so you experience a more robust flavor from each puff. And, of course, this e-liquid comes in 50mg (5%) strength for a reliable performance every time. It should be noted that this product does not include a USB-C charger, which must be purchased separately, making it important you check compatibility before purchasing one.

This e-liquid offers great value for money and excellent features that make it ideal for any vaper. The 13ml bottle and high-capacity rechargeable battery make it perfect for long trips or extended sessions while also lasting longer than most other options on the market. The powerful mesh coil ensures even heat distribution throughout each puff and makes for delightful flavor in each draw of vapor too! Lastly, with 5% strength available, you can count on consistent quality no matter how often you vape.E-liquid capacity: 13ml5000 puffs approx.650mAh rechargeable batteryMesh coil50mg (5%) strengthUSB-C charger not included
The Lost Mary Elf Bar OS5000 Puff Disposable Vape is a remarkable piece of engineering, packing performance, and style into one neat package. Featuring a candy-shell and flagon design, with 37 vibrant flavors to choose from, it’s the perfect choice for both casual and advanced vapers alike. The OS5000 offers an impressive 5000-puff lifespan, so you don’t have to worry about constantly running out of juice. To top it off, the device is equipped with a battery indicator that changes color to signify charge level – green (high), blue (medium), or red (low) – meaning you can always make sure your device is adequately charged before hitting it. In addition, it can be recharged with a standard USB-C cable if your battery does run low. Altogether this vape has made its mark in the vaping market, appealing to all types of users due to its versatility and efficiency.
White Horse Vapor offers excellent customer service and free shipping for orders over $59. They also have a wide selection of vape products available for immediate shipment. Take a look at the extensive collection and consider joining the VapeWH community.

all_text:
iJoy Captain 10000 Vape | Banana Pinacolada
[]
Captain 10000 Vape by iJOY
The trusted brand iJOY introduces a brand new innovation in vapor technology. With an impressive 10000 puffs, the iJOY Captain Vape keeps you on your journey for longer. It's like having a treasure chest of unforgettable moments at your fingertips, ready to satisfy your cravings anytime, anywhere. Whether you're relaxing on your deck or conquering uncharted territories, this vaping device is the perfect first mate.
Captain by iJOY Specifications

5% Nicotine 50mg
18 mL Pre Filled Capacity
Approximately 10000 Puffs
Battery Indicator
E-Liquid Level Indicator
Adjustable Airflow
USB-C Rechargeable
Flavors for Captain Vape
Cool Mint:
You’ll love this breath of crisp, arctic air with each inhale, perfect for those seeking a refreshing and soothing vaping experience. The icy minty notes will leave you feeling so fresh.
Blueberry Watermelon:
Jump into the tasty flavors of Blueberry and Watermelon. Ripe mountain blueberries blend so well with juicy watermelon, creating a delightful combination of fruity goodness that will do a jig on your taste buds.
Strawberry Dragon Fruit:
Strawberry Dragon Fruit combines the scrumptious sweetness of ripe strawberries with exotic allure dragon fruit. This e-liquid transports your palate to an imaginary paradise where the perfect balance of fruity flavors rules.
Strawberry Watermelon:
Strawberry Watermelon brings you the best of both vape worlds, combining the iconic sweet taste of strawberries with the juiciness
of watermelon. It's a delightful duo of fruity goodness that's super hard to resist.
Mango Melon Strawberry:
Suit up for a tropical vape adventure with Mango Melon Strawberry. The blend of ripe mangoes, juicy melons, and sweet strawberries brings your taste buds to a sunny beachside paradise.
Banana Pinacolada:
If you like Pina Colada... Banana Piñacolada is like sipping a tropical cocktail by the ocean. Ripe bananas and sweet pineapple blend so well together, for a creamy coconut tasting vape.
Kiwi Berry:
Kiwi Berry slaps you with a tangy, but not too sweet vape flavor. Ripe kiwis and choice berries fuse together for a vibrant vaping sensation.
Cherry Strawberry Kiwi:
A hat trick of the classic fruit flavors gets together in Cherry Strawberry Kiwi. This fantastic blend of cherries, ripe strawberries, and tangy kiwis is a fruit lover's dream.
Strawberry Cotton Candy:
It's like a trip to the carnival, featuring Strawberry Cotton Candy. This e-liquid captures the sugary sweetness of cotton candy combined with a splash of ripe strawberries.
Blue Raspberry Ice:

The trusted brand iJOY introduces a brand new innovation in vapor technology. With an impressive 10000 puffs, the iJOY Captain Vape keeps you on your journey for longer. It's like having a treasure chest of unforgettable moments at your fingertips, ready to satisfy your cravings anytime, anywhere. Whether you're relaxing on your deck or conquering uncharted territories, this vaping device is the perfect first mate.
Captain by iJOY Specifications

18 mL Pre Filled Capacity
Approximately 10000 Puffs
Battery Indicator
E-Liquid Level Indicator

all_text:
iJoy TaijiZen Judo 24000 | Lemon Peach Passion Fruit
[]
iJoy TaijiZen Judo 24000 Disposable Vape

The best in vape innovation has arrived!  The IJOY TajiZen Judo Vape 24000 is a state of the art vape device that offers unbeatable performance and flavor. Engineered with great attention to detail, the TajiZen Judo Vape 24000 offers many futuristic features and a stylish design that just loves to be held. Its long-lasting battery ensures a super extended vaping experience every time.
IJOY TajiZen Judo Vape Flavors

Apple Kiwi
: Totally crisp and refreshing! The fusion of apple and kiwi has the perfect amount of apple tartness and exotic kiwi taste for a burst of fruity goodness you’ll love. It’s the perfect vape refreshment.
Berry Bubble Gum
: It tastes as good as it sounds! This is a “blast from the past” blend of mixed berries all wrapped up in the chewy goodness of sugary bubblegum. It’s a playful flavor boasting sweet fruit and a taste of the past in every puff.
Blackberry Cherry
: Who doesn’t love the taste of blackberries and cherries? They get together in this vape filled with fruity goodness. This tasty combination offers a vaping experience that's perfectly satisfying and fabulously flavorful.
Blue Raspberry Ice
: Chill out with the icy flavor detonation of Blue Raspberry Ice. Tangy blue raspberries are enhanced with a menthol chill for a crisply invigorating vape. It is a frozen flavor full of fruity sweetness followed by ice cold mint.
Blue Strawberry Coconut
: What will they think of next? This tempting blend of ripe strawberries, creamy coconut, and juicy blueberries is a total tongue teaser. Dig this taste of the tropics!
Chilled Watermelon
: Juicy and refreshing watermelon flavor is brought to life with a splash of cool menthol. This frozen watermelon blend brings a burst of fruity followed by a cooling mint finish.
Cool Mint
: Super
cool is here. This minty flavor hits differently, with a crisp, rejuvenating feeling each time you puff. Cool off and stay cool today.
Cranberry Soda
: It’s a fizzy, thirst quencher made from tart cranberries and sparkling soda that drops a blast of funky fruit flavor on your palate. Get some Cranberry Soda soon!
Lemon Peach Passionfruit:
It’s like puffing on a fruit smoothie! Zesty lemons, succulent peaches, and tropical passionfruit all come together perfectly. This flavor combo offers a big time explosion of citrus and sweetness with a tropical twist.
Mango Lime Pineapple
: Bright and delightful, this must have mixture of juicy mangoes, tangy limes, and ripe, golden pineapples drops a burst of tropical goodness on your tongue with every puff. This island combo offers a revitalizing vape flavor just right for summertime enjoyment.
Pineapple Lime
: Revel in the zesty and exhilarating flavor of Pineapple Lime, where hand picked limes are matched with naturally sweet pineapple, for a burst of equatorial goodness. This one is a puff perfect balance of sweet and tart, for vape sessions that are both invigorating and fulfilling.
Sour Strawberry Grape
: You need the tangy, piquant flavor of Sour Strawberry Grape in your life. It’s all about ripe strawberries and juicy grapes finished with a sour twist. This bold burst of fruity flavor and flavorful is a tantalizing mixture of sweet and sour that's sure to awaken your thirsty taste buds.
Triple Mango:
Get into a triple vape paradise with this crazy good blend of three different varieties of mango. The phenomenal taste in every puff will satisfy every mango lover’s wildest cravings.
Watermelon Chew:
You’ll definitely appreciate the juicy deliciousness of Watermelon Chew. Puff on ripe watermelon flavor with just a touch of sweetness for a totally unique vape experience. This is an instant classic that offers an all-day, enjoyable vape solution.
White Strawberry Ice
: The delicate taste of White Strawberry Ice is a result of ripe garden strawberries mixed with the perfect amount of cold menthol. It’s a crisp and invigorating vape with an amazingly cool minty finish.
White Gummy Bears
-
Indulge in the nostalgic taste of White Gummy Bears with iJoy TaijiZen Judo. This delightful flavor perfectly captures the sweet, juicy essence of one of your favorite childhood candies. It consistently delivers a silky smooth vaping experience that will take you back to more carefree times.
Each one of these choices from IJOY TajiZen Judo 24K Vape flavors offers a unique vaping experience. There's a taste preference for every vaper to enjoy with TajiZen Judo 24000 Puffs.
High Capacity Battery
: Comes with a powerful 24000mAh battery, the IJOY TajiZen Judo Vape 24000 delivers consistently long-lasting vape sessions without ever having to recharge! Enjoy uninterrupted vaping enjoyment all day and night.
Advanced Chipset Technology
: The advanced chipset technology allows the TajiZen Judo 24k Disposable Vape to deliver unparalleled performance, lightning fast heating, and precision temperature control for a consistently rewarding vape experience.
Ultra Compatibility
: With its wide range of vape tanks and coils, the TajiZen Judo Vape 24000 allows you to  personalize your vaping experience the way you like it, whether you prefer mouth-to-lung or direct-lung vaping styles. This is so cool!
Slick Ergonomic Design:
Featuring a slick, attractive design, the TajiZen Judo Vape 24000 loves to live in the palm of your hand. Its highly intuitive controls and clear OLED display screen makes for easy navigation and futuristic customization.
Safety Features
: Safety features have been built into the TajiZen Judo Vape 24000. It is equipped with a range of safety features, including overheating protection, short circuit protection, and low battery protection, and even a child safety feature. Welcome to the world of worry-free vaping.
Components
:
1 x IJOY TajiZen Judo 24000 Vape Mod
2 Diverse Vaping Modes (Standard) (Boosted)
1 x User Manual
Child Lock Feature prevents unintended usage
Intuitive Touch Screen Performance
Exceptional Battery and Coil Performance
You can now jump to the next level of vaping performance with the IJOY TajiZen Judo Vape 24000. Experienced and novice vapers will love this advanced vape system. The wide range of features and customizable options are ready-made to suit your needs. Rise above the vape competition today with the IJOY TajiZen Judo Vape 24000.

all_text:
iJoy SD 22000 Disposable | Strawberry Watermelon
[]
iJoy SD 22000 Disposable Vape 22k Puffs With 5% Nicotine

Reach the pinnacle of vaping technology with the iJoy Bar SD22000 Disposable Vape. Engineered for precise performance and reliability, this futuristic vape device brings you unparalleled vaping experiences for beginners and experienced vapers alike. With its innovative features, slick design elements and exceptional flavor delivery, the iJoy Disposable Vape will become your perfect puff companion. Vapers who seek the ultimate vaping experience can add this one to their list.
High Capacity Battery
: Comes equipped with a very powerful 22000mAh battery. This ensures that the iJoy Bar SD22000 Vape will deliver long-lasting vape sessions without the need for frequent recharging. Now you can vape with confidence any time you want.
Advanced Chipset Technology
: With its advanced chipset, the iJoy SD22000 delivers rapid firing, exact temperature control and multiple vaping modes for that customized vaping experience everyone is seeking.
Big Display Screen
: You’ll appreciate the fact that the iJoy SD22000 Vape has a large, clear OLED display screen. It provides real-time vaping data such as wattage, coil resistance and even battery life so you’ll never be left in the dark.
Refined Ergonomic Design
: With its comfortable cushy design, the iJoy SD22000 Vape fits perfectly in your hand, pocket or purse. It’s perfect for on-the-go vaping anytime and wherever you are.
Intuitive User Interface
: It is easy and a pleasure to navigate the iJoy SD22000 Vape's intuitive user interface. Featuring simple controls and a user-friendly design, adjusting settings and monitoring your vaping experience is a breeze. Check out the iJoy SD22000 Vape Manual!
Multiple Protections
: Safety is paramount with the iJoy SD22000 Vape. It comes equipped with multiple safety features including overheating protection, short circuit protection, and even low battery protection for a worry-free vaping experience.
Components
:
1 x iJoy SD22000 Vape Device
1 x Micro USB Type C Charging Cable
1 x User Manual
0.8-ohm Mesh Coil
Adjustable Power Modes
Flavor Descriptions:
Black Ice
: Brace yourself for a chilling blast of flavor with Black Ice from iJoy Bar SD22000. This electrifying blend brings the bold taste of blackcurrant together with a wonderful menthol undertone, for a refreshing and frosty vaping experience that will awaken your senses with every inhale.
Colombian Coffee Ice
: Indulge in the rich and robust flavor of Colombian coffee, magically infused with a hint of icy coolness. Colombian Coffee Ice from iJoy Bar SD22000 is perfect for coffee lovers seeking a refreshing pick-me-up. This flavor offers a smooth and invigorating vaping experience that will tantalize your taste and revitalize your taste buds.
Iced Peach Colada
: Bring your taste to a tropical paradise with Iced Peach Colada from iJoy Bar SD22000. This sexy, exotic blend combines juicy peaches, creamy coconut, and a pinch of icy menthol, creating a refreshing vaping experience that just might remind you of sipping a frozen colada on a sun-drenched beach.
Mango Pineapple
: Vape into a tropical oasis with Mango Pineapple from iJoy Bar SD22000. Absolutely bursting with the sweet flavors of sun-ripened mangoes and juicy pineapples, this tropical blend brings you a taste of paradise with every puff.
Strawberry Watermelon
: It’s thirst quenching time! The juicy sweetness of Strawberry Watermelon from iJoy Bar SD22000 is here. This mouthwatering choice combines ripe strawberries and bright watermelon, for an irresistible flavor that will leave your taste buds tingling with joy.
Watermelon Ice Cubes
: Chill out everyone! Watermelon Ice Cubes flavor from iJoy Bar SD22000 is as good as it sounds! This ice-cold blend shows off the stimulating taste of juicy watermelon infused with a menthol blast, for an invigorating vaping experience that leaves you feeling revitalized.
Apple Gummies
: You should treat your taste buds to this delightful taste with Apple Gummies from iJoy SD220000. It’s a sweet, tangy blend that captures the essence of ripe apples and irresistible chewy gummy candies. This delectable vaping experience is very satisfying.
Arctic Mint
: You’ll feel the refreshing blast of coolness with Arctic Mint from iJoy SD220000 from your first puff. Combine the icy freshness of arctic menthol with a hint of peppermint for a crisp and refreshing flavor profile that will awaken your senses puff after puff.
Blackberry Cherry Lemon
: The burst of fruity goodness with Blackberry Cherry Lemon from iJoy SD220000 is fantastic. The juicy sweetness of ripe blackberries and cherries plus a zesty twist of lemon, create a fearless fusion of flavors that your taste buds will thank you for.
Blue Raspberry Ice
: A pool of icy blue raspberry goodness awaits, with Blue Raspberry Ice from iJoy SD220000. Meticulously mixing the bold and tangy flavor of blue raspberries with a cold blast of menthol, makes for a crisp vaping experience that leaves you feeling fresh.
Cherry Berry
: Shut those cravings down with Cherry Berry from iJoy SD220000. This luscious flavor features the succulent flavor of ripe Bing cherries with a medley of mixed berries that creates a mouthwatering detonation of fruit goodness that will delight all your senses.
Froze Strawberry Cream
: Indulge in a frosty and creamy delight with this decadent blend that combines sweet ripe strawberries with rich creamy vanilla. Finish this off with a cool and refreshing exhale, and you’ll enjoy a luxurious vaping experience again and again.
Grape Jelly
: If you want to experience an irresistible flavor from your past, check out Grape Jelly from iJoy SD220000. This blend brings the essence of sweet and tangy grape jelly, for a burst of fruity goodness that’s hard to ignore.
Gummy Bears
: Take a trip down memory lane! Gummy Bears from iJoy SD220000 is a playful blend that captures the essence of chewy gummy candies, bursting with fruity flavors that dance across the palate and leave you craving more.
Juicy Mango Peach:
It’s tropical paradise time, with Juicy Peach Mango from iJoy SD220000. This island blend joins the juicy sweetness of ripe peaches with the tropical tanginess of mangoes. The result is a luscious flavor directly from sun-drenched beaches and palm-fringed shores.
Are you ready to experience the next level of vaping with the iJoy SD22000 Vape? Can you handle its high-capacity battery, advanced chipset technology, and sleek design?
We know you can
…making it the ultimate choice for vapers who demand excellence in every puff. Elevate your vaping experience with the iJoy SD22000 Vape today.

: It is easy and a pleasure to navigate the iJoy SD22000 Vape's intuitive user interface. Featuring simple controls and a user-friendly design, adjusting settings and monitoring your vaping experience is a breeze. Check out the iJoy SD22000 Vape Manual!
Multiple Protections
: Safety is paramount with the iJoy SD22000 Vape. It comes equipped with multiple safety features including overheating protection, short circuit protection, and even low battery protection for a worry-free vaping experience.
Components
:
1 x iJoy SD22000 Vape Device
1 x Micro USB Type C Charging Cable
1 x User Manual
0.8-ohm Mesh Coil
Adjustable Power Modes
Flavor Descriptions:
Black Ice
: Brace yourself for a chilling blast of flavor with Black Ice from iJoy Bar SD22000. This electrifying blend brings the bold taste of blackcurrant together with a wonderful menthol undertone, for a refreshing and frosty vaping experience that will awaken your senses with every inhale.
Colombian Coffee Ice
: Indulge in the rich and robust flavor of Colombian coffee, magically infused with a hint of icy coolness. Colombian Coffee Ice from iJoy Bar SD22000 is perfect for coffee lovers seeking a refreshing pick-me-up. This flavor offers a smooth and invigorating vaping experience that will tantalize your taste and revitalize your taste buds.
Iced Peach Colada
: Bring your taste to a tropical paradise with Iced Peach Colada from iJoy Bar SD22000. This sexy, exotic blend combines juicy peaches, creamy coconut, and a pinch of icy menthol, creating a refreshing vaping experience that just might remind you of sipping a frozen colada on a sun-drenched beach.
Mango Pineapple
: Vape into a tropical oasis with Mango Pineapple from iJoy Bar SD22000. Absolutely bursting with the sweet flavors of sun-ripened mangoes and juicy pineapples, this tropical blend brings you a taste of paradise with every puff.
Strawberry Watermelon
: It’s thirst quenching time! The juicy sweetness of Strawberry Watermelon from iJoy Bar SD22000 is here. This mouthwatering choice combines ripe strawberries and bright watermelon, for an irresistible flavor that will leave your taste buds tingling with joy.
Watermelon Ice Cubes
: Chill out everyone! Watermelon Ice Cubes flavor from iJoy Bar SD22000 is as good as it sounds! This ice-cold blend shows off the stimulating taste of juicy watermelon infused with a menthol blast, for an invigorating vaping experience that leaves you feeling revitalized.
Apple Gummies
: You should treat your taste buds to this delightful taste with Apple Gummies from iJoy SD220000. It’s a sweet, tangy blend that captures the essence of ripe apples and irresistible chewy gummy candies. This delectable vaping experience is very satisfying.
Arctic Mint
: You’ll feel the refreshing blast of coolness with Arctic Mint from iJoy SD220000 from your first puff. Combine the icy freshness of arctic menthol with a hint of peppermint for a crisp and refreshing flavor profile that will awaken your senses puff after puff.
Blackberry Cherry Lemon
: The burst of fruity goodness with Blackberry Cherry Lemon from iJoy SD220000 is fantastic. The juicy sweetness of ripe blackberries and cherries plus a zesty twist of lemon, create a fearless fusion of flavors that your taste buds will thank you for.
Blue Raspberry Ice
: A pool of icy blue raspberry goodness awaits, with Blue Raspberry Ice from iJoy SD220000. Meticulously mixing the bold and tangy flavor of blue raspberries with a cold blast of menthol, makes for a crisp vaping experience that leaves you feeling fresh.
Cherry Berry
: Shut those cravings down with Cherry Berry from iJoy SD220000. This luscious flavor features the succulent flavor of ripe Bing cherries with a medley of mixed berries that creates a mouthwatering detonation of fruit goodness that will delight all your senses.
Froze Strawberry Cream
: Indulge in a frosty and creamy delight with this decadent blend that combines sweet ripe strawberries with rich creamy vanilla. Finish this off with a cool and refreshing exhale, and you’ll enjoy a luxurious vaping experience again and again.
Grape Jelly
: If you want to experience an irresistible flavor from your past, check out Grape Jelly from iJoy SD220000. This blend brings the essence of sweet and tangy grape jelly, for a burst of fruity goodness that’s hard to ignore.
Gummy Bears
: Take a trip down memory lane! Gummy Bears from iJoy SD220000 is a playful blend that captures the essence of chewy gummy candies, bursting with fruity flavors that dance across the palate and leave you craving more.
Juicy Mango Peach:
It’s tropical paradise time, with Juicy Peach Mango from iJoy SD220000. This island blend joins the juicy sweetness of ripe peaches with the tropical tanginess of mangoes. The result is a luscious flavor directly from sun-drenched beaches and palm-fringed shores.
Are you ready to experience the next level of vaping with the iJoy SD22000 Vape? Can you handle its high-capacity battery, advanced chipset technology, and sleek design?
We know you can
…making it the ultimate choice for vapers who demand excellence in every puff. Elevate your vaping experience with the iJoy SD22000 Vape today.

all_text:
iJoy Captain 10000 Vape | Apple Plum Pomegranate
[]
Captain 10000 Vape by iJOY
The trusted brand iJOY introduces a brand new innovation in vapor technology. With an impressive 10000 puffs, the iJOY Captain Vape keeps you on your journey for longer. It's like having a treasure chest of unforgettable moments at your fingertips, ready to satisfy your cravings anytime, anywhere. Whether you're relaxing on your deck or conquering uncharted territories, this vaping device is the perfect first mate.
Captain by iJOY Specifications

5% Nicotine 50mg
18 mL Pre Filled Capacity
Approximately 10000 Puffs
Battery Indicator
E-Liquid Level Indicator
Adjustable Airflow
USB-C Rechargeable
Flavors for Captain Vape
Cool Mint:
You’ll love this breath of crisp, arctic air with each inhale, perfect for those seeking a refreshing and soothing vaping experience. The icy minty notes will leave you feeling so fresh.
Blueberry Watermelon:
Jump into the tasty flavors of Blueberry and Watermelon. Ripe mountain blueberries blend so well with juicy watermelon, creating a delightful combination of fruity goodness that will do a jig on your taste buds.
Strawberry Dragon Fruit:
Strawberry Dragon Fruit combines the scrumptious sweetness of ripe strawberries with exotic allure dragon fruit. This e-liquid transports your palate to an imaginary paradise where the perfect balance of fruity flavors rules.
Strawberry Watermelon:
Strawberry Watermelon brings you the best of both vape worlds, combining the iconic sweet taste of strawberries with the juiciness
of watermelon. It's a delightful duo of fruity goodness that's super hard to resist.
Mango Melon Strawberry:
Suit up for a tropical vape adventure with Mango Melon Strawberry. The blend of ripe mangoes, juicy melons, and sweet strawberries brings your taste buds to a sunny beachside paradise.
Banana Pinacolada:
If you like Pina Colada... Banana Piñacolada is like sipping a tropical cocktail by the ocean. Ripe bananas and sweet pineapple blend so well together, for a creamy coconut tasting vape.
Kiwi Berry:
Kiwi Berry slaps you with a tangy, but not too sweet vape flavor. Ripe kiwis and choice berries fuse together for a vibrant vaping sensation.
Cherry Strawberry Kiwi:
A hat trick of the classic fruit flavors gets together in Cherry Strawberry Kiwi. This fantastic blend of cherries, ripe strawberries, and tangy kiwis is a fruit lover's dream.
Strawberry Cotton Candy:
It's like a trip to the carnival, featuring Strawberry Cotton Candy. This e-liquid captures the sugary sweetness of cotton candy combined with a splash of ripe strawberries.
Blue Raspberry Ice:
Blue Raspberry Ice bursts onto the flavor scene with bold, tangy notes of blue raspberry, topped off with an ice cold finish! A truly refreshing vape experience you’ll never get tired of.
Watermelon Bubblegum:
A nostalgic treat is coming your way with Watermelon Bubblegum. The taste of juicy red watermelon is paired just right with the sweet, enticing flavor of classic bubblegum.
Blue Berries:
Blue Berries is a celebration of this berry families finest members. Indulge in the bright taste of freshly picked blueberries, dropping a natural burst of sweetness where it counts…on your tongue!
Frozen Apple Pear:
Combining crisp apples and juicy pears with a frosty twist is what this is all about. An icy sensation complements the fruity flavor, making this vaping adventure a fan favorite.
Tropical Fruit:
Tropical Fruit is like a tornado of exotic flavors. It spins a medley of tropical fruits together to create a vibrant vaping vortex! It’s a fun journey with lots of pleasurable puffing.
Peach Gummy:
Juicy peaches meld with the playful sweetness of gummy candy, creating a mouthwatering vape that's both fruity and irresistibly chewy.
Aloe Blueberry:
Escape to a tranquil oasis with Aloe Blueberry. Succulent blueberries meet soothing aloe vera, creating a mysteriously enchanting and refreshing vape.
Apple Mango:
Dive into a symphony of taste with Apple Mango. Crisp apples meld with ripe mangoes for a harmonious and juicy blend.
Cranberry Bubblegum:

Zesty cranberries playfully collide with nostalgic bubble gum, delivering bold and delightful flavors.
Grape Honeydew:
Indulge in sophistication with Grape Honeydew. Rich grapes meet luscious honeydew, offering a velvety smooth and classy vaping experience.
Pineapple Kiwi:
Transport yourself to a tropical paradise with Pineapple Kiwi. Tangy pineapple pairs seamlessly with exotic kiwi for a sweet escape.
Plum Kiwi:

Experience lush decadence with Plum Kiwi. Dark plums meet invigorating kiwi, elevating this flavor.
Raspberry Mango:

Savor the perfect balance of sweet and tart with Raspberry Mango. Plump raspberries entwine with golden mangoes for a sun-kissed orchard delight.
Sour Apple Raspberry:
Unleash electrifying flavor with Sour Apple Raspberry. Crisp green apples collide with tangy raspberries, creating a dance of sour and sweet notes.
Strawberry Ice:

Chill out with Strawberry Ice. Succulent strawberries meet an icy breeze for a cool, fruity sensation that leaves you refreshed.
Watermelon Mint:
Dive into crisp waters with Watermelon Mint. Juicy watermelon takes center stage, while a hint of mint adds a refreshing twist.
Apple Plum Pomegranate
- The crispy sweetness of ripe red apples, the juiciness of fresh plums and the complexity of luscious pomegranate all combine for this one-in-a-million vape flavor. Puff your way through this vibrant orchard of fruity flavors as they do a dance across your palate.

all_text:
iJoy TaijiZen Judo 24000 | Apple Kiwi
[]
iJoy TaijiZen Judo 24000 Disposable Vape

The best in vape innovation has arrived!  The IJOY TajiZen Judo Vape 24000 is a state of the art vape device that offers unbeatable performance and flavor. Engineered with great attention to detail, the TajiZen Judo Vape 24000 offers many futuristic features and a stylish design that just loves to be held. Its long-lasting battery ensures a super extended vaping experience every time.
IJOY TajiZen Judo Vape Flavors

Apple Kiwi
: Totally crisp and refreshing! The fusion of apple and kiwi has the perfect amount of apple tartness and exotic kiwi taste for a burst of fruity goodness you’ll love. It’s the perfect vape refreshment.
Berry Bubble Gum
: It tastes as good as it sounds! This is a “blast from the past” blend of mixed berries all wrapped up in the chewy goodness of sugary bubblegum. It’s a playful flavor boasting sweet fruit and a taste of the past in every puff.
Blackberry Cherry
: Who doesn’t love the taste of blackberries and cherries? They get together in this vape filled with fruity goodness. This tasty combination offers a vaping experience that's perfectly satisfying and fabulously flavorful.
Blue Raspberry Ice
: Chill out with the icy flavor detonation of Blue Raspberry Ice. Tangy blue raspberries are enhanced with a menthol chill for a crisply invigorating vape. It is a frozen flavor full of fruity sweetness followed by ice cold mint.
Blue Strawberry Coconut
: What will they think of next? This tempting blend of ripe strawberries, creamy coconut, and juicy blueberries is a total tongue teaser. Dig this taste of the tropics!
Chilled Watermelon
: Juicy and refreshing watermelon flavor is brought to life with a splash of cool menthol. This frozen watermelon blend brings a burst of fruity followed by a cooling mint finish.
Cool Mint
: Super
cool is here. This minty flavor hits differently, with a crisp, rejuvenating feeling each time you puff. Cool off and stay cool today.
Cranberry Soda
: It’s a fizzy, thirst quencher made from tart cranberries and sparkling soda that drops a blast of funky fruit flavor on your palate. Get some Cranberry Soda soon!
Lemon Peach Passionfruit:
It’s like puffing on a fruit smoothie! Zesty lemons, succulent peaches, and tropical passionfruit all come together perfectly. This flavor combo offers a big time explosion of citrus and sweetness with a tropical twist.
Mango Lime Pineapple
: Bright and delightful, this must have mixture of juicy mangoes, tangy limes, and ripe, golden pineapples drops a burst of tropical goodness on your tongue with every puff. This island combo offers a revitalizing vape flavor just right for summertime enjoyment.
Pineapple Lime
: Revel in the zesty and exhilarating flavor of Pineapple Lime, where hand picked limes are matched with naturally sweet pineapple, for a burst of equatorial goodness. This one is a puff perfect balance of sweet and tart, for vape sessions that are both invigorating and fulfilling.
Sour Strawberry Grape
: You need the tangy, piquant flavor of Sour Strawberry Grape in your life. It’s all about ripe strawberries and juicy grapes finished with a sour twist. This bold burst of fruity flavor and flavorful is a tantalizing mixture of sweet and sour that's sure to awaken your thirsty taste buds.
Triple Mango:
Get into a triple vape paradise with this crazy good blend of three different varieties of mango. The phenomenal taste in every puff will satisfy every mango lover’s wildest cravings.
Watermelon Chew:
You’ll definitely appreciate the juicy deliciousness of Watermelon Chew. Puff on ripe watermelon flavor with just a touch of sweetness for a totally unique vape experience. This is an instant classic that offers an all-day, enjoyable vape solution.
White Strawberry Ice
: The delicate taste of White Strawberry Ice is a result of ripe garden strawberries mixed with the perfect amount of cold menthol. It’s a crisp and invigorating vape with an amazingly cool minty finish.
White Gummy Bears
-
Indulge in the nostalgic taste of White Gummy Bears with iJoy TaijiZen Judo. This delightful flavor perfectly captures the sweet, juicy essence of one of your favorite childhood candies. It consistently delivers a silky smooth vaping experience that will take you back to more carefree times.
Each one of these choices from IJOY TajiZen Judo 24K Vape flavors offers a unique vaping experience. There's a taste preference for every vaper to enjoy with TajiZen Judo 24000 Puffs.
High Capacity Battery
: Comes with a powerful 24000mAh battery, the IJOY TajiZen Judo Vape 24000 delivers consistently long-lasting vape sessions without ever having to recharge! Enjoy uninterrupted vaping enjoyment all day and night.
Advanced Chipset Technology
: The advanced chipset technology allows the TajiZen Judo 24k Disposable Vape to deliver unparalleled performance, lightning fast heating, and precision temperature control for a consistently rewarding vape experience.
Ultra Compatibility
: With its wide range of vape tanks and coils, the TajiZen Judo Vape 24000 allows you to  personalize your vaping experience the way you like it, whether you prefer mouth-to-lung or direct-lung vaping styles. This is so cool!
Slick Ergonomic Design:
Featuring a slick, attractive design, the TajiZen Judo Vape 24000 loves to live in the palm of your hand. Its highly intuitive controls and clear OLED display screen makes for easy navigation and futuristic customization.
Safety Features
: Safety features have been built into the TajiZen Judo Vape 24000. It is equipped with a range of safety features, including overheating protection, short circuit protection, and low battery protection, and even a child safety feature. Welcome to the world of worry-free vaping.
Components
:
1 x IJOY TajiZen Judo 24000 Vape Mod
2 Diverse Vaping Modes (Standard) (Boosted)
1 x User Manual
Child Lock Feature prevents unintended usage
Intuitive Touch Screen Performance
Exceptional Battery and Coil Performance
You can now jump to the next level of vaping performance with the IJOY TajiZen Judo Vape 24000. Experienced and novice vapers will love this advanced vape system. The wide range of features and customizable options are ready-made to suit your needs. Rise above the vape competition today with the IJOY TajiZen Judo Vape 24000.

all_text:
iJoy TaijiZen Judo 24000 | Blackberry Cherry
[]
iJoy TaijiZen Judo 24000 Disposable Vape

The best in vape innovation has arrived!  The IJOY TajiZen Judo Vape 24000 is a state of the art vape device that offers unbeatable performance and flavor. Engineered with great attention to detail, the TajiZen Judo Vape 24000 offers many futuristic features and a stylish design that just loves to be held. Its long-lasting battery ensures a super extended vaping experience every time.
IJOY TajiZen Judo Vape Flavors

Apple Kiwi
: Totally crisp and refreshing! The fusion of apple and kiwi has the perfect amount of apple tartness and exotic kiwi taste for a burst of fruity goodness you’ll love. It’s the perfect vape refreshment.
Berry Bubble Gum
: It tastes as good as it sounds! This is a “blast from the past” blend of mixed berries all wrapped up in the chewy goodness of sugary bubblegum. It’s a playful flavor boasting sweet fruit and a taste of the past in every puff.
Blackberry Cherry
: Who doesn’t love the taste of blackberries and cherries? They get together in this vape filled with fruity goodness. This tasty combination offers a vaping experience that's perfectly satisfying and fabulously flavorful.
Blue Raspberry Ice
: Chill out with the icy flavor detonation of Blue Raspberry Ice. Tangy blue raspberries are enhanced with a menthol chill for a crisply invigorating vape. It is a frozen flavor full of fruity sweetness followed by ice cold mint.
Blue Strawberry Coconut
: What will they think of next? This tempting blend of ripe strawberries, creamy coconut, and juicy blueberries is a total tongue teaser. Dig this taste of the tropics!
Chilled Watermelon
: Juicy and refreshing watermelon flavor is brought to life with a splash of cool menthol. This frozen watermelon blend brings a burst of fruity followed by a cooling mint finish.
Cool Mint
: Super
cool is here. This minty flavor hits differently, with a crisp, rejuvenating feeling each time you puff. Cool off and stay cool today.
Cranberry Soda
: It’s a fizzy, thirst quencher made from tart cranberries and sparkling soda that drops a blast of funky fruit flavor on your palate. Get some Cranberry Soda soon!
Lemon Peach Passionfruit:
It’s like puffing on a fruit smoothie! Zesty lemons, succulent peaches, and tropical passionfruit all come together perfectly. This flavor combo offers a big time explosion of citrus and sweetness with a tropical twist.
Mango Lime Pineapple
: Bright and delightful, this must have mixture of juicy mangoes, tangy limes, and ripe, golden pineapples drops a burst of tropical goodness on your tongue with every puff. This island combo offers a revitalizing vape flavor just right for summertime enjoyment.
Pineapple Lime
: Revel in the zesty and exhilarating flavor of Pineapple Lime, where hand picked limes are matched with naturally sweet pineapple, for a burst of equatorial goodness. This one is a puff perfect balance of sweet and tart, for vape sessions that are both invigorating and fulfilling.
Sour Strawberry Grape
: You need the tangy, piquant flavor of Sour Strawberry Grape in your life. It’s all about ripe strawberries and juicy grapes finished with a sour twist. This bold burst of fruity flavor and flavorful is a tantalizing mixture of sweet and sour that's sure to awaken your thirsty taste buds.
Triple Mango:
Get into a triple vape paradise with this crazy good blend of three different varieties of mango. The phenomenal taste in every puff will satisfy every mango lover’s wildest cravings.
Watermelon Chew:
You’ll definitely appreciate the juicy deliciousness of Watermelon Chew. Puff on ripe watermelon flavor with just a touch of sweetness for a totally unique vape experience. This is an instant classic that offers an all-day, enjoyable vape solution.
White Strawberry Ice
: The delicate taste of White Strawberry Ice is a result of ripe garden strawberries mixed with the perfect amount of cold menthol. It’s a crisp and invigorating vape with an amazingly cool minty finish.
White Gummy Bears
-
Indulge in the nostalgic taste of White Gummy Bears with iJoy TaijiZen Judo. This delightful flavor perfectly captures the sweet, juicy essence of one of your favorite childhood candies. It consistently delivers a silky smooth vaping experience that will take you back to more carefree times.
Each one of these choices from IJOY TajiZen Judo 24K Vape flavors offers a unique vaping experience. There's a taste preference for every vaper to enjoy with TajiZen Judo 24000 Puffs.
High Capacity Battery
: Comes with a powerful 24000mAh battery, the IJOY TajiZen Judo Vape 24000 delivers consistently long-lasting vape sessions without ever having to recharge! Enjoy uninterrupted vaping enjoyment all day and night.
Advanced Chipset Technology
: The advanced chipset technology allows the TajiZen Judo 24k Disposable Vape to deliver unparalleled performance, lightning fast heating, and precision temperature control for a consistently rewarding vape experience.
Ultra Compatibility
: With its wide range of vape tanks and coils, the TajiZen Judo Vape 24000 allows you to  personalize your vaping experience the way you like it, whether you prefer mouth-to-lung or direct-lung vaping styles. This is so cool!
Slick Ergonomic Design:
Featuring a slick, attractive design, the TajiZen Judo Vape 24000 loves to live in the palm of your hand. Its highly intuitive controls and clear OLED display screen makes for easy navigation and futuristic customization.
Safety Features
: Safety features have been built into the TajiZen Judo Vape 24000. It is equipped with a range of safety features, including overheating protection, short circuit protection, and low battery protection, and even a child safety feature. Welcome to the world of worry-free vaping.
Components
:
1 x IJOY TajiZen Judo 24000 Vape Mod
2 Diverse Vaping Modes (Standard) (Boosted)
1 x User Manual
Child Lock Feature prevents unintended usage
Intuitive Touch Screen Performance
Exceptional Battery and Coil Performance
You can now jump to the next level of vaping performance with the IJOY TajiZen Judo Vape 24000. Experienced and novice vapers will love this advanced vape system. The wide range of features and customizable options are ready-made to suit your needs. Rise above the vape competition today with the IJOY TajiZen Judo Vape 24000.
