all_text:
Kado Bar Vintage Edition 20000 Puff Disposable Vape 5% Nicotine
[]
Vintage Design: The Kado Bar 20K Vintage Edition boasts a timeless design, exuding elegance and sophistication. Its classy vintage finish sets it apart from the crowd, making it a statement piece for vapers who appreciate both style and substance. It is a conversation piece!Ultra-Portable: The Kado Bar Vintage edition is all about on-the-go convenience. The Kado Bar 20K is compact and lightweight, and fits like a glove in your pocket, purse and lifestyle. Its ergonomic design gives you a comfortable grip, making it your fun companion for travel, commuting, or any adventure at all.Long-lasting Battery: The powerful 20,000mAh battery delivers super long vape sessions without stopping for frequent recharging. Cruise through your day with confidence, as you enjoy uninterrupted vaping pleasure wherever you go.Easy-to-Use: Kado Bar 20K Vintage Edition vape is incredibly easy to operate due to its user-friendly interface, making it perfect for both beginners and experienced vapers alike. All you need to do is fill the pod with your favorite e-liquid, snap it into place, and you're ready to vape on player!Premium Vapor Production: Experience rich, flavorful vapor clouds with every puff, thanks to the modern technology, twin mesh coils and only the best materials used in the construction of the Kado Bar 20K. Whether you prefer deep, intense throat hits or silky smooth, satisfying clouds, this vape delivers exceptional performance every time.Multiple Pod Options: Customize your vaping experience with a wide range of compatible pods, allowing you to explore multiple flavors and different nicotine strengths to suit your preferences from day to day. From classic tobacco to fruity blends, the options are endless and all delicious.Beast Mode / Normal Mode: Normal Mode will give you 20,000 puffs, while Beast Mode gives you 10,000 puffs. Cloud chasing has never been more exciting! Choose your strength to go along with your mood.
Introducing the Kado Bar 20K Vintage Edition vape, a sophisticated blend of style and performance tailor made for discerning vapers. Kado Bar is by far,
one of the most famous and influential brands in the vaping industry today
.
Engineered with precision in mind, this slick device embodies elegance, luxury and functionality, offering an unmatched vaping experience.
Experience the perfect fusion of style and performance with the Kado Bar 20K Vintage Edition vape. Elevate your vaping experience to “The Land of Milk and Honey”, as you indulge in the first class luxury of this exceptional device. Cloud chasing has never been better!

all_text:
Candy Crush Fire XL 6000 Puff Disposable Vape
[]
Fire XL 6000 Puff Disposable Vape

The Fire XL 6,000 Puffs is the perfect choice for anyone looking for a reliable disposable vaporizer. It offers users an easy-to-use, flavorful, and exceptional nicotine experience. This device is great for people on the go who want to enjoy their favorite flavors in a pre-filled tank without having to deal with messy refills or recharging.
This device is perfect for those looking for a quick, powerful vaping experience with its 6,000 puffs per pod. It conveniently comes fully charged and contains over 1ml of e-liquid each time it is replaced. Unlike traditional cigarettes, these devices have no buttons or switches and do not require a lighter, making them an ideal option for smokers seeking a discreet and portable nicotine solution. The device also features adjustable airflow and multiple temperature control settings so you can customize your experience accordingly. Add this must-have vaporizer to your cart today, and get ready to enjoy the delicious flavor at every session!
The Power & Air Flow:
The Fire XL 6000 Disposable Puff features a powerful 1000mAh battery that provides up to 6000 puffs, making it a great option for vapers who are always on the move. It features a C-Type charging design and has short circuit protection, making the Fire XL 6000 vaper-friendly and low-maintenance.
It also has a built-in LED light that indicates the battery life and puff count, making monitoring the device's usage easy. Thanks to its advanced airflow system, the device features a smooth and consistent draw that ensures maximum vapor production with every puff.
Portability & Ease Of Use:
The Fire XL 6000 Disposable Puff is also incredibly easy to use, with no complicated settings or controls to worry about. The Fire XL utilizes regulated temperature control to ensure optimal burning, resulting in a consistent and satisfying experience. Simply remove the device from the packaging and start vaping immediately. These disposable vapes have a puff count of 6000, making them a convenient and durable option for smokers seeking an alternative to traditional smoking. When the e-juice runs out, or the battery dies, dispose of the device and replace it with a new one.
Key Product Features of the Fire XL 6000 Puff Disposable Vape:

6000 Puffs per Disposable
13ml Salt Nicotine
Type-C Rechargeable Device
Discrete and Sleek Black Device
Premium Mesh Coil
Auto disconnect when fully charged to prevent burning juice
Taste The Flavor in Every Puff with the Fire XL 6000
The e-juice used in the device is made from high-quality ingredients, ensuring a pure and satisfying vaping experience with every use.
Berry Blast:

A juicy explosion of mixed berry flavors with a hint of sweetness and tartness. So right for any time of day or night.
Blue Razz:

What comes first? The blueberry blast or the raspberry razzle-dazzle? A tangy and refreshing flavor that combines the sweetness of blueberries with the sourness of raspberries.
Candy Crush:

A sweet and addictive flavor featuring a delicious blend of sugary candies bursting with fruity and creamy notes. It will have you coming back for more, just like the game!
Guava Blast:

A tropical flavor eruption that mixes the sweetness of guava with a hint of tanginess and freshness.
Gummy Bear:

A fun and fruity flavor reminiscent of the classic gummy candy, with a blend of different fruit flavors. Forever young!
Orange Juice:

A classic citrus flavor with a refreshing and tangy taste, perfect for breakfast morning pick-me-up.
Peach Mango:

A sweet and juicy combination of two tropical fruits with the perfect balance of sweetness and zestiness.
Pina Colada:

A tropical paradise in a vape, dripping with the rich flavors of pineapple and coconut. Flip flops on, and time to chill!
Soul Mint:

A refreshing and cooling flavor with just the right amount of sugar and minty freshness.
Strawberry Banana:

A classic combination of two popular fruits featuring a sweet and creamy taste that you’ll long for again and again.
Tropical Smoothie:

A delicious blend of tropical fruits with a refreshing and smooth finish. So many awesome flavors are jammed into this one!
Virginia Tobacco
- The rich and robust flavor of Fire XL 6000 Puff Virginia Tobacco totally captures the earthy notes of Virginia tobacco leaves. Let the timeless allure of traditional tobacco taste take you away!  Enjoy relaxing after your long day with this comforting vape flavor sensation.
Watermelon Colada:

A fruity and revitalizing flavor with the essence of watermelon and the creaminess of coconut. Who could ask for more?
Watermelon Mint:

A refreshing and cooling flavor, boasting watermelon refreshment and a touch of minty freshness on the exhale
Watermelon Smoothie:

A delightful taste of ripe watermelon with a smooth and creamy finish.
White Peach Mojito:

A refreshing and sophisticated flavor with the sweetness of white peach and the tanginess of lime and mint. There is no rum, but you’ll think there is!
Why Order the Fire XL 6000 Puff Disposable Vape From White Horse Vapor

First reason - FREE SHIPPING on all orders $59+! At White Horse Vapor, we are proud to have the best customer service experience in the industry, including email support and phone lines that are open for you 6 days a week.
Don't worry about what you want suddenly being out of stock after you order. We have a large inventory and are ready to ship quickly. Don't fall for the knock-offs found on less reputable sites outside of the states. We sell direct from the producers, cutting out the middleman.

            Text: Fire XL 6000 Puff | Virginia Tobacco
[]
Fire XL 6000 Puff Disposable Vape

The Fire XL 6,000 Puffs is the perfect choice for anyone looking for a reliable disposable vaporizer. It offers users an easy-to-use, flavorful, and exceptional nicotine experience. This device is great for people on the go who want to enjoy their favorite flavors in a pre-filled tank without having to deal with messy refills or recharging.
This device is perfect for those looking for a quick, powerful vaping experience with its 6,000 puffs per pod. It conveniently comes fully charged and contains over 1ml of e-liquid each time it is replaced. Unlike traditional cigarettes, these devices have no buttons or switches and do not require a lighter, making them an ideal option for smokers seeking a discreet and portable nicotine solution. The device also features adjustable airflow and multiple temperature control settings so you can customize your experience accordingly. Add this must-have vaporizer to your cart today, and get ready to enjoy the delicious flavor at every session!
The Power & Air Flow:
The Fire XL 6000 Disposable Puff features a powerful 1000mAh battery that provides up to 6000 puffs, making it a great option for vapers who are always on the move. It features a C-Type charging design and has short circuit protection, making the Fire XL 6000 vaper-friendly and low-maintenance.
It also has a built-in LED light that indicates the battery life and puff count, making monitoring the device's usage easy. Thanks to its advanced airflow system, the device features a smooth and consistent draw that ensures maximum vapor production with every puff.
Portability & Ease Of Use:
The Fire XL 6000 Disposable Puff is also incredibly easy to use, with no complicated settings or controls to worry about. The Fire XL utilizes regulated temperature control to ensure optimal burning, resulting in a consistent and satisfying experience. Simply remove the device from the packaging and start vaping immediately. These disposable vapes have a puff count of 6000, making them a convenient and durable option for smokers seeking an alternative to traditional smoking. When the e-juice runs out, or the battery dies, dispose of the device and replace it with a new one.
Key Product Features of the Fire XL 6000 Puff Disposable Vape:

6000 Puffs per Disposable
13ml Salt Nicotine
Type-C Rechargeable Device
Discrete and Sleek Black Device
Premium Mesh Coil
Auto disconnect when fully charged to prevent burning juice
Taste The Flavor in Every Puff with the Fire XL 6000
The e-juice used in the device is made from high-quality ingredients, ensuring a pure and satisfying vaping experience with every use.
Berry Blast:

A juicy explosion of mixed berry flavors with a hint of sweetness and tartness. So right for any time of day or night.
Blue Razz:

What comes first? The blueberry blast or the raspberry razzle-dazzle? A tangy and refreshing flavor that combines the sweetness of blueberries with the sourness of raspberries.
Candy Crush:

A sweet and addictive flavor featuring a delicious blend of sugary candies bursting with fruity and creamy notes. It will have you coming back for more, just like the game!
Guava Blast:

A tropical flavor eruption that mixes the sweetness of guava with a hint of tanginess and freshness.
Gummy Bear:

A fun and fruity flavor reminiscent of the classic gummy candy, with a blend of different fruit flavors. Forever young!
Orange Juice:

A classic citrus flavor with a refreshing and tangy taste, perfect for breakfast morning pick-me-up.
Peach Mango:

A sweet and juicy combination of two tropical fruits with the perfect balance of sweetness and zestiness.
Pina Colada:

A tropical paradise in a vape, dripping with the rich flavors of pineapple and coconut. Flip flops on, and time to chill!
Soul Mint:

A refreshing and cooling flavor with just the right amount of sugar and minty freshness.
Strawberry Banana:

A classic combination of two popular fruits featuring a sweet and creamy taste that you’ll long for again and again.
Tropical Smoothie:

A delicious blend of tropical fruits with a refreshing and smooth finish. So many awesome flavors are jammed into this one!
Virginia Tobacco
- The rich and robust flavor of Fire XL 6000 Puff Virginia Tobacco totally captures the earthy notes of Virginia tobacco leaves. Let the timeless allure of traditional tobacco taste take you away!  Enjoy relaxing after your long day with this comforting vape flavor sensation.
Watermelon Colada:

A fruity and revitalizing flavor with the essence of watermelon and the creaminess of coconut. Who could ask for more?
Watermelon Mint:

A refreshing and cooling flavor, boasting watermelon refreshment and a touch of minty freshness on the exhale
Watermelon Smoothie:

A delightful taste of ripe watermelon with a smooth and creamy finish.
White Peach Mojito:

A refreshing and sophisticated flavor with the sweetness of white peach and the tanginess of lime and mint. There is no rum, but you’ll think there is!
Why Order the Fire XL 6000 Puff Disposable Vape From White Horse Vapor

First reason - FREE SHIPPING on all orders $59+! At White Horse Vapor, we are proud to have the best customer service experience in the industry, including email support and phone lines that are open for you 6 days a week.
Don't worry about what you want suddenly being out of stock after you order. We have a large inventory and are ready to ship quickly. Don't fall for the knock-offs found on less reputable sites outside of the states. We sell direct from the producers, cutting out the middleman.

all_text:
Spaceman Nebula 25K | Sour Grape BG
[]
Spaceman Nebula 25K Plus Disposable Vape 5% Nicotine

Let’s “give it up” for the
Spaceman Nebula 25k
vape device! “
It's like, outta this world
!” Picture this: cutting-edge technology meets sleek design, taking your vaping game to intergalactic heights! The Nebula 25k is not just any vape, it's the future of vaping that can be in your hands now! With its super cool futuristic vibe and next-level features, it's totally changing the vaping game. Say goodbye to mediocre vaping experiences, because the Nebula 25k is here to rock your world with unmatched performance and convenience. Here some of the Key Features that have the Spaceman Nebula 25K Plus leaving the competition in the dust:
Massive Battery Capacity & 25,000 Puffs

:

Power up your vaping journey with the Nebula 25k's massive battery capacity, ensuring extended sessions of uninterrupted enjoyment without the need for frequent recharging. With an astonishing 25,000 puffs per device, you are in for an epic vaping odyssey. Expect an abundance of massive flavorful clouds as well, to satisfy even the most avid vapers.
Innovative OLED Display

:

Navigate through a galaxy of far out settings with ease using the Nebula 25k's innovative OLED display. It constantly provides clear and intuitive feedback on battery life, puff count, and much more with Spaceman Vapes.
Adjustable Airflow

: Customize your vaping experience to personal perfection with the adjustable airflow control. Now you can adjust the intensity of each draw to suit your preferences.
Create your own vape experience with three different power modes: Boost (25W), Norm (18W), and Soft (14W). Unreal!
Compact and Portable

:

Despite its impressive capabilities, the Nebula 25k remains compact and portable, making it your perfect vaping sidekick for vaping on the go without giving up performance.
Quick Charge Technology

:

Long charging times are a thing of the past with the Nebula 25k's quick charge technology. Get back to vaping in no time at all.
Dual Mesh Coils

:

Experience unrivaled flavor production and intense clouds of vapor with this revolutionary dual mesh coil system seemingly from another world.
Sleek Design

:

Inspired by the mysteries of the cosmos and the universe, the Nebula 25k brings a sleek and futuristic design to your life that’s visually captivating with space-age functionality.
The Spaceman Nebula 25K Plus Disposable flips the script on long-lasting vapes, shooting you into a whole new galaxy of flavor and performance! This bad boy disposable packs a punch with features that totally revolutionize the disposable vape game.
Launch your vaping flights to new dimensions with the Spaceman Nebula 25k vape device, and discover a whole new universe of flavor, performance, and style.
Spaceman Vape Flavors:
Prism Mint

:

Experience clean, crisp instant refreshment when you taste Spaceman Vape Flavors  Mint. It’s a bombastic blast of arctic freshness! This well chilled blend makes you feel like you are out hiking on a brisk Alaskan morning.
Sour Apple Ice:

Dig this tantalizing blend of tart green apples and ice-cold menthol with Sour Apple Ice.
When your taste buds are happy… you’re definitely happy! The perky taste of sour apples does the trick, with a frigid twist that'll keep your taste buds tingling.
Sour Grape BG

:

Your taste buds deserve a treat! Turn them on to a burst of sweetness with our Sour Grape BG blend. Sour grape candy style flavors tantalize your palate with notes of tart sweetness and bright bombastic flavor. Every draw will remind you of those carefree days of your youth.
Straw Raz Cherry

:

Delight in a truly perfect and unique fusion of ripe strawberries, zingy raspberries, and Bing cherries. Straw Raz Cherry offers a triple threat of taste with amazing fruit flavors that do a jig on your palate with each puff. You can’t get enough!
Blue Raz Tang

:

You’ll love the sweet intensity of wild blue raspberries blessed with a touch of tangy citrus. Blue Raz Tang combines the familiar taste of blue raspberries with just the right amount of tartness, for a flavor sensation that is both exciting and refreshing.
Watermelon Dragon:
Ride on the back of a Dragon! J
uicy watermelon meets exotic dragon fruit in a passionately tantalizing vape. This Fairy Tale blend of sweetness and tropical taste will make you feel like medieval royalty with every puff.

all_text:
Raz CA6000 Tobacco Disposable Vape [6000 Puffs]
[]
Raz CA6000 6000 Puff Disposable Vape

Click for sound
3:06
The Raz CA6000 Disposable from Geek Vape is available in 10 flavors and comes prefilled with 10mL of 5% nicotine eliquid. These attractive vapes feature colorful shells with a comfortable leather grip, battery indicator light, and adjustable airflow to help you find the perfect draw.
Alaskan Mint:

A refreshing and cooling mint flavor vape with hints of spearmint and peppermint, perfect for a brisk Alaskan day or anywhere you live!
Blue Raz:

An electrifying fusion of sweet blueberries and tangy raspberries is here, resulting in a tantalizing berry medley that will leave your taste buds tingling.
Cactus Jack:

Puff on this desert adventure, as exotic cactus intertwines with juicy tropical fruits, unveiling a unique flavor profile that captures the spirit of the Southwest.
Clear:

How about a blank canvas for your senses? Clear offers a pure and untainted vaping experience, allowing you to appreciate the essence of vaping without any added flavors.
Crushed Berries:

A delicious blend of ripe, juicy berries, lovingly crushed to perfection, with a sweet, tangy finish.
Dragon Fruit Lemonade:

A tropical twist on classic lemonade, featuring the exotic mysterious flavor of dragon fruit surrounded with a tart lemon kick.
Frozen Strawberry:

A frosty blend of juicy, sun-ripened strawberries with a chilly, refreshing finish.
Fuji Blue Razz:

The enchanting allure of Fuji apples blended with the captivating essence of blue raspberry, unveils a symphony of crispy sweetness that will transport you to puff paradise.
Fuji Pear:

Crisp, tasty Fuji apples blend seamlessly with juicy pears, for a truly harmonious fruit fusion that is so satisfying.
Georgia Peach:

Sweet and juicy peaches straight from the peach state, with a bright and sunny flavor that will make you feel like you're sitting in a Georgia orchard as you puff.
Hawaii Sunset:

A tropical dream vape, with a sweet blend of juicy pineapple, tangy mango, and refreshing citrus flavors.
Lemon Lime:

Fall into the zesty embrace of tangy lemons and juicy limes, so happy together creating a citrus explosion that will tease your brain.
Mango Mania:

A frenzy of tropical delights hits your taste buds, as ripe mangos take center stage with this juicy vape experience.
Miami Mint:

The tropical breeze of Miami comes through with every puff with this mint-infused flavor! It’s a refreshingly cool sensation that's perfect for a laid-back vape-cation!
Peach Pear:

A perfect pairing of sweet and juicy peaches with luscious pears, creating a well balanced and fruity flavor puff profile.
Pom Pom Raz:

Delight in the succulent essence of ripe pomegranates with fresh raspberries, creating a big fruit flavor that will leave your palate smiling.
Spearmint:

A classic and timeless flavor that boasts the cool and refreshing taste of real spearmint leaves.
Strawberry Kiwi:

A delightful blend of ripe, juicy strawberries with the sprite and refreshing flavor of kiwi fruit.
Strazz:

Taste the dancing strawberries and zesty raspberries in this playful flavor, resulting in a tantalizingly tangy and subtly sweet vape.
Tobacco:

Treat yourself to the rich and robust taste of a classic tobacco vape! Smoky undertones and velvety smoothness captures the timeless allure of traditional tobacco leaves. This one is sure to satisfy even the most discerning tobacco enthusiasts with its full-bodied, comforting aroma.
Watermelon Ice:

A juice bomb of sweet watermelon flavor with a cool and refreshing menthol finish, perfect for a hot summer day.
6000 Puffs per Disposable
10ml Pre-Filled eLiquid
5% (50mg) Nicotine Strength
650mAh USB-C Rechargeable Battery
Premium Mesh Coil
Adjustable air flow
Battery and eLiquid indicator lights
Leather grip
Lanyard

A true adventure for your senses.', 'Each of these flavors are formulated\xa0to evoke the unique character and taste sensation of the respective flavor, making them irresistible to you.', "If you're thinking 'every flavor is irresistible, which one should I pick?'"]
1000mAh Combined Battery Power (200mAh for lone Disposable, 800mAh for charging device)Magnetically Attachable BatteryRechargeable5% Nicotine StrengthUSB Type-C Charging (Cable not included)Approximately 9000 PuffsKeep your battery from the starter kit and save with replacement pods!
Off-Stamp SW9000 Kit

VapeWH welcomes the Off-Stamp SW9000 Kit, fueled by Lost Mary – a groundbreaking innovation in the world of vaporizers. This battery provides an approximate 9000 puffs when combined with a flavor pod of your choosing. The battery boasts a powerful 800mAh wattage, and the magnetically attachable pod features its own 200mAh battery.
Already have the battery from the kit? Purchase replacement pods
here
!
Here's a few things to consider before buying our Off-Stamp SW9000 Kits:
Device Type and Compatibility
: Understand the type of device included in the kit and ensure it meets your vaping preferences.
Battery Life

: Consider the battery life of the kit, especially if you plan to use it frequently or for extended periods.
Ease of Use

: If you're new to vaping, look for a kit that is user-friendly and easy to operate.
Portability

: Depending on your lifestyle, you might prefer a more compact and portable device that can easily fit in your pocket or purse.
Price and Value

: Thinking price? We've got you covered with the best prices. If it's your first time trying Off-Stamp, start with the Kit. Then purchase replacement pods for more savings!

all_text:
Miami Mint Off-Stamp SW9000 Pods
[]
Off-Stamp SW9000 Pods

Introducing Off-Stamp SW9000 Pods, powered by Lost Mary – a revolutionary advancement in the realm of vaporizers. These interchangeable pods provide a convenient solution for changing vape flavors without unnecessary waste. The rechargeable battery offers up to 9000 puffs (battery not included with pods). The pod itself features an integrated 200mAh battery, and the magnetically attachable device is powered by an 800mAh battery.
First time trying Off-Stamp? Make sure you purchase the
starter kit
first!
Off-Stamp Pods Specifications

200mAh for lone Disposable (1000mAh Combined Battery Power)
Magnetically Attachable Battery (Battery is not included - see kit for battery here.)
5% Nicotine Strength
USB Type-C Charging (Cable not included)
Approximately 9000 Puffs
Off-Stamp Flavors

Blue Razz Ice:

Experience a refreshing twist with Blue Razz Ice. This flavor fuses the bold, tangy essence of blue raspberries with a crisp, icy exhale, offering a revitalizing vaping adventure.
California Cherry:

Taste the sun-soaked splendor of California Cherry. This flavor captures the essence of freshly picked cherries, delivering a sweet, juicy burst in every puff.
Cherry Strazz:

Indulge in the delightful fusion of Cherry Strazz. This unique blend combines the classic sweetness of cherries with a zesty, citrus twist for a playful and exhilarating taste experience.
Dragon Strawnana:

Explore exotic tastes with Dragon Strawnana. A mythical mix of luscious dragon fruit and creamy banana, this flavor offers a smooth, tropical escape with each inhale.
Juicy Peach:

Enjoy the lush, nectarous delight of Juicy Peach. This flavor brings the essence of ripe, succulent peaches, creating a warm, fruity sensation that's irresistibly sweet.
Key Lime
- Take your taste buds on a little trip to Key West with the zestful flavor of
Off Stamp
Key Lime. This vibrant and legendary vape flavor captures the authentic taste of freshly squeezed key limes from Florida. It’s a perfect balance of tartness and natural sweetness that invigorates with a pleasure filled sensory overload in every puff.
Miami Mint:

Refresh your senses with Miami Mint. Inspired by the cool ocean breeze of Miami beaches, this flavor offers a crisp, minty freshness that cleanses the palate and invigorates your vaping experience.
Sour Grape Sucker
- Bring back the nostalgic delight of one of your favorite childhood candies with Off Stamp Sour Grape Sucker. This entertaining flavor hits you with the bold and juicy taste of ripe grapes topped with a mouth-puckering, tangy sour twist. It’s a tantalizing taste treat and an enjoyable vaping experience.
Sour Lush Gummy:

Rekindle your love for tangy treats with Sour Lush Gummy. This playful blend balances the sweetness and tartness of gummy candies, delivering a fun, mouth-puckering adventure.
Watermelon Ice:

Quench your thirst for something cool with Watermelon Ice. Imagine a frosty, juicy slice of watermelon, combining a sweet, refreshing flavor with an icy finish for the ultimate chill vaping experience.
Shop Off-Stamp SW9000 Pods from White Horse Vapor

Our online store has variety of Off-Stamp SW9000 Pod flavors, catering to every taste, budget, and vaping intensity. What's even better, we provide the most competitive prices in the industry - ensuring you find everything you need right here.
Explore our complete collection of Off Stamp pod flavors to discover your new favorite taste sensation now at White Horse Vapor!

all_text:
Jewel Mint Ice Pod Pocket 7500 Puff Disposable Vape
[]
Pod Pocket 7500 Puff Disposable Vape | Free Shipping  at VapeWH

Introducing the Pod Pocket 7500 Puff Disposable Vape - the ultimate convenience in vaping technology! With a massive 7500 puff capacity, this disposable vape is perfect for extended use without the need for frequent recharging or refilling.
The sleek and compact design of the Pod Pocket makes it so easy to carry with you anywhere, whether it's on a road trip, a night out partying with friends, or just chilling at home. The pre-filled pod system features a wide range of delicious flavors to satisfy any taste, for a consistently satisfying vaping experience.
With no buttons or settings to think about, the Pod Pocket 7500 Puff Disposable Vape is great for beginners or veteran vapers alike. Just take a puff and dig the smooth, solid vapor production. When you are finished, just dispose of the device and grab another. Don't compromise on flavor or convenience! Try the Pod Pocket 7500 Puff Disposable Vape now!
7500 Puffs per Disposable
10mL Pre-Filled eLiquid
5% (50mg) Nicotine Strength
USB-C Rechargable Battery (Charger Not Included)
Premium Mesh Coil
American Tobacco:
The classic temptation of a robust and full-bodied American tobacco blend is here! Once you experience this authentic taste of smoky, sun-kissed tobacco leaves with a touch of toasted oak, you’ll want more.
Berry Watermelon Ice:
A delightful blend of sweet watermelon and juicy mixed berries, finished off with a cool icy exhale that is so chilly.
Blue Razz Cotton Clouds:
A nostalgic carnival treat, with a blast of blue raspberry flavor. A hint of a fluffy cotton candy sweetness completes this awesome flavor.
Blue Razz Ice:
A frosty vape juice featuring the tangy taste of blue raspberry and a beautiful blast of menthol at the end. Ice Ice baby!
Fruity Bears:
Gummy bears come to life in this sweet and fruity e-juice, featuring a medley of your favorite fruity flavors too many to describe! Let your taste buds be the judge!
Jewel Mint Ice:
Experience the perfect balance of mint and menthol, with a cool and refreshing exhale that's perfect for any pure mint lover.
Jewel Tobacco:
A richly refined fusion of pristine tobacco leaves with hints of smooth caramel and warm vanilla. Enjoy this sophisticated vape experience that will satisfy all your vape cravings.
Lemon Mint Ice:
Lemon Mint Ice has a subtle balance of sweet and sour with a hint of menthol that provides complete satisfaction with every puckered puff!
Rainbow Freeze:
Get ready for a flavor eruption, with this fruit filled refreshing vape juice, featuring a mixture of tropical fruits up front and a cool icy finish.
Strawberry Mango:
A tropical paradise all to yourself, boasting juicy mango and sweet strawberry flavors that will transport you to that sunny beach you wish you were on right now.
Strawberry Rollup:
Take a vape ride down memory lane with this sweet and nostalgic vape juice. The classic taste of strawberry fruit rollups has been created just for you.
Straw Watermelon:
A juicy fusion of two sweet classic summer fruits, bursting with the flavors you savor and the best choice for any lovers everywhere.
Strawberry Kiwi Ice:
A deliciously sweet, sharp vape juice featuring ripe strawberries and tart kiwi, finished off with a cool icy exhale.
Virginia Tobacco:
Lose yourself in the gentle embrace of Virginia's most choice tobacco. Mellow, light tobacco notes intertwine with delicate honey and dried fruit, resulting in a harmonious and relaxing vape sensation.
Watermelon Burst:
Are you ready for a giant burst of juicy watermelon flavor with this refreshing vape juice? This is a good one for those hot summer days just ahead!

all_text:
Yogi Bar Vape
[]
Yogi Bar Vape | 8000 Puffs

Yogi E-Liquid presents the Yogi Bar, a rechargeable 8000 puff vape. With flavors inspired by the delicious, woodsy taste of granola bars, this vape tastes just as great as it performs!
Key Product Features for Yogi Bar Vape 8000 Puffs
Premium E-Liquid by Yogi
17mL prefilled capacity
5% Salt Nicotine
Integrated 600mAh Rechargeable Battery
Type C USB Port
Adjustable Airflow
Comfortable Mouthpiece
Yogi Bar Vape
Blueberry Granola Bar:

Savor the sweet harmony of wild mountain blueberries and the wholesome taste of a granola bar, for a burst of fruity goodness with every puff.
Java Granola Bar:

It’s time to experience the rich, robust flavor of freshly
brewed coffee, seamlessly fused into a satisfying granola bar. This is a must try
combo of caffeine and comfort.
Original Granola Bar:

Sometimes the classic simplicity of an original granola bar
is just what you need. Totally packed with hearty oat flavor and a hint of natural
sweetness for a timeless vape.
Peanut Butter Banana Granola Bar:

The creamy decadence of peanut butter
paired with the natural sweetness of tree-ripened bananas, all wrapped up in a
nutty granola bar vape sensation.
Strawberry Granola Bar:

Imagine enjoying the luscious taste of sun-ripened
strawberries and the comforting crunch of a granola bar all in one vape flavor!
This is a delightful blend of both.
Vanilla Tobacco Granola Bar:

Match the sophistication of smooth vanilla with
the rich, aromatic essence of tobacco! This granola bar and tobacco combination
rocks!

all_text:
Lost Mary MO5000 Vape | Strawberry Watermelon Ice
[]
This e-liquid disposable vape device is specifically designed to meet the needs of those looking for an easy and convenient vaping experience. Featuring a high-capacity 13.5ml e-liquid tank, it can deliver around 5000 puffs before needing a refill. Additionally, its rechargeable 500mAh battery can keep up with even the most power-hungry vapers without any difficulty. Furthermore, it uses a modern mesh coil technology that heats the e-liquid more evenly than traditional coils, resulting in more flavorful hits every time. On top of that, the juice inside comes in 50mg (5 percent) strength, allowing for an intense yet smooth throat hit.
E-liquid capacity: 13.5ml5000 puffs approx.500mAh rechargeable batteryMesh coil50mg (5%) strengthUSB-C charger not included
The Lost Mary Vape by Elf Bar MO5000 is the perfect vape pen for experienced and beginner users alike. It offers an easy-to-use device with premium construction that packs a punch in terms of performance. This disposable vape is powered by a 650mAh battery, giving it plenty of battery life for a full day of use. The 13ml capacity is more than enough for most average vapers and should offer hours of vaping enjoyment. The mesh coils provide intense flavor profiles, ensuring every puff tastes great.
Additionally, this vape device has a cool battery indicator system featuring LED colors that make it easy to tell when the battery levels are high, medium, or low. This helps you accurately estimate how much power is left in the device so you don't find yourself stranded without any juice in your tank at a critical time. All these great features come within an eye-catching shell that looks stylish and prestigious, making the Lost Mary Vape by Elf Bar MO5000 the perfect choice for people who vape and are searching for optimum performance and convenience in one package.
The Lost Mary Vape by Elf Bar MO5000 is readily available at White Horse Vapor - our team searches the globe for superior vape products that deliver the best vapor production and flavor We are pleased to offer you the best vape products on the market today. We guarantee satisfaction from start to finish.

all_text:
Strawberry Super Strudel
[]
Fifty Bar Disposable
Experience vaping like never before with the Fifty Bar 6500 Puff Disposable, proudly American-made and designed to deliver pure satisfaction in every puff. With a robust 5% nicotine concentration, this sleek device offers an exceptional vaping experience that's perfect for both newcomers and long-time vape enthusiasts.
Cinnamon Funnel Cake:

Savor the nostalgic, spicy-sweet taste of your beloved carnival treat whenever you desire. With every inhale of this vape, you'll feel transported to lively carnival grounds, as if you can hear the merry tunes of the carousel, witness the exhilarating ride attractions in motion, and relish the tantalizing aromas wafting from food stalls in every direction.
Kyoho Grape Jelly:
Kyoho Grape Jelly boasts the exquisite taste of plump Kyoho grapes, delivering a burst of freshly harvested vineyard fruits. The velvety richness of grape jelly highlights your vaping experience, making it both decadent and delightful.
*New* Black Series - Milky Loops:
Dig into this, featuring a nostalgic breakfast treat that tastes like cereal loops swimming in a creamy milk bath. It’s an experience rich with memories and finishing with a velvety smoothness.
*New* Black Series -
Butterbean
: Try something different! This comforting flavor profile blends the warm notes of butter with a hint of sweetness, for a buttery taste that will remind of freshly baked treats. Change never tasted so good!
*New* Black Series -
Blueberry Super Strudel
: Blueberry Super Strudel captures the true taste of a classic pastry scone, with multiple flaky layers and a sugary blueberry filling. This fruit filled puff duplicates the taste of a freshly baked strudel.
*New* Black Series -
Strawberry Super Strudel
: Imagine a device that duplicates the flavor of a warm, strawberry-infused strudel! Strawberry Super Strudel’s deep layers of flaky pastry and lots of strawberry filling is the one you’ve dreamed of.
*New* Black Series -
Apple Super Strudel:
Apple Super Strudel tastes like freshly baked, golden pastry overflowing with a delectable apple filling. Now you can combine the flavor of baked apples with the satisfying crunch of “puff” pastry.
5% (50mg) Nicotine Content.
Prefilled E-Liquid Capacity: 16ml.
Approximately 6500 puffs.
Crafted with 100% U.S. ingredients.
400mAh USB-C Rechargable
Battery (Charger Not Included).

all_text:
Truu Bar Vape | Citrus Melody
[]
Truu Bar Vape | 2800 Puffs

Click for sound
1:19
Experience the perfect blend of sophistication and delectable satisfaction with Truu Bar. The sleek, flush design embodies simplicity without compromising on greatness. Indulge in the hassle-free experience, discreet size, and the familiar, beloved flavors you've come to know and love!
Truu Vape Specifications
7mL Pre-Filled E-Liquid
5% (50mg) Nicotine Strength
1000mAh NON-Rechargeable Battery
Approximately 2800 Puffs
Super Mesh Coil
Sleek, Compact, & Hassle-Free
USA Made E-liquid
Not Rechargeable
Truu Bar Flavors

Snow Mint:
Embark on a refreshing journey with Snow Mint, where cool, invigorating menthol meets the crisp purity of freshly fallen snow, delivering a frosty burst of minty delight.
Strawberry Lemonade:
Savor the perfect harmony of sun-kissed strawberries and zesty lemons in our Strawberry Lemonade blend. This flavor is a symphony of sweet and tangy notes that dance on your palate, leaving you refreshed and satisfied.
Pink Lemonade:
Experience the classic taste of summer with Pink Lemonade, a delightful fusion of luscious red berries and zingy lemons. This sweet and tart combination creates a pink-hued elixir that's both vibrant and irresistibly delicious.
Lemon Head:
Take a trip down memory lane with Lemon Head, a nostalgic flavor reminiscent of your favorite childhood lemon candies. Tangy and sweet, this vape captures the essence of lemony goodness in every puff.
Crisp Apple:
Crisp Apple brings you the essence of biting into a freshly picked apple orchard. Revel in the juicy, sweet flavor of perfectly ripe apples, with a hint of refreshing crispness that will leave your taste buds invigorated.
Citrus Melody:
Immerse yourself in the vibrant symphony of Citrus Melody. This blend harmoniously combines the bright and bold flavors of citrus fruits, creating a melody of tangy oranges, zesty grapefruits, and sweet tangerines that will tantalize your senses.
Blue Slush
-
Nostalgia rules with Blue Slush! The bright flavors of ripe blueberries and tangy raspberries meet in this frosty concoction reminiscent of your favorite childhood slurpy. Every puff hits with a refreshing burst of fruity sweetness, nicely balanced with a splash of chill!
Cinnamon Delight
-
The spicy-sweet aroma of cinnamon swirls everywhere as you puff on the cozy embrace of Cinnamon Delight. Treat yourself to the decadent flavor of freshly baked frosted cinnamon buns! This magnificent flavor lingers on the palate, making every puff a delightful moment to remember.
Menthol
- Dig this
icy mixture of amazing menthol flavor, thoughtfully blended to create a superlative iced vape experience. For all dedicated menthol lovers, this blast of winter taste will satisfy with its crisp, cold vapor emanating from every puff.

all_text:
Beard Vape Co. Salt Cinnamon Funnel Cake
[]
Beard Vape Co. Salt Cinnamon Funnel Cake

Beard Vape Co. Salt Nicotine E-liquid needs no introduction
, as it is one of the industry’s largest and most recognizable e-liquid brands. Their
revolutionary line of e-juices has been proven to deliver a smooth and satisfying vaping experience time and time again. Crafted with passionate precision, each flavor in this collection has been carefully formulated with only high-quality ingredients to provide vapers with incomparable taste sensations.
Salt Cinnamon Funnel Cake

:

The irresistible sweetness of Salt Cinnamon Funnel Cake is here. This delectable flavor brings the essence of carnival delights to your palate. It’s like tasting a warm and fluffy funnel cake lightly dusted with aromatic cinnamon sugar. Treat yourself to this carnival-inspired vaping experience that's as satisfying as it is indulgent. It’s fun too!
Quality workmanship is also a hallmark of this brand. Here's detailed product and flavor descriptions, highlighting key features too:
Many Flavor Options

:

With a large choice of available flavors, Beard Vape Co. Salt Nicotine E-liquid caters to every taste preference. From fruity delights to sweet desserts and bright menthols, you’ll find a flavor to make your favorite.
Smooth Salt Nicotine Formula

:

Beard Vape Co. Salt Nicotine E-liquid uses a unique salt nicotine formula that produces a smoother throat hit compared to traditional e-liquids. This innovative blend allows for higher concentrations of nicotine without giving up on flavor, making it that perfect choice for vapers looking to satisfy their nicotine cravings discreetly and efficiently.
High-Quality Ingredients

:

The Beard Vape Co.’s commitment to quality and purity shines through in everything they do. Beard Vape Co. uses only the finest ingredients in their salt nicotine e-liquids. Each batch is made with premium flavorings, pharmaceutical-grade nicotine, and painstakingly sourced base liquids to guarantee consistently pleasurable vaping experiences.
Customizable Nicotine Strengths

:

Whether you're a seasoned cloud chaser or just starting your vaping journey, Beard Vape Co. Salt Nicotine E-liquid offers a range of nicotine strengths to accommodate any preferences. Choose from a variety of nicotine concentrations, such as higher strengths for a more intense experience or lower strengths for a milder vape sensations.
Quick and Efficient Nicotine Delivery

:

Salt nicotine e-liquids are famous for their rapid absorption rate, providing vapers with a quick and efficient nicotine delivery. This makes Beard Vape Co. Salt Nicotine E-liquid the ideal choice for those seeking instant gratification without the harshness often associated with other higher nicotine e-liquids.
Travel-Friendly Packaging

:

Each bottle of Beard Vape Co. Salt Nicotine E-liquid comes in its own travel-friendly package! It’s so easy to take your favorite flavors with you anywhere you go. The tamper proof seals ensure freshness and safety, while the child-resistant caps keep curious youngsters away too.
Exceptional Flavor Profiles

:

From the first inhale to the last exhale, Beard Vape Co. Salt Nicotine E-liquid brings you a detonation of intense flavor that will tantalize your taste buds every time. Among the many flavor options you’ll find the sweetness of various fruits, the decadence of desserts flavors, or the bright, cool taste of menthol. Each flavor option has been expertly crafted to provide a satisfying and memorable vaping experience.
If you are
ready to level up your vaping game with Beard Vape Co. Salt Nicotine E-liquid, then it's time to take your taste buds on this wild thrill ride! Unlock a whole new world of flavor possibilities available to you with Beard Vape Co. Salt Nicotine E-Liquids’ super dialed-in products. Your taste experiences are about to get lit!

Whether you're a seasoned cloud chaser or just starting your vaping journey, Beard Vape Co. Salt Nicotine E-liquid offers a range of nicotine strengths to accommodate any preferences. Choose from a variety of nicotine concentrations, such as higher strengths for a more intense experience or lower strengths for a milder vape sensations.
Quick and Efficient Nicotine Delivery

:

Salt nicotine e-liquids are famous for their rapid absorption rate, providing vapers with a quick and efficient nicotine delivery. This makes Beard Vape Co. Salt Nicotine E-liquid the ideal choice for those seeking instant gratification without the harshness often associated with other higher nicotine e-liquids.
Travel-Friendly Packaging

:

Each bottle of Beard Vape Co. Salt Nicotine E-liquid comes in its own travel-friendly package! It’s so easy to take your favorite flavors with you anywhere you go. The tamper proof seals ensure freshness and safety, while the child-resistant caps keep curious youngsters away too.
Exceptional Flavor Profiles

:

From the first inhale to the last exhale, Beard Vape Co. Salt Nicotine E-liquid brings you a detonation of intense flavor that will tantalize your taste buds every time. Among the many flavor options you’ll find the sweetness of various fruits, the decadence of desserts flavors, or the bright, cool taste of menthol. Each flavor option has been expertly crafted to provide a satisfying and memorable vaping experience.
If you are
ready to level up your vaping game with Beard Vape Co. Salt Nicotine E-liquid, then it's time to take your taste buds on this wild thrill ride! Unlock a whole new world of flavor possibilities available to you with Beard Vape Co. Salt Nicotine E-Liquids’ super dialed-in products. Your taste experiences are about to get lit!

all_text:
Pod Juice Mango Strawberry Dragonfruit
[]
Pod Juice Mango Strawberry Dragonfruit

Product Information:

Pod Juice is the ultimate choice for vapers who insist on exceptional flavor and top performance. Engineered with precision and great attention to detail, Pod Juice offers a wide range of delicious flavors and modern formulas that will satisfy even the most discerning vapers. Make Pod Juice your passport to a high level vaping experience.
Available in 3mg 6mg & 12mg
Highest Quality Ingredients
: Pod Juice is made with only top-quality ingredients, including pharmaceutical-grade nicotine. This ensures a smooth and satisfying vaping experience with every puff.
Wide Array of Flavors:
From intense menthol, bold tobaccos and fruity dessert-inspired blends, the choices are all very appealing. Pod Juice offers lots of flavors specifically designed to satisfy every vaper’s taste preference.
Nicotine Salt Formula
: Pod Juice uses a nicotine salt formulation that provides smooth throat hits and fast nicotine absorption. This method is much more effective than traditional freebase nicotine e-liquids.
Dependable Performance
: You can expect strong performance and delightful flavor with each and every puff! Carefully crafted formulas and meticulous quality control standards make it a go to product.
Perfect Packaging
: Pod Juice is available in convenient packaging options, including pre-filled pods and e-liquid bottles, making it easy to enjoy your favorite flavors wherever you go.
Designed for Pod Systems
: Pod Juice is designed to be use with pod systems and low-wattage devices only. Optimal performance and flavor delivery without compromising on quality is the result.
Now is the time to experience the difference with Pod Juice and its premium quality ingredients, wide range of flavors, and exceptional performance. Make it your choice as a vaper who demands nothing but the best. Take your vaping experience to the clouds with Pod Juice today.

all_text:
Priv Bar Vape Turbo | Florida Lemonade
['Priv Flavors', 'Strawberry Mint Candy:\xa0 Satisfy your sweet tooth with the delightful fusion of ripe strawberries and cool mint candy. This flavor brings together the juicy sweetness of strawberries with a hint of icy mint, delivering a refreshing and candy-like vaping sensation.', "Dr. Cherry:\xa0Indulge in the rich and complex taste of Dr. Cherry. This vape flavor blends the deep, succulent notes of dark cherries, creating a smooth and sophisticated profile that's both sweet and satisfying.", 'Triple Mango:\xa0 Immerse yourself in a tropical paradise with Triple Mango. This exotic blend features the lush and juicy essence of three different mango varieties, delivering a burst of tropical sweetness with every inhale.', 'Watermelon Kiwi:\xa0 Experience the perfect harmony of Watermelon Kiwi. This flavor combines the juicy, thirst-quenching essence of ripe watermelon with the tangy and refreshing twist of kiwi, resulting in a delightful and balanced vaping experience.', "Triple Apple Ice:\xa0Brace yourself for a crisp and icy adventure with Triple Apple Ice. This flavor layers the flavors of three apple varieties with a menthol kick, creating a refreshing and invigorating vape that's perfect for those who enjoy a cool fruit fusion.", 'Watermelon Chill:\xa0Chill out with the cool and soothing vibes of Watermelon Chill. This flavor features the sweet and juicy taste of watermelon combined with a refreshing menthol breeze, providing a smooth and invigorating vaping experience.', 'Cherry Paradise:\xa0 Escape to Cherry Paradise, where the bold and luscious flavor of ripe cherries takes center stage. This vape blend captures the essence of sun-kissed cherries, delivering a sweet and indulgent taste that feels like paradise in every puff.', "Florida Lemonade:\xa0Quench your thirst with the citrusy goodness of Florida Lemonade. This flavor captures the essence of freshly squeezed lemons from the sunshine state, creating a tangy and invigorating vape that's perfect for a sunny day.", "Alaskan Mint:\xa0Brace yourself for a breath of fresh air with Alaskan Mint. This flavor combines the cool and crisp sensation of menthol with a hint of mint, creating an Arctic-inspired vaping experience that's both refreshing and invigorating.", 'Honolulu Blue:\xa0Transport yourself to the tropical paradise of Honolulu with Honolulu Blue. This vape flavor blends exotic fruits with a touch of blue raspberry, creating a sweet and vibrant profile that captures the essence of island living.', 'Peach Berry Ice:\xa0Refresh your senses with the delightful fusion of Peach Berry Ice. This flavor combines the succulent sweetness of ripe peaches and mixed berries with a cooling menthol breeze, delivering a well-balanced and invigorating vaping experience.', 'Blackberry Peach Lemon: This is an awesome blend of blackberries, juicy peaches, and a zingy squeeze of lemon. The result is a spirited and complex vape that fuses citrusy notes with a distinctly blackberry taste.', 'Tropical Lime Blast: Blast off with this thrilling burst of tropical lime, where the citrus meets up with a gang of tropical fruits to create a refreshing vape that brings a joyful puff paradise to your palate with each draw.']
Approximately 10000 to 14000 puffs. USB-C rechargeable battery. Battery and E-Liquid level indication.Adjustable airflow.
Priv Bar Vape
Turbo
Welcome the future of vaping with Priv Bar by the renowned and trusted brand, Smok. This cutting-edge device features an industry-standard screen, providing a clear display of your vapor levels and battery life. Tailor your vaping experience with the adjustable airflow, offering a range from 10,000 to 14,000 puffs. Elevate your satisfaction with the new standard in vaping technology.

all_text:
White Gummy Esco Bar Mesh Disposable
[]
About Esco Bars Vape 2500 Puff Disposables
White Horse Vapor offers the best collection of Pastel Cartel Esco Bar Disposable vapes out there. Each 2500 puff Pastel Cartel Esco Bars disposable vape pen features a 6mL prefilled e-liquid capacity and a huge 1000mAh battery! Every disposable vape pen in this collection comes in 50mg (5%) nicotine strength. This 2500 Puff Esco Bar provides unmatched flavor in every puff thanks to the mesh coil design and quality vape juice flavors available. The newly introduced flavors for these 2500 puff Pastel Cartel Esco Bar vapes are Blue Raspberry, Banana Ice, Watermelon Ice, Pink Lemonade, Bubblegum Ice, Strawberry Ice, Spearmint, Red Apple, Peach Ice, and more!
This collection of Pastel Cartel Esco Bar disposable vapes is sure to satisfy you with every puff. Find the perfect one for you here at White Horse Vapor.
2500 puffs per disposable
1000mAh battery
Mesh coil
Strength: 5% (50mg)
Apple Melons Ice:
Tart apple flavor mixed with ripe watermelons will totally please your senses. Lots of chilled juicy melons and apples of all different varieties get together for a taste eruption you'll love!
Banana Ice:

Sweet, ripe bananas paired with an ice cool finish.
Berry Strawberry Ice:

Mouth watering strawberry and mixed berries with an outstanding menthol blast at the end. Get cool with this one!
Black Dragon Ice:

A one-of-a-kind flavor with the sweetness of blue raspberry and a strong icy kick!
Blue Gummy:
Blue Gummy Bear vape juice will remind you of those popular candy gummy bears we all love! It is sweet, juicy and so satisfying! Get some soon and enjoy!
Blue Raspberry:
The perfectly smooth and sweet flavors of blue raspberry.
Blue Raspberry Lemon:

The blue raspberry flavor that so many people love with an extra twist of citrusy lemon for a more refreshing puff.
Blue Razz Cotton Candy:

This delicious vape flavor exhibits a wonderful saltwater taffy profile, infused with sweet, tart blue raspberries. It is a carnival of cotton candy goodness.
Blue Razzleberry:

Pomegranate
Blue raspberry enhanced with tangy pomegranate.
Blueberry Ambrosia:

A delicious mix of smooth creamy flavor with sweet blueberries.
Blueberry:

Enjoy a pure juicy and sweet traditional blueberry flavor.
Blueberry H2O (New):

A straight-up blueberry flavor profile for a no-nonsense experience.
Bubblegum Ice:

A sweet yet fruity bubblegum flavor paired with an iciness that hits the spot.
Caribbean Breeze:
A tropical mixed berry treat, blended together to create a refreshing vape twist you will quickly decide you need in your life.
Clear:
Flavorless with just a STRONG kick of ice. No sweetness, no spearmint, just ICE!
Cool Salted Caramel:

The sweet taste of rich caramel with a pinch of salt.
Cotton Candy:
A delicious and sweet take on the classic carnival candy.
Fiji Melons Ice:

Ripe watermelon paired with juicy apples finished with a kick of ice.
Fuji Apple Ice:
Sweet juicy apples for a crisp inhale.
Grape Ice:

A flavorful and sweet combination of juicy grape and menthol.
Grape:

Original grape in all it's glory and well balanced mixture of sweet and tart.
Grape H2O (New):

Original grape in all it's glory and a well-balanced mixture of sweet and tart.
Green Gummy:
Pucker up with Green Gummy featuring tangy and sour notes.
Gummy Bear:
Gummy Bear vape juice tastes similar to those popular candy gummy bears we all love! It is sweet, juicy, and 100% satisfying! Get some today!
Icy Mint:

Delivers a bold blast of icy cold menthol with each puff. Cool and refreshing, it is a total wake up call for your taste buds and senses! Stay cool and vape this frozen mint julep!
Island Hopper:

A tropical fruit flavored vape flavor that wants to take you to an island getaway. Its blend of exotic fruits with a hint of coconut is the best.
Kiwi Dragon Berry:

Exotic and familiar flavors of dragonfruit, kiwi, and blueberry.
Kiwi Dragon Berry Ice:

An invigorating blend of tangy kiwi, exotic dragonfruit, and sweet blueberries all coming in loud and clear, with a refreshing menthol chill.
Lemon Drops:

You will dig this mouth puckering, sour lemon candy vape juice that finishes with a sweet lemon center. Taste the perfectly balanced, snappy sugary goodness on the exhale and smile.
Lychee Ice:

Oozing with fragrant, flavorful lychee and just the right amount of mint to create the ideal menthol sensation. It is ideal because it does not overpower the fresh fruity lychee flavor!
Lychee Mango:

The exotic flavors of delicious lychee and ripe smooth mango!
Mango Guava Ice:

An ice cold experience featuring ripe mango, exotic guava, and refreshing ice.
Mango Ice:

Sweet, ripe, tropical mangoes infused with a blast of ice.
Mango Melon:

A perfect blend of sweet and cool with juicy mango, ripe melon, and fresh aloe vera.
Orange Limeade:

A refreshing spin on tart limeade and orange.
Pacific Cooler:

The refreshing flavor of a lemon-lime spritzer.
Peach Ice:

This flavor is perfect for people who seek the flavor of peach and the cooling sensation of menthol.
Peach:

Sweet like candy, this traditional peachy flavor is irresistible.
Peach H2O (New):

Get that sweet, summer flavor through peaches!
Peachy Mango Pineapple Ice:

The perfect sweet blend of peach, mango, and pineapple with cooling ice.
Peachy Mango Pineapple:

A healthy dose of juicy peach, mango, and tart pineapple.
Peachy Melons:

Ripe peaches and succulent melons rule! The inhale is bursting with the sweet and tangy flavor of fresh peaches, while the exhale is smooth and mellow, delivering the luxurious taste of juicy ripe melons. It is a mouthwatering blend that is both sweet and refreshing, making it the perfect all-day vape for fruit lovers.
Pink Burst:

Tastes exactly like everyone's favorite Starburst, the pink one!
Pink Lemonade:

A delicious mix of sweet and tart that provides you with the refreshing taste of classic pink lemonade.
Purple Reign:

Try this grape-flavored vape! It offers a sweet and vibrant taste with a hint of tartness. It is so smooth and refreshing, and is a popular choice among vapers who enjoy fruit flavors.
Rainbow:

A mix of sweet fruit and candy berries.
Red Apple:

The perfect, crisp flavor of freshly picked apples.
Snow Cone Ice:

A sweet syrupy combination of blueberry, raspberry, and strawberry for a Hawaiian classic.
Spearmint:

A chill, wintery mint flavor that is sure to satisfy mint and menthol lovers.
Straw Nanners Ice:

            Text: White Gummy Esco Bar Mesh Disposable
[]
About Esco Bars Vape 2500 Puff Disposables
White Horse Vapor offers the best collection of Pastel Cartel Esco Bar Disposable vapes out there. Each 2500 puff Pastel Cartel Esco Bars disposable vape pen features a 6mL prefilled e-liquid capacity and a huge 1000mAh battery! Every disposable vape pen in this collection comes in 50mg (5%) nicotine strength. This 2500 Puff Esco Bar provides unmatched flavor in every puff thanks to the mesh coil design and quality vape juice flavors available. The newly introduced flavors for these 2500 puff Pastel Cartel Esco Bar vapes are Blue Raspberry, Banana Ice, Watermelon Ice, Pink Lemonade, Bubblegum Ice, Strawberry Ice, Spearmint, Red Apple, Peach Ice, and more!
This collection of Pastel Cartel Esco Bar disposable vapes is sure to satisfy you with every puff. Find the perfect one for you here at White Horse Vapor.
2500 puffs per disposable
1000mAh battery
Mesh coil
Strength: 5% (50mg)
Apple Melons Ice:
Tart apple flavor mixed with ripe watermelons will totally please your senses. Lots of chilled juicy melons and apples of all different varieties get together for a taste eruption you'll love!
Banana Ice:

Sweet, ripe bananas paired with an ice cool finish.
Berry Strawberry Ice:

Mouth watering strawberry and mixed berries with an outstanding menthol blast at the end. Get cool with this one!
Black Dragon Ice:

A one-of-a-kind flavor with the sweetness of blue raspberry and a strong icy kick!
Blue Gummy:
Blue Gummy Bear vape juice will remind you of those popular candy gummy bears we all love! It is sweet, juicy and so satisfying! Get some soon and enjoy!
Blue Raspberry:
The perfectly smooth and sweet flavors of blue raspberry.
Blue Raspberry Lemon:

The blue raspberry flavor that so many people love with an extra twist of citrusy lemon for a more refreshing puff.
Blue Razz Cotton Candy:

This delicious vape flavor exhibits a wonderful saltwater taffy profile, infused with sweet, tart blue raspberries. It is a carnival of cotton candy goodness.
Blue Razzleberry:

Pomegranate
Blue raspberry enhanced with tangy pomegranate.
Blueberry Ambrosia:

A delicious mix of smooth creamy flavor with sweet blueberries.

A straight-up blueberry flavor profile for a no-nonsense experience.
Bubblegum Ice:

Caribbean Breeze:
A tropical mixed berry treat, blended together to create a refreshing vape twist you will quickly decide you need in your life.
Clear:
Flavorless with just a STRONG kick of ice. No sweetness, no spearmint, just ICE!
Cool Salted Caramel:

The sweet taste of rich caramel with a pinch of salt.
Cotton Candy:
A delicious and sweet take on the classic carnival candy.
Fiji Melons Ice:

Ripe watermelon paired with juicy apples finished with a kick of ice.
Fuji Apple Ice:

Grape Ice:

Grape:

Grape H2O (New):

Original grape in all it's glory and a well-balanced mixture of sweet and tart.
Green Gummy:
Pucker up with Green Gummy featuring tangy and sour notes.
Gummy Bear:
Gummy Bear vape juice tastes similar to those popular candy gummy bears we all love! It is sweet, juicy, and 100% satisfying! Get some today!
Icy Mint:

Delivers a bold blast of icy cold menthol with each puff. Cool and refreshing, it is a total wake up call for your taste buds and senses! Stay cool and vape this frozen mint julep!
Island Hopper:

A tropical fruit flavored vape flavor that wants to take you to an island getaway. Its blend of exotic fruits with a hint of coconut is the best.
Kiwi Dragon Berry:

Exotic and familiar flavors of dragonfruit, kiwi, and blueberry.
Kiwi Dragon Berry Ice:

An invigorating blend of tangy kiwi, exotic dragonfruit, and sweet blueberries all coming in loud and clear, with a refreshing menthol chill.
Lemon Drops:

Lychee Ice:

Oozing with fragrant, flavorful lychee and just the right amount of mint to create the ideal menthol sensation. It is ideal because it does not overpower the fresh fruity lychee flavor!

all_text:
Transistor BabyClouds
[]
About Transistor BabyClouds

Transistor's BabyClouds 60ml E-Liquid combines the fan favorite dessert flavor of vanilla custard with the sweetness of a strawberry swirl. On the inhale, you get a nice fragrant strawberry flavor with a delicious cream that coats your taste buds. On the exhale, you'll be greeted with light nutty notes. The flavors of Transistor BabyClouds strawberry vanilla custard e-liquid are unique and deep.
If you enjoy dessert flavors and looking for something different, you've got to try BabyClouds. The 70/30 VG/PG base of this strawberry vanilla vape juice allows for thick clouds while providing a solid throat hit.
Key Product Features of BabyClouds

Available in 60ml E-Liquid bottles
Strengths available
3mg (.3%) and 6mg (.6%)
Flavor: Vanilla Custard, Strawberry, Nutty

About Galactic Milk by Transistor

Transistor Galactic Milk 60ml E-Liquid is the familiar flavor of a sweet cereal bar, combined with fresh vanilla yogurt and ripe berries. This flavor is the perfect mix of dessert and fruit.
If you enjoy dessert and fruit flavors, this strawberry cereal bar vape juice is the perfect combination for you! The 70/30 VG/PG base allows for big, thick vape clouds and a solid throat hit.

all_text:
Diamond Peach Ice
[]
Fifty Bar Disposable
Experience vaping like never before with the Fifty Bar 6500 Puff Disposable, proudly American-made and designed to deliver pure satisfaction in every puff. With a robust 5% nicotine concentration, this sleek device offers an exceptional vaping experience that's perfect for both newcomers and long-time vape enthusiasts.
Cinnamon Funnel Cake:

Savor the nostalgic, spicy-sweet taste of your beloved carnival treat whenever you desire. With every inhale of this vape, you'll feel transported to lively carnival grounds, as if you can hear the merry tunes of the carousel, witness the exhilarating ride attractions in motion, and relish the tantalizing aromas wafting from food stalls in every direction.
Kyoho Grape Jelly:
Kyoho Grape Jelly boasts the exquisite taste of plump Kyoho grapes, delivering a burst of freshly harvested vineyard fruits. The velvety richness of grape jelly highlights your vaping experience, making it both decadent and delightful.
*New* Black Series - Milky Loops:
Dig into this, featuring a nostalgic breakfast treat that tastes like cereal loops swimming in a creamy milk bath. It’s an experience rich with memories and finishing with a velvety smoothness.
*New* Black Series -
Butterbean
: Try something different! This comforting flavor profile blends the warm notes of butter with a hint of sweetness, for a buttery taste that will remind of freshly baked treats. Change never tasted so good!
*New* Black Series -
Blueberry Super Strudel
: Blueberry Super Strudel captures the true taste of a classic pastry scone, with multiple flaky layers and a sugary blueberry filling. This fruit filled puff duplicates the taste of a freshly baked strudel.
*New* Black Series -
Strawberry Super Strudel
: Imagine a device that duplicates the flavor of a warm, strawberry-infused strudel! Strawberry Super Strudel’s deep layers of flaky pastry and lots of strawberry filling is the one you’ve dreamed of.
*New* Black Series -
Apple Super Strudel:
Apple Super Strudel tastes like freshly baked, golden pastry overflowing with a delectable apple filling. Now you can combine the flavor of baked apples with the satisfying crunch of “puff” pastry.
5% (50mg) Nicotine Content.
Prefilled E-Liquid Capacity: 16ml.
Approximately 6500 puffs.
Crafted with 100% U.S. ingredients.
400mAh USB-C Rechargable
Battery (Charger Not Included).

With a robust 5% nicotine concentration, this sleek device offers an exceptional vaping experience that's perfect for both newcomers and long-time vape enthusiasts.
Cinnamon Funnel Cake:

Savor the nostalgic, spicy-sweet taste of your beloved carnival treat whenever you desire. With every inhale of this vape, you'll feel transported to lively carnival grounds, as if you can hear the merry tunes of the carousel, witness the exhilarating ride attractions in motion, and relish the tantalizing aromas wafting from food stalls in every direction.
Kyoho Grape Jelly:
Kyoho Grape Jelly boasts the exquisite taste of plump Kyoho grapes, delivering a burst of freshly harvested vineyard fruits. The velvety richness of grape jelly highlights your vaping experience, making it both decadent and delightful.
*New* Black Series - Milky Loops:
Dig into this, featuring a nostalgic breakfast treat that tastes like cereal loops swimming in a creamy milk bath. It’s an experience rich with memories and finishing with a velvety smoothness.
*New* Black Series -
Butterbean
: Try something different! This comforting flavor profile blends the warm notes of butter with a hint of sweetness, for a buttery taste that will remind of freshly baked treats. Change never tasted so good!
*New* Black Series -
Blueberry Super Strudel
: Blueberry Super Strudel captures the true taste of a classic pastry scone, with multiple flaky layers and a sugary blueberry filling. This fruit filled puff duplicates the taste of a freshly baked strudel.
*New* Black Series -
Strawberry Super Strudel
: Imagine a device that duplicates the flavor of a warm, strawberry-infused strudel! Strawberry Super Strudel’s deep layers of flaky pastry and lots of strawberry filling is the one you’ve dreamed of.
*New* Black Series -
Apple Super Strudel:
Apple Super Strudel tastes like freshly baked, golden pastry overflowing with a delectable apple filling. Now you can combine the flavor of baked apples with the satisfying crunch of “puff” pastry.
5% (50mg) Nicotine Content.
Prefilled E-Liquid Capacity: 16ml.
Approximately 6500 puffs.
Crafted with 100% U.S. ingredients.
400mAh USB-C Rechargable
Battery (Charger Not Included).

Strengths available:
3mg (.3%) and 6mg (.6%)

all_text:
Fireball E-Liquid
[]
About Hot Cinnamon E-Liquid

Finally try our best selling E-Liquid! This Fireball vape juice tastes exactly how it sounds! Delicious cinnamon with a hot spicy kick! This hot cinnamon e-liquid is the perfect rendition of hot cinnamon gum or Fireball Whiskey!
How To Use Pure Unflavored E-Liquid:

Remove the childproof safety cap from your bottle of Pure Unflavored E-Liquid
Unscrew the blue drip trip by turning it counterclockwise
Dispense the entire bottle of flavor extract to pure unflavored e-liquid
Shake the combined mixture for 1 minute
Optional: Allow the mixture to steep for 24 hours in a room temperature area for an optimal experience
Product Info

Choose Your Own Strength﻿﻿
Comes with (1) 12ml vial of Fireball: Hot Cinnamon flavor extract
Bottle Size: 60ml

            Text: Fireball E-Liquid
[]
About Hot Cinnamon E-Liquid

Finally try our best selling E-Liquid! This Fireball vape juice tastes exactly how it sounds! Delicious cinnamon with a hot spicy kick! This hot cinnamon e-liquid is the perfect rendition of hot cinnamon gum or Fireball Whiskey!
How To Use Pure Unflavored E-Liquid:

Remove the childproof safety cap from your bottle of Pure Unflavored E-Liquid
Unscrew the blue drip trip by turning it counterclockwise
Dispense the entire bottle of flavor extract to pure unflavored e-liquid
Shake the combined mixture for 1 minute
Optional: Allow the mixture to steep for 24 hours in a room temperature area for an optimal experience
Product Info

Choose Your Own Strength﻿﻿
Comes with (1) 12ml vial of Fireball: Hot Cinnamon flavor extract
Bottle Size: 60ml

all_text:
Transistor Tango Chillin'
[]
About Tango Chillin' by Transistor

Transistor Tango Chillin' 60ml E-Liquid features the classic flavors of watermelon, mango and tangerine that the original Tango Melon offers, except with the addition of an icy blast. This flavor is the perfect mix of tropical fruits and ice for a refreshing vape experience.
If you enjoy fruit flavors with an icy chill, this iced fruit pop vape juice is perfect for you! Tango Chillin' comes in a 60ml unicorn bottle. The base of this 70/30 vape juice will allow for big, thick vape clouds and a solid throat hit.
Key Product Features of Tango Chillin'

Available in 60ml E-Liquid bottles
Strengths available:
0mg 0%) 3mg (.3%), 6mg (.6%)
Flavor: Watermelon, tangerine, and mango with ice.

all_text:
Dinner Lady Lemon Tart
[]
About Dinner Lady Lemon Tart

Lemon Tart E-liquid by Dinner Lady 60ml is an appetizing vape flavor of zesty lemon tart pie that is filled with a lemon custard topped with a whipped meringue.
On the inhale, the bright lemon curd flavor will makes your mouth water. Then, the pie crust flavor in this Dinner Lady liquid emerges to balance out the tartness of the lemon. The exhale tastes just like sugary, creamy meringue.
The 70/30 VG/PG base allows for big and thick vape clouds and a solid throat hit.
Key Product Features of Dinner Lady Lemon Tart

Available in 60ml E-Liquid bottles
Strengths available:
3mg (.3%) and 6mg (.6%)
Flavor: Lemon Tart

Suicide Bunny Mother's Milk
[]
About Suicide Bunny Mother's Milk

Suicide Bunny vape e-liquid collection is inspired by badass women from around the world. Mother's Milk strawberries and cream vape juice is one of Suicide Bunny's most infamous, delicious, and highly acclaimed e-liquid, claiming multiple awards for it's dessert flavor profile. On the inhale, your taste buds will be greeted with a custard inhale followed with a sweet strawberry exhale. This strawberries and cream vape juice is creamy, fruity and nothing short of phenomenal.
Flavor Profile:
Cream, Milk, Strawberry
Key Product Features of Mother's Milk

Available in 60ml and 120ml bottles
Strengths available:
0mg, 15mg (.15%), 3mg (.3%), 6mg (.6%), 12mg (1.2%), 18mg (1.8%)

Cassadaga took over the dessert e-liquid category with this sugary and flavor explosive cannoli-flavored vape juice.

Nicotine Strength: 25mg (2.5%) and 50mg (5%)

all_text:
Tobacco Monster Salt Smooth
[]
Tobacco Monster Salt Smooth
Old-school tobacco lovers unite! A nic salt e-liquid, Tobacco Monster Salt Smooth, is here, and it really is smoooooth. Featuring a luxurious blend of smooth tobacco and hints of Spanish Cream, Tobacco Monster Salt Smooth is perfect for tobacco aficionados to show off their savvy palates. Formulated to be reminiscent of an earthy, mellow, and sophisticated blend of cured American tobacco, this tobacco vape juice delivers a robustly smooth and elegant flavor.
If you love the smoothness of this flavor blend, be sure to check out the other flavors available within our line of unique
tobacco flavor vape products
. We have something for everyone!
Flavor Profile:
Tobacco & Spanish Cream
Key Product Features of
Tobacco Monster Salt Smooth
Available in 30ml bottles
50/50 PG/VG
Nicotine strength available: 24mg (2.4%), 48mg (4.8%)

[]
About Sin Tax by Prohibition Juice Co.

Sin Tax 100ml E-Liquid is a delicious, rich and creamy dessert flavor that combines peanut butter with custard. The flavor of this dessert e-liquid offers the most satisfying, creamy peanut butter clouds.
If you enjoy rich dessert vape flavors, this e-liquid is the perfect combination for you! The 70/30 VG/PG base allows for big, thick vape clouds and a solid throat hit.
Key Product Features of Sin Tax

Available in 100ml E-Liquid bottles
Strengths available:
3mg (.3%), and 6mg (.6%)
Flavor: Peanut Butter Custard

Transistor NectoSphere
[]
About NectoSphere by Transistor

Transistor NectoSphere 60ml E-Liquid combines the flavors of sweet, succulent nectarines and juicy, citrusy tangerines. This flavor is the perfect mix of fresh, mouthwatering summer fruits.
If you enjoy fruity flavors, this citrus vape juice is the perfect combination for you! Transistor NectoSphere citrus e-liquid comes in a 60ml unicorn bottle. The 70/30 VG/PG base allows for big, thick vape clouds and a solid throat hit.
Key Product Features of NectoSphere

Available in 60ml E-Liquid bottles
Strengths available:
0mg (0%), 3mg (.3%), and 6mg (.6%)
Flavor: Tangerine, Nectarine

all_text:
Tobacco Monster Smooth
[]
Tobacco Monster Smooth

Tobacco Monster Smooth vape juice is perfect for tobacco lovers who are looking for a smooth, luxurious flavor profile for their tobacco vape pens. Tobacco Monster vape juices present and deliver a perfect blend of tobacco flavors that truly taste authentic, and the Smooth flavor features a classic tobacco profile with ribboned notes of sumptuous Spanish Cream.
If you love the smooth flavor profile in this tobacco vape pen, check out our wide range of other
tobacco flavor vape products
for a similar flavor to try something new. Or, we offer Bold and Rich options from Tobacco Monster which boast other distinct classic tobacco flavors that many of our customers enjoy!
Flavor Profile:
Tobacco & Spanish cream
Key Product Features of Tobacco Monster Smooth Vape Juice

Available in 60mL bottles
50/50 PG/VG
Strengths available:0mg, 3mg (.3%), 6mg (.6%)

Suicide Bunny Sucker Punch
[]
About Sucker Punch Suicide Bunny

Sucker Punch takes the ordinary fruit flavored e-liquids for a wild spin. Suicide Bunny combines mixed fruit with clear notes of dragonfruit and adds their signature cream base that definitely delivers a flavorful punch to your taste buds. It's a silky smooth creamy fruit e-juice that will catch you off guard in a delightfully pleasant way.
Flavor Profile:
Cream, Mixed Fruit, Dragonfruit
Key Product Features of Sucker Punch

Available in 60ml or 120ml bottles
Strengths available:
0mg, 15mg (.15%), 3mg (.3%), 6mg (.6%), 12mg (1.2%), 18mg (1.8%)

Tobacco Monster Bold

This Bold flavor from Tobacco Monster Vape Juice provides a truly exhilarating vape experience. Bold provides the user with a strikingly rich tobacco flavor accentuated with warm notes that no one can resist. Perfect for those who enjoy a strong and classic tobacco flavor, Bold features a nicotine salt blend of rich, smooth-tasting tobacco that will uplift your spirits and make your day.

Tobacco Monster Rich
[]
Tobacco Monster Rich

This Rich flavor from Tobacco Monster Vape Juice is just that – rich. Delivering a flavor profile that was designed to replicate the taste of a traditional cigarette, Tobacco Monster Rich is a carefully balanced vape juice that is reminiscent of medium-bodied American tobacco. Smooth, smokey, and robust, this Tobacco Monster vape juice is a powerful blend of tobacco with notes of vanilla and caramel that is sure to tantalize your senses.
If you’re a tobacco lover and you’ve tried this uniquely “rich” and flavorful profile and are looking for more tobacco flavor options, no worries. We have a wide selection of
tobacco flavor vape products
available where there’s something for everyone.
Tobacco Vape Juice Flavor Profile:
Tobacco, vanilla, caramel
Key Product Features of Tobacco Monster Rich Vape Juice

Available in 60mL bottles
50/50 PG/VG
Strengths available: 0mg, 3mg (.3%), 6mg (.6%)

all_text:
Tobacco Monster Salt Rich
[]
Tobacco Monster Salt Rich
Capturing the rich and robust flavors of flue-cured tobacco leaves, Tobacco Monster Salt Rich is a full-bodied tobacco nicotine salt vape liquid that embodies a classic bold American tobacco flavor. Perfect for tobacco connoisseurs and amateur vapers alike, Tobacco Monster Salt Rich envelopes users with a rich, complex blend of authentic tobacco, smokey vanilla, and creamy caramel.
If the tobacco lover in you enjoys this “rich” and flavorful profile but is looking to explore more vape tobacco flavors, we’ve got you covered. We stock our shelves with the latest and greatest products and have a wide selection of
tobacco flavor vape products
available to accommodate everyone’s flavor palate.
Flavor Profile:
Tobacco, vanilla, caramel
Key Product Features of
Tobacco Monster Salt Rich Vape Juice
Available in 30ml bottles
50/50 PG/VG
Strength available: 24mg (2.4%) and 48mg (4.8%)

all_text:
FreeMax GEMM Disposable Tanks
[]
About FreeMax Disposable Tanks

FreeMax GEMM Disposable Tanks feature a non-removable sub-ohm mesh coil, organic tea fiber cotton wicking medium, and comes in many coil options. Featuring a plastic tank construction, the FreeMax GEMM Disposable tank top can be refilled via a silicone stoppered fill port. The wicking medium is composed of 90% tea fiber cotton and 10% organic cotton offering great taste! Pick from a wide range of single, dual, triple, and quad meshed coil options that is sure to satisfy new and seasoned users. Comes in a pack of two (2).
*Online prices only.
0.12ohm G1 Mesh Coil - 40-80W
0.15ohm G1 Mesh Coil - 40-80W
0.2ohm G2 Double Mesh Coil - 40-80W
0.5ohm G2 Double Mesh Coil - 20-30W
0.15ohm G3 Triple Mesh Coil - 50-90W
0.15ohm G4 Quad Mesh Coil - 40-80W
