all_text:
UWELL CALIBURN AK3 Pod Kit | Free Shipping
[]
UWELL CALIBURN AK3 Pod Kit | Free Shipping

Are you on the hunt for the perfect vape kit that is compact, easy to use, and produces excellent flavor? Look no further than the UWELL CALIBURN AK3 Pod Kit, available right here at White Horse Vapor.
Vaping has become an increasingly popular alternative to smoking tobacco products. With so many options on the market, choosing the right device for your needs can be overwhelming. However, the UWELL CALIBURN AK3 Pod Kit has quickly become a favorite among vapers for its sleek design and impressive performance.
The UWELL CALIBURN AK3 Pod Kit is a high-quality vape device available at White Horse Vapor. This compact and sleek pod kit comes with a 690mAh built-in battery, allowing for long-lasting use. The 2ml refillable pods utilize UN2 Meshed-H 0.9ohm coils, providing exceptional flavor and vapor production. The device includes a draw-activated firing mechanism and a convenient LED battery indicator.
If you're looking for a high-quality vape kit that won't break the bank, the UWELL CALIBURN AK3 Pod Kit is worth considering.
Compact and sleek design.
Portable and Wearable - Thanks to the Silicone Lanyard that comes in the box, you will be able to travel with it everywhere you go
690mAh built-in battery for long-lasting use.
2ml refillable pods with UN2 Meshed-H 0.9ohm coils for exceptional flavor and vapor production.
Closable Light Animation - Logo Indicator flashes while drawing
Interactive Light Indication - Green, Blue, and Red lights will let you know what percentage your battery is
Large E-Liquid Check Window - Large window allows you to see how much e-liquid you have left with ease
15-Minute Fast Charging - Charges from 0 to 100% in record time, so you aren't stuck waiting
Draw-activated firing mechanism for easy use.
Compatible with both Nic Salt and regular e-liquids.
Multiple safety protections, including short-circuit and low power alert.
Easy to fill and replace pods.

VOOPOO PnP Pod Tank
[]
About the VOOPOO PnP Pod Tank

The sub-ohm VOOPOO PnP Pod Tank was designed with versatility in mind! The PnP Tank fits the Drag S and Drag X kits, but also features 510 threading allowing it be used with most box mods.
PnP Pod Tanks feature a 4.5mL e-liquid capacity, and is compatible with the PnP coil series. The dual airflow intake design allows for the highest quality vaping experience.

all_text:
JUUL Classic Menthol Pods
[]
JUUL Menthol Pods

What’s better than classic menthol vape juice? Menthol-flavored JUUL pods. Packaged into unique and convenient pods, these JUUL menthol pods provide an easy go-to replacement for those transitioning from traditional cigarettes to e-cigarettes. JUUL menthol pods offer up an icy breath of fresh air with a smooth pull that will leave you more than satisfied.
Each pod is equivalent to 1 pack of cigarettes or 300 puffs and provides access to the cool, refreshing menthol flavor you crave. JUUL menthol pods make the perfect refill for any JUUL starter kit. Simply place a new menthol-flavored JUUL pod into your JUUL battery and experience a cool refreshing sensation with every puff you take!
Key Product Features of JUUL Menthol Pods

Number of Pods Included: 4
Pod Capacity: 0.7mL (pre-filled)
Strength available: 5%
Compatible with: JUUL devices

JUUL Virginia Tobacco Pods 5%
[]
About JUUL Virginia Tobacco Pods

If you’re making the switch from traditional cigarettes to an e-cigarette, but you really love the tobacco flavor that your standard cigarettes offers, then you’ll love JUULs Virginia Tobacco salt nic disposable pods.
The e-salt liquids used in these pods deliver the distinguished, classic flavor of American-grown tobacco. The taste rivals that of the best traditional tobacco you have ever smoked. It’s aromatic and subtle, and it delivers an exhilarating burst of that will be sure to love.
Key Product Features of JUUL Virginia Tobacco

5% strength available
0.7ml liquid per pod
4 pods per pack
Each pod is equivalent to 1 pack of cigarettes or 300 puffs

all_text:
Fireluke 2 Mesh Sub Ohm Tank
[]
About the Fireluke 2 Mesh Sub Ohm Tank

Freemax introduces their new Fireluke 2 Mesh Sub Oh, Tank
, a 24mm diameter, push to open top fill system, that uses a variety of mesh coils
, a complete line up of different colors and materials that match all box mods perfectly.
The Fireluke 2 can easily be filled by pushing the top of the tank and exposing the large single fill port. The Fireluke 2 utilizes the Freemax X Mesh and TX Mesh Coil Family.
Airflow enters the Fireluke 2 via dual adjustable bottom air slots that measure in at 13mm by 3mm and can be fully closed. A 15mm wide bore drip tip allows the user to intake adequate amounts of vapor with ample flavor. With its unique construction and the use of mesh coils, the FreeMax Fireluke 2 Sub-Ohm Tank offer a stylish design along with great flavor.
Size: D24mm x 47.8mm
Capacity: 5mL
Fireluke 2 Tank (Graffiti Black/Green tanks: 1 x TX2 Mesh coil 0.2ohm 40-80W / Metal Black tanks: 1 x X1 Mesh coil 0.15ohm pre-installed)
1 x Extra TX1 or X1 Mesh Coil 0.15ohm 40-90W
1 x Extra 5ml Bubble Pyrex Tube
1 x Extra O-ring Replacement

FreeMax GEMM 80W Kit (Employees Favorite)
[]
About The FreeMax GEMM 80W Kit
The FreeMax GEMM 80W vape mod starter kit is a compact, efficient, and powerful tube mod designed with 3 levels of wattage and a built in 2900 mAh battery. Each FreeMax GEMM 80W Kit comes with 2 Disposable Tanks.
What You Get:

1 x GEMM 80W VW Mod
1 x GEMM Disposable Tank 4ml (Built-in G2 Mesh Coil 0.2ohm 40-80W)
1 x Extra GEMM Disposable Tank 5ml (Built-in G1 Mesh Coil 0.15ohm 40-70W)
1 x USB Charger
1 x User Manual
1 x Warning Card
1 x Warranty Card
E-liquid Capacity: 5ml (G1 Mesh Coil Standard Edition); 4ml (G2/G3/G4 Mesh Coil Standard Edition)
Battery Type: Built-in 2900mAh Battery
Output Wattage Level: 40W/60W/80W (0.15ohm), 40W/60W/80W (0.2ohm), 20W/25W/30W (0.5ohm)
Output Voltage Range: 0-4.2V
Output Current Range: 0-42A
Resistance Range: 0.1ohm-3ohm
Power Efficiency: 95%
Working Wattage: 20-90W
Thread: 510

Voopoo V.THRU Pro Kit 900mAh
[]
About Voopoo V.THRU Pro

VooPoo Tech’s all-new line of vape mods are impressive. By equipping their devices with “custom gene” chipsets they have set a new standard in performance and reliability. These devices showcase a number of superb features that deliver super high efficiency. There are even recommended operating modes to ensure the best possible experience. VooPoo encases all of their new technology in gorgeous frames with carbon fiber sides. We are offering you the decorative option in Silver, Space Gray, Green, Moon White and Rosy. Get with this program and enjoy!
VOOPOO V.THRU Pro Kit Key Product Features

all_text:
JUUL Device Vape Kit
[]
About JUUL Device Vape Kit

The JUUL Device kit is a slick, light weight and well built closed pod system, and the only closed pod system on the market today!  There are no buttons, only a pre-filled pod and the pen style battery that has an LED indicator. The magnetic charger that comes with your JUUL Device Kit makes it very easy and convenient to simply plug it in and charge! Forget the clutter of wires that comes with other systems. This amazing closed system vaporizer was designed to create a simple and always satisfying method for adult smokers to transition away from cigarettes. It comes in a silver or smooth slate color!
LED Indicator Meanings -
When you put your JUUL device down, then pick it up to inhale, an LED light will display the following colors:
White: In use (Taking a puff)
Green: Charged
Yellow: 50 – 60 % Charge
Red: 10 – 30 % Charge
Note
: JUUL Pods are not included in this kit, so if you need pre-filled pods you may purchase them separately.
WHAT’S IN THE BOX:
1x Rechargeable JUUL Device
1x USB Charger

The Smok Baby Beast Coil (V8-Q2 0.4ohm) is rated for 40-80w, best usage falling in the 55-65w range. These coils are compatible with the following tanks:
V8 Baby-T12 Light
V8 Baby-Mesh
V8 Baby-T10
V8 Baby-T8
V8 Baby-Q4
V8 Baby-X4
V8 Baby-T6
V8 Baby RBA Head.
These coils are available in a five pack
